98b7(mdo sde): tshig gis mi snyan par brjod pa dang / gshe ba dang / brgyad bkag pa dang / ched du bos shing zan gcod pa'am/ chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i kha zas stob pa'am/ dbyug pa'am
99a1(mdo sde): rdos 'tshog pa'am/ lag pas brdeg pa'am/ mtshon gyis brdeg pa de dag mi srun pa'i phyogs gang gi nang du bgrang bar bya/ smras pa/
99a2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ log par zhugs pa'i mi srun pa'i phyogs su'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rim gro bgyi ba'i 'os rnams la rim gro mi bgyid pa ni/ log par zhugs
99a3(mdo sde): pa chen po lags pa'i slad du ste/ rgyal po chen po/ log par zhugs ba de lta bus ni/ lha rnams kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs te/ des mu
99a4(mdo sde): ge'i dgon pa nyam nga bar 'gyur zhing mi ma lags pa rnams yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad gtong bar 'gyur te/ des sems can rnams yams
99a5(mdo sde): kyi nad can/ gnod pa can/ nad 'go ba can du 'gyur zhing tshe'ang yongs su 'bri/ longs spyod kyang yongs su 'bri/ nad med pa'ang yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ro//
99a6(mdo sde): smras pa| bram ze/ rgyal po nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pas ci'i phyir dbang po dang yan lag gtubs shing nyams par bya ba dang / sems can gsad
99a7(mdo sde): par mi bya ba yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po| rgyal po nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa'ang g.yon la gnas pa srog gcad pa'am/ dbang po dang / yan
99b1(mdo sde): lag dang / nyid lag dang dbral bar mi sems te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi las kyi dbang gis 'chi na'ang khong khro ba'i sems bskyed de dus bgyis na/ ngan
99b2(mdo sde): song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba sha 'khon du 'gyur ba mthong bas de'i slad du sems can dgum par ma brjod de/ dbang po dang / yan
99b3(mdo sde): lag dang / nyid lag rnams kyang phyir glan du mi rung bas de'i slad du de dag gtubs shing nyams par bgyi ba rung bar ma brjod pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcing ba dang /
99b4(mdo sde): go rar stsal ba la sogs pa ni/ bcos su rung bas nas/ de'i slad du rung bar brjod do/ /rgyal po ni/ skye rgu thams cad yongs su skyong ba lags na/ de ltar bgyis na de
99b5(mdo sde): nyid ma bskyangs par 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du rgyal pos skye rgu yongs su bskyang ba'ang rdzogs par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dgum pa dang /
99b6(mdo sde): dbang po dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gtubs shing nyams par bgyi ba ni/ skye rgu ma mos par 'gyur ba'i gnas lags te/ de ni/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos bgyi
99b7(mdo sde): ba ma lags so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ rgyal po'i khams na longs spyod kyi 'bras bu 'du ba yod pa de dag rgyal po rang gi yin zhes bya'am/ gzhan gyi yin zhes bya/ smras
100a1(mdo sde): pa| rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ rang gi'ang ma lags/ gzhan gyi'ang ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzhan dag gis ni/ rang gi lag
100a2(mdo sde): mthus bsgrubs pas na/ rang gi ma lags so/ /rgyal pos yongs su bsrungs shing de dag gis kyang de mnga' bar btags pas gzhan gyi ma lags so/ /smras pa/ bram
100a3(mdo sde): ze| gal te skye rgu la longs spyod yod bzhin du longs spyod gyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i rigs pa rgyal po la 'bul du mi btub na/ des de dag gi ma byin par len par
100a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes bya'am mi bya/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ mi 'gyur te/ gal te longs spyod mchis bzhin mi ster na/ ser sna las byung ba'i kha na ma tho
100a5(mdo sde): ba dang / bsod nams ma lags pa ni/ cher 'phel lo/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te longs spyod yod bzhin du longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i rigs pa
100a6(mdo sde): 'bul du mi btub pa la rgyal pos nan gyis mnan te 'bul du bcug na/ des de'i ma byin par len pa zhes bya'am mi bya/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ gla rdan
100a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis ma byin par len pa zhes mi bgyi'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te rgyal pos dbul po zhi gnan gyis mnan te longs spyod kyi rgyu dpya dbul ba'i
100b1(mdo sde): rigs pa dbul du bcug na/ de kha na ma tho ba zhes bya ba'am mi bya/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de la lar ni/ kha na ma tho bar 'gyur/ de la lar ni/ kha na ma tho bar mi 'gyur
100b2(mdo sde): lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ /de la gal te mi des longs spyod de dag smad tshong la zhugs pa'am/ rgyan po la zhugs pa'am/ chud gsan pa'am/ log par spyad pa
100b3(mdo sde): spyod pa zhig tu gyur la/ de la rgyal pos de lta bu'i sems kyis slad kyis shas slar stsal ba'i shags mchis par bgyis la nan gyis 'bul du stsal bas/ gal te phyin
100b4(mdo sde): chad tshul ma lags pas longs spyod chud mi gson na/ rgyal pos gnyis ka'i don bgyis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi dkor 'phel ba'i don dang / gzhan rgud par 'gyur ba
100b5(mdo sde): las gzung ba'i don bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te mi de'i longs spyod de dag zhugs kyis dral tam/ chab kyis 'tshal tam/ bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dag
100b6(mdo sde): gis 'phrog gam/ rkun pos brkus sam/ sbas pa las rul tam/ lo tog ser bas khyer ram/ bye ba dang / ne tso dang / byi bas 'tshal tam/ char ma bab ste ma 'khrungs
100b7(mdo sde): sam| de dag la sogs pa'i rnam pas de'i longs spyod dag chab 'tshal bar gyur na/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos longs spyod kyi rgyu dbya 'phul ba'i rigs pa yangs par
101a1(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i rigs te/ de ltar ma bgyis na/ de ma bskyangs pa'i slad du kha na ma tho bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta
101a2(mdo sde): ste| dper bgyi na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis slong ba'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag cig zas la bos pa las de nas de'i dus la bab pa dang / zas spyar sbyar ba
101a3(mdo sde): de chab 'tshal bar gyur te mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung ba dang / zhugs kyis bral tam/ gseg ma dang / rdul dang / char pas chab 'tshal bar gyur tam/ rkun pos
101a4(mdo sde): 'tshal ba zhig tu gyur te/ des de'i slad du de'i dus su mchis pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag la zas ma stsal na/ de ni/ de ltar bzar mi rung ba'am/ bzar
101a5(mdo sde): ma mchis par gyur te dge sbyong dang / bram ze la dbul bar dga' yang cha ma lags par 'gyur bas/ de ltar ma stsal ba'i slad du kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par
101a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ de'ang tshul 'di 'dra bar gzigs par bgyi'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ de ltar bag yod cing snying rje dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po
101a7(mdo sde): de lta bu yan lag du zhig gis rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rnam pa bcus te /
101b1(mdo sde): gnam gyis bskos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor srun pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson pa dang / chos la gus pa dang / mkhas pa dang /
101b2(mdo sde): des pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kun spyod rab tu rig par spyod pa dang / mi bde ba bzod pa dang / chos la phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'o/ /de la gnas gyis bskos pa phun
101b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po ni/ blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mda' bar mchog dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams la dben cing gnod ba chung ba dang /
101b4(mdo sde): nad ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can no/ /'khor srun pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ rgyal po'i bgyi ba'i las tshegs chung dur rtag tu bde bar gnas la/ rgyal po'i tshul
101b5(mdo sde): las mi nyams pa'o/ /shes rab phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po ni/ chos kyis skye rgu bskyang ba la thabs mkhas shing bgyi ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/ /
101b6(mdo sde): brtson pa'i rgyal po ni/ dgra ma mchis pas dga' bar gnas shing mdzod 'phel bar bgyid pa'o/ /chos la gus pa'i rgyal po ni/ bsod nams kyi bgyi ba'ang mi
101b7(mdo sde): gtong la mi srun pa rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ /mkhas pa'i rgyal po ni/ bsam pa myur du rdzogs shing mtha' mi ring bas bgyi ba dag las mi nyams pa'o/ /des pa'i rgyal
102a1(mdo sde): po ni| skye bo thams cad 'khor zhing grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyis yid brtan du rung ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi kun spyod rab
102a2(mdo sde): tu rig par spyod pa'i rgyal po ni/ srun pa dang mi srun pa'i bye brag kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs la longs spyod 'du ba'i sgo'ang chad par mi bgyid pa'o/ /mi
102a3(mdo sde): bde ba bzod pa'i rgyal po ni/ rgyal po'i bgyi ba'ang rdzogs par sgrub la sdug bsngal gyis kyang mi 'jigs pa'o/ /chos la phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa ni/ khyad
102a4(mdo sde): par du 'gro ba'i lam yang sgrub la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag dang yang ma bral ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ yan lag bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ni/
102a5(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa lags so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ rgyal po'i chos de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i chos
102a6(mdo sde): kyi rgyal pos 'thab mo'i g.yul zhig nye bar gnas na/ ji ltar nan tan du bya/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dus gsum du thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam pa gsum
102a7(mdo sde): gyis nan tan du bgyi'o/ /de la dus gsum ni/ thog ma'i dus dang / bar gyi dus dang / tha ma'i dus so/ /de la thog ma'i dus kyi thabs mkhas pa ni/ gal te rgyal
102b1(mdo sde): bo'am/ blon po mdza' bar bgyi bas 'grub par gda' na'ang mdza' bar bgyi bas nye bar bzung ste 'thab mo de zhi bar bgyi'o/ /gal te phan gdags pa zhig gis 'grub pa
102b2(mdo sde): gda' na'ang phan gdags pas nye bar bzung ste 'thab mo de zhi bar bgyi'o/ /gal te phyogs mang po yongs su bzung ba dang / de bas lhag pa'i dgrar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa
102b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa bstan pas 'grub par gda' na'ang de gnyis bstan pas nye bar bzung ste 'thab mo de zhi bar bgyi ste/ de ltar dus dang po la thabs mkhas pa sbyar bar
102b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |gal te de dag mdza' bar bgyi ba dang / phan gdags pa dang / 'jigs pa bstan pa gang gis kyang bsgo ste ma btub na/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos sems
102b5(mdo sde): gsum nye bar bzhag ste 'thab mo bgyi'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ bdag chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yin na/ bdag gis skye rgu rnams phung bar byas par mi 'gyur grang / /phung
102b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba las ma bzlog pa lta'ang med dam zhes dang por skye rgu yongs su bskyang ba la sems nye bar gzhag par bgyi'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ phas kyi dgra las rgyal bar bgyi
102b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems so/ /gsum pa ni/ srog gzung ba'i sems te/ sems gsum po 'di dag nye bar bzhag la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba la bka' stsal bar bgyi ste/ de
103a1(mdo sde): ltar dus bar ma la thabs mkhas pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /dus tha ma la ni/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa de dag dpa' ba tha ma dang / dpa'
103a2(mdo sde): ba 'bring dang / dpa' ba rab kyi tshul du g.yul bsham par bgyi'o/ /de la dpa' ba tha ma rnams ni/ thog mar bsham mo/ /dpa' ba 'bring rnams ni/ de'i rgyab tu bsham
103a3(mdo sde): mo| |rta pa'i tshogs ni/ de gnyis ka'i rgyab rgyab nas dgye'o/ /rgyal po bdag ni/ de dag bag dro zhing bde bar rgal ba dang / rkang thang ba rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i
103a4(mdo sde): phyir dpa' ba'i rab rnams dang / de'i phyi bzhin bsdad par bgyi'o/ /de ltar bgyis na/ de dag chu gang dang / 'jigs pa dang / spyan mnyes par bgyi ba dang / rgyab
103a5(mdo sde): rnams rnam par dag pa dang / byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba'i slad du rdo ci thogs kyis rgal zhing slar mi ldog ste/ de ltar tha ma'i dus la thabs mkhas pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de
103a6(mdo sde): ltar thabs mkhas shing g.yul legs par shom pa'i rgyal pos ni/ pha rol gyi dpung bkum mam/ rma phyung yang des rgyal po la kha na ma tho ba chung zhing bsod nams ma
103a7(mdo sde): lags pa chung ba dang / 'bras bu myong ba'ang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des snying rje ba dang / yongs su mi gtang ba'i sems kyis las de
103b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i slad du'o/ /gang des skye rgu yongs su bskyang ba dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / rigs kyi don du bdag dang / longs spyod yongs su btang ste las de
103b2(mdo sde): bgyis pas/ gzhi de las bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa'ang rab tu 'phel lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'thab mo'i g.yul zhig nye bar gnas na/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos
103b3(mdo sde): de ltar nan tan bgyi'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ de ltar skye rgu yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos 'du shes kyis gnas pa rnam pa du zhig gis gnas par bya/ smras
103b4(mdo sde): pa| rgyal po chen po/ brgyad kyis te/ skye rgu'i ris su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la bu'i 'du shes dang / mi srun pa rnams la nad pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba
103b5(mdo sde): rnams la snying rje'i 'du shes dang / bde ba rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / dgra rnams la de'i rgyus nyes pa'i 'du shes dang / mdza' bshes rnams la rjes su srung
103b6(mdo sde): ba'i 'du shes dang / longs spyod rnams la sman gyi 'du shes dang / bdag la bdag med pa'i 'du shes so/ /de la skye rgu'i ris su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la bu'i
103b7(mdo sde): 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni/ rgyal po de phas bu bcos pa ltar mi srun pa tshar gcad pa la 'jug kyang snying rje'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'o/ /mi srun pa rnams la nad pa'i 'du shes
104a1(mdo sde): kyis gnas pa ni/ sman pa ltar gnod pa la mi khro zhing skyon rab tu bsal ba'i slad du sbyor ba'o/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje'i
104a2(mdo sde): 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni/ gnod pa thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid pa dang / phan pa bsgrub pa'i slad du 'jug pa'o/ /bde ba rnams la dga' ba'i 'du
104a3(mdo sde): shes kyis gnas pa ni/ gzhan gyi nor dang / gzhan gyi yo byad la brnab sems dang / phrag dog gi sems mi skyed pa'o/ /dgra rnams la de'i rgyus nyes pa'i 'du
104a4(mdo sde): shes kyis gnas pa ni/ de'i rgyu yongs su spong zhing skye bo gzhan lta ci smos kyi/ dgra rnams dang yang mdza' bar bgyid pa'o/ /mdza' bshes rnams la rjes su
104a5(mdo sde): srung ba'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni/ mdza' ba brtan pa dang / thams cad dang mdza' ba'o/ /longs spyod rnams la sman gyi 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa
104a6(mdo sde): la log par g.yem pas yongs su mi spyod cing longs spyod rnams la ma chags par yongs su spyod pa'o/ /bdag la bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas pa ni/
104a7(mdo sde): chos don du gnyer zhing dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi drung du mchis te rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du bgyi ba la 'jug pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'du shes
104b1(mdo sde): kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas pa chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ skyes phul ba tsam gyis kyang phyag mdzod mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ chos dang mi ldan pas
104b2(mdo sde): ni| sgyu'i sbyor ba dang / g.yo'i rnam pa thams cad kyis bsgrubs kyang de ltar 'phel bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /'du shes kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas na /
104b3(mdo sde): tshes grangs dang / skar ma dang / bkra shis kyi las brtsams pa thams cad mthun par 'gyur te/ des na/ de la mi'am/ mi ma lags pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis
104b4(mdo sde): kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /'du shes kyis gnas pa brgyad po de dag gis gnas na/ char yang dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur te/ des de'i khams su lo
104b5(mdo sde): legs par 'gyur te/ mu ge'i dgon ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /lo tog chab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen ser ba dang / bye ba dang / ne tso dang / byi ba la sogs
104b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba lags so/ /gcan gzan mi srun pa rnams kyang nyung du 'gyur/ tshegs chung dus kyang de la gnod par sems pa'i dgra rnams rang rang gi las
104b7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i nyes pas phung zhing bas pa dang / ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po de ltar skye rgu skyong ba ni/ 'jig
105a1(mdo sde): rten na des pa rnams la nongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ lus zhig nas gum pa'i 'og tu'ang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i
105a2(mdo sde): nang du skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos la gus shing bag mchis dang / /skye rgu phan spyod yul 'khor ldan/ /gzhan gyi spyod pa rab rtog
105a3(mdo sde): shing / /gtsang la ma chags rgyal po rgyal/ /dpa' brtan brtson 'grus ldan gyur cing / /'jig rten bstan bcos bzo rtsal mkhas/ /brtson zhing mthar phyin
105a4(mdo sde): sgrub pa yi/ /rgyal po bde bar skye rgu skyong / /phan zhing brtson la nges smra ste/ /snying rje ldan zhing gzhan phan btson/ /skyon nam yon tan ldan rtogs na/ /skye rgu
105a5(mdo sde): phan pa'i rgyal po dga'/ /'bangs kyi tshogs rnams kun dga' zhing / /sbyin bgyid don spyod gzhan la snyoms/ /dpung dang bzhon pa legs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal
105a6(mdo sde): po rgyal srid yun ring skyong / /srog gcod spangs dang ma byin len/ /gzhan gyi mchis brang log smra dang / /phra ma dang ni ngag rtsub dang / /bkyal pa'i skyon dang chang
105a7(mdo sde): spangs te/ /'tsho dag mi yi rgyal srid rnams/ /spangs nas lha yi rgyal srid la/ /rgyal po gnas 'gyur de slad du/ /rgyal po tshul khrims bzang por mdzod/ /rgyal po'i
105b1(mdo sde): tshul gyi le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu ba'i bu bden smras dres pa'i lan btab pas mgu nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la
105b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze/ tshur shog /nga'i pho brang du 'dong / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze 'khor dang bcas pa ngas zan la 'bod do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / gcer
105b3(mdo sde): bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ legs so legs so/ /dus la bab par gsungs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal
105b4(mdo sde): po chen po/ bdag cag ni/ bshul na dub cing bkres pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang
105b5(mdo sde): gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra 'khor dang bcas te mdun du bkye nas pho brang bkod pa chen por phyin to/ /der phyin pa dang / gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra rgyal po'i stan la bzhag go /
105b6(mdo sde): gcer bu pa'i lhag ma gzhan yang rkyen rkyen gyi stan la bkod de rim gro byas/ bla mar byas nas gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par rang gis lag dar te gcer bu pa'i bu
105b7(mdo sde): bden smra 'khor dang bcas pa la kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bdar te tshim par byas so/ /de ltar bdar bas tshim par byas te zan zos par shes nas brgya phrag stong ri ba'i gos
106a1(mdo sde): phrugs su bshams te bskon no/ /gos bskon nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra zas kyi bya ba byas nas sle'u gyu ste
106a2(mdo sde): lag pa bsnyal te rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ sbyin pa 'di mdzad pas khyod kyis thog ma nyid du ser sna bcom ste gtong ba'i
106a3(mdo sde): phyag mngon par brkyang bas med par lta ba ni/ bsal/ yang dag par lta ba ni/ mngon par phyung / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rjes ni/ bsnyags/ skyes bu ngan pa rnams ni/ yongs su spangs/ mtho
106a4(mdo sde): ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ phye/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni/ bcad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ bskyed/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ phyung / nyon mongs pa ni/ bsrabs/ dge ba'i rtsal

107b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur/ tha mar yang phyir skye ba ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces
107b2(mdo sde): bya ste/ gang zhig yang dag sdom rnams la/ /gus par dus su zas stsol ba/ /sems dang de ni phyi tshe la/ /gnas bdun yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /stobs dang tshe dang kha dog
107b3(mdo sde): dang / /bde ba dang ni spobs pa dang / /rtag tu bde 'gror skye bar 'gyur/ /tha mar yang srid ma mchis thob/ /gang gi slad du sbyin stsal ba/ /de yi don du de 'gyur te/ /bde
107b4(mdo sde): ba'i slad du sbyin stsal na/ /de ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /bsod nams rnam smin bde ba la/ /ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin 'grub/ /mi dang lhar ni skye ba'am/ /gzugs dang

107b6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams dang / /sdig pa spyod pa can rnams kyis/ /bsod nams legs par bgyis pa la/ /bar chad bgyi bar yong mi nus/ /bde 'gro dang ni nor rnyed dang / /yang
107b7(mdo sde): srid ma mchis gsum pa ste/ /gsum po de dag don gnyer zhing / /de slad sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ /bden smra mgron du bos pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de

113a1(mdo sde): 'dod ldan sems can gang / /de ni gum nas ngan song mchi/ /tshe 'dir srog chags yid mi mchi/ /de bas skyes bu mkhas pa yis/ /mi rigs

113a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa yin la/ de'ang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mchis so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ de gang / smras pa/
113a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ rgyal bu gzhon nu lha chen po 'di ni/ mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs pa lags na/ de'ang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/ /
113a5(mdo sde): smras pa| bram za/ rgyal bu gzhon nu lha chen po'i skyon gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rgyal bu gzhon nu lha chen po ni/ rgod cing ca co can ma zhi ba ste/ rgyal po chen
113a6(mdo sde): po| mkhas pas ni/ rgod par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ rgod pa ni/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos lags
113a7(mdo sde): pa dang / ngan song du mchi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i slad du'o/ /de bas na/ mkhas pas rgod par mi bgyi'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ rgod pa'i dri mar bcas pa'i sems/ /
113b1(mdo sde): mkhas pas bsngags pa ma lags te/ /sdug bsngal mthar phyin ting nge 'dzin/ /bsgrims kyang mi thob ga la thar/ /yon tan grags pa 'jig bgyid pa'i/ /rgod pa de slad spang bar
113b2(mdo sde): bgyi| |skyes bu don chen 'tshal ba la/ /'di dang gzhan du'ang de gnod 'gyur/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing
113b3(mdo sde): mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/ de'ang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mchis so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/
113b4(mdo sde): de gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni/ mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa lags na/ de'ang skyon
113b5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa lags so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi skyon gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ni/ shin
113b6(mdo sde): tu mang du za ba ste/ rgyal po chen po/ mkhas pas ni/ shin tu mang du za bar mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ shin tu mang du za ba ni/ le lo can du 'gyur/ lus
113b7(mdo sde): lci bar 'gyur/ de'i kha zas bde bar 'ju bar mi 'gyur/ tshe 'di dang pha rol gyi don rnams kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ /skyes bu
114a1(mdo sde): gang zhig mang za ba/ /de ni lus lci le lo can/ /'di dang pha rol che yi don/ /nges par rab tu 'grib par 'gyur/ /de ni sad na'ang sdug bsngal
114a2(mdo sde): te| |nyal na'ang sdug bsngal gzhan gnod bgyid/ /de bas phan dang ran par bza'/ /zas kyi dus ni nges par bgyi/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten
114a3(mdo sde): 'di na sems can gang la la mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs par gyur pa yin la/ de'ang skyon dang bcas par gyur pa gzhan yang yod dam/ smras
114a4(mdo sde): pa| rgyal po chen po/ mchis so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ de gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyang mdzangs shing mkhas la brtags shing yid gzhungs la mos
114a5(mdo sde): pa che zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis la gtong ba dang ldan zhing mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa lags na/ khyod kyang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ nga'i skyon
114a6(mdo sde): gang yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod ni/ shin tu gtum mo/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ni/ shin tu khro'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ni/ shin tu brlang ngo / /rgyal po
114a7(mdo sde): chen po| khyod ni/ shin tu rtsub bo/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod ni/ shin tu gzu lums che'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ mkhas pas ni/ shin tu gtum par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i
114b1(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po shin tu gtum pa gang lags pa de la ni/ skye bo mang po mi dga' bar 'gyur ba lags te/ bdag gi pha
114b2(mdo sde): ma la'ang mi sdug pa lags na/ grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi gzhan la lta ci smos pa'i slad du ste/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta lags pas mkhas pas shin tu gtum
114b3(mdo sde): par mi bgyi'o/ rgyal po chen po/ mkhas pas ni/ phyi rjes ring du blta bar bgyi'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ rgyal po gang zhig gtum gyur la/ /khro dbang dgos
114b4(mdo sde): pa khyad gsod pa/ /de ni rang gi pha ma yang / /shin tu skyo bar bgyid pa lags/ /skye bo gzhan lta ci smos te/ /skad cig tsam yang ga la dga'/ /de bas mkhas pas nan
114b5(mdo sde): tan du| |khro ba yongs su spang bar bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis mngon sum du bdag la mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu thos nas khros 'khrugs te yid ma
114b6(mdo sde): rangs shing tshig pa za bar gyur nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bden smra/ khyod kyis 'khor 'di lta bu'i mdun du nga la de skad kyi mi snyan pa bya'am/
114b7(mdo sde): de bas na/ khyod ni/ gsad par 'os pa'o/ /zhes byas nas des khros pa'i sems kyis dge sbyong 'di ni/ rgyal po la ngan du smra ba yin gyi/ sod cig /ces tshig phyung bar
115a1(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra 'jigs shing skrag ste rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de
115a2(mdo sde): ltar gzu lums ma mdzad par rgyal po chen po bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ gsol ba 'di'ang gsan du gsol/ smras pa/ bden smra/ mi 'jigs
115a3(mdo sde): pa sbyin gyi/ ci gsol smros shig /smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag kyang skyon dang bcas pa lags so/ /smras pa/ khyod kyi skyon gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen
115a4(mdo sde): po| khyod de ltar gtum pa/ de ltar khro ba/ de ltar zhe sdang ba/ de ltar gzu lums can gyi spyan sngar bdag 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba ni/ bdag
115a5(mdo sde): kyang ha cang ngor ro bar smra ba lags te/ bdag ni/ de kho na smra bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ mkhas pas ni/ dus thams cad du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
115a6(mdo sde): smra bar mi bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ mkhas pas ni/ dus dang dus ma lags pa dang / yul dang yul ma lags pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na /
115a7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ yang dag par smra ba ni/ 'jig rten yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ des pa rnams kyis mi bsngags shing glen pa'i skye bo rnams zhe sdang bar
115b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ gang zhig yang dag smra bgyid cing / /smra dus dus min ma 'tshal ba/ /de ni mkhas pas smad 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gzhan
115b2(mdo sde): lta ci zhig smos/ /de bas bden pa'i tshig lags kyang / /blo ldan kun tu smra mi bgyi/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni 'di lta bur/ /bden smras rang la gnod par gyur/ /yon tan dang
115b3(mdo sde): skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra'i legs par bshad pas mgu ste rjes su yi
115b4(mdo sde): rang nas yang dri ba gzhan dag dris so/ /bram ze/ yang sems can gyi ris kyi 'jig rten 'di na sems can gang la la mkhas shing mdzangs la brtags shing yid gzhungs la/
115b5(mdo sde): tshul dang 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa'ang yin la/ de la skyon yang med pa de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mchis so/ /smras pa/ bram ze/ de gang /
115b6(mdo sde): smras pa| rgyal po chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ shAkya'i rgyal po chen po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bdag cag gi rig byed las 'byung ba bzhin du skyon ma
115b7(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ de ni/ rigs kyi che ba nyid kyis skyon gdags par mi nus te/ 'di ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su byung ba'o/ /de ni/ rgyud las smos nas skyon gdags
116a1(mdo sde): su mi nus te/ 'di ltar bu ram shing ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba'o/ /de ni/ lus kyi che ba nyid kyis kyang skyon gdags su mi nus te/ 'di ltar
116a2(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o/ /de ni/ chos dang bcas par skyon gdags su mi nus te/ 'di ltar tshul khrims dang / stobs
116a3(mdo sde): dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pas de'i slad du de ni/ skyon ma mchis pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gal te dge sbyong gau ta
116a4(mdo sde): ma de khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu ma byung na ni/ de rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po
116a5(mdo sde): che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang /
116a6(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che lags so/ /de la sras kyang stong tham pa mnga' bar 'gyur du
116a7(mdo sde): gdon mi 'tshal te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan
116b1(mdo sde): pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur du gor ma bkum mo/ /de ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gcig pu spyod pa'i dbang sgyur bar 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
116b2(mdo sde): 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal te/ des sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par bsngo ba ma mchis shing 'tshe ba ma mchis pa 'di nyid chad pa ma mchis shing mtshon gyis bda' ba ma mchis
116b3(mdo sde): la| chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal ba zhig na/ de khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu byung nas brtul zhugs
116b4(mdo sde): dang / dka' thub chen po brtsams te rgya shug gi 'bras bu'am/ til gyi 'brum bu'am/ 'bras kyi 'bru 'gas lo drug 'das par bgyis te byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas
116b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde dpung dang bcas pa rab tu pham par bgyis te sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bgyi ba dang / thob par bgyi ba dang / mthong bar
116b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / mngon du bgyi ba gang ci'ang rung ba de thams cad rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de dang mnyam
116b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can yang 'jig rten na ma mchis na/ de'i gong du phyin pa lta ga la mchis te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing zla gang yang ma mchis pa ste/ de'i
117a1(mdo sde): slad du de ni/ skyon ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ rigs dang / rgyud kyis 'dra ba ma

117a5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes/ /sems can med cing srog med chos/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi phun tshogs pa/ /drang srong lhung bar des bshad pas/ /de slad de la
117a6(mdo sde): skyon ma mchis/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye bram ze chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de mtshan gang dag dang ldan na/

118b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ste/ de'i slad du de skyon ma mchis pa lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ spyi bo gtsug tor mdzes pas rnam par brgyan/ /dbu skra mthon mthing
118b3(mdo sde): g.yas su 'khyil ba mnga'/ /rdzi ma ba'i 'dra ut+pal mchog gi spyan/ /de bas 'di na rgyal ba skyon ma mchis/ /tshangs pa ka la ping+ka mchog gi dbyangs/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar

118b5(mdo sde): rab de yis rab tu myur 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba'i ljags ni de dang ldan pas na/ /de bas 'di na rgyal ba skyon ma mchis/ /tshems kyi yon tan mnyam med mnyam pa ste/ /de yi tshems

118b7(mdo sde): mtshungs med thal god shin tu rgyas dang ldan/ /dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing mdzes par ldan/ /dpal ldan shing ltar chu zheng gab pa'i sku/ /dpe legs sku ni yangs shing rkyen du
119a1(mdo sde): 'bab| |yid can kun la sdug pa'i sku yang mnga'/ /thub pa dpa' bo mtho ba bdun dang ldan/ /pags pa'i mdog ni gser mchog bcom
119a2(mdo sde): 'dra| |shin tu 'jam sku spu ni gyen du 'khyil/ /sdug cing mi srab mthon mthing dri med dbu/ /spu 'jam g.yas su 'khyil dang ldan pa ste/ /de bas bde gshegs mnyam

119a6(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po zhabs mthil shin tu gnas/ /des ni sa la mi g.yo'i skur bzhud de/ /'di ni drang srong chen po'i mtshan gyi tshogs/ /de yis brgyan sku shin tu mdzes par
119a7(mdo sde): gda'| |mnyam med 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /skar tshogs mang dbus zla ba gnas pa bzhin/ /skyes bu chen po'i sku mchog gzugs de yang / /'gro ba kun tu de
119b1(mdo sde): bzhin shin tu gda'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan dri med chos/ /gang lags de kun thub pa nyid gsung grang / smras pa/ bram ze/ ci'i phyir na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de
119b2(mdo sde): bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhes bya/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i slad du don 'di nyid rab tu bsgrub pa'i slad du dpe gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/
119b3(mdo sde): gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can skye gnas bzhis yongs su zin pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtags
119b4(mdo sde): pa nye bar bzung ste mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob pa de dag re re zhing 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod
119b5(mdo sde): n ams dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa brgya 'gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la spu'i
119b6(mdo sde): khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub ste/ de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re yongs su grub bo/ /spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa brgya 'gyur du
119b7(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la dpe byad bzang po gcig mngon par 'grub ste/ de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re yongs su 'grub bo/ /dpe byad
120a1(mdo sde): b zang po thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa brgya gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku
120a2(mdo sde): la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par 'grub ste/ de bzhin du mtshan sum cu re re nas yongs su 'grub bo/ /mtshan sum cur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
120a3(mdo sde): po ji snyed pa brgya 'gyur du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo/ /dbu
120a4(mdo sde): gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de las bye ba phrag 'bum du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos kyi dung mngon par 'grub ste/ chos kyi dung de dang ldan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma de bzhed na/
120a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can du bsdus pa'i sems can gang dag gnas pa
120a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis gal te rnam pa sna tshogs su smras pa dge sbyong gau ta ma la dus gcig tu dri ba dris te/ gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pas mi 'dri bar so so
120a7(mdo sde): n as dris kyang de dag thams cad dge sbyong gau ta ma des sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bzung zhing gsung gcig gis sems can de dag gis ji
120b1(mdo sde): skad du dris pa'i dri ba de dag gi lan glon zhing sems can de dag gis kyang rang rang gi skad du 'tshal bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i slad du dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ bsod
120b2(mdo sde): nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi gsung dang ldan pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pas na//
120b3(mdo sde): lhar bcas 'jig rten nang na bsod nams gter/ /mthong dang thos dang bzhad pa mdzad pas kyang / /sems can kun la phan pa mdzad pa lags/ /'di ltar sems can kun
120b4(mdo sde): gyis nges pa'i tshig / mang po dag gis dus gcig zhu zhus na/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig la thugs chud nas/ /gsung dbyangs gcig gis so sor lan yang 'debs/ /de lta
120b5(mdo sde): bas na 'dren pa 'jig rten na/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs gsung sgrog mkhyen par mdzod/ /de ni lha mi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba mdzad/ /
120b6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gcer bu pa'i bu bde na smra la tshigs su bcad de dris pa/ gang rnams khyod kyis sngar bshad de/ /dpe byad bzang po yod smras pa/ /thub
120b7(mdo sde): pa'i dpe bya bzang po gang / /bram ze chen po brjod par gyis/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / gcer pu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la tshigs su bcad de slar smras
121a1(mdo sde): pa| gang dag gis na thub pa de yi sku/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan brjod pa/ /bde gshegs dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams/ /bshad
121a2(mdo sde): par 'tshal gyi rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /sen mo mtho zhing sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/ /sen mo snum zhing phyag gi sor mo mnyam/ /sor mo zlum zhing sor mo rgyas pa ste/ /sor
121a3(mdo sde): mo rnams ni byin gyis phra ba lags/ /rtsa rnams mi mngon sgros ni bim pa 'dra/ /zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing long bu mi mngon lags/ /phyag gi ri mo byin gyis phra ba ste/ /ri
121a4(mdo sde): mo rnams ni zab cing shin tu gsal/ /ljags ni zangs mdog shin tu mnyen zhing 'jam/ /tshig rnams mi mngon phyag ni shin tu ring / /glang pos sgra bsgrags lta bu'i gsung
121a5(mdo sde): dad ldan/ /'brug sgra 'dra bar snyan pa'i 'jam dbyangs can/ /sku ni snyoms shing gsal la shin tu mkhregs/ /shin tu legs sku phyag gi sor mo snum/ /sku yi dngos po
121a6(mdo sde): shin tu gtsang dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i zla ba sku yis shin tu btsun/ /sku ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ /yan lag rab 'byes nag nog ma mchis sku/ /sku yi ro stod rgyas
121a7(mdo sde): yangs shin tu mkhregs/ /dpe byad bzang po rnams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /sku ni rim gyis rgyas shing shin tu mdzes/ /spyod pa gtsang ldan shin tu 'jam pa'i sku/ /lte ba'i khung bu
121b1(mdo sde): nag nog ma mchis la/ /yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu zab dang ldan/ /'od ni nag nog ma mchis yongs su dag /sku ni kun nas bzang zhing shin tu mkhregs/ /de ni kun nas bzang
121b2(mdo sde): dang shin tu ldan/ /mgon po'i sku ni blta bas chog mi myong / /bal glang 'dra bar brjid pa'i 'gros su gshegs/ /khyu mchog 'gros dang seng+ge ngang pa'i 'gros/ /gsung ni ha
121b3(mdo sde): cang mtho ba ma lags la/ /bzang ba'i sku mnga' 'jam zhing snum pa'i sku/ /phyal ni shin tu zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes/ /g.yas nas gshegs shing gshegs thabs mdzes
121b4(mdo sde): la bzang / /shin tu phyang nger gnas pa'i phyal dang ldan/ /'dod dang 'jigs med nag nog med pa'i sku/ /smin ma nag cing shin tu gzangs ring mdzes/ /phyal ni ma zhom spyan gyi
121b5(mdo sde): dkyus kyang ring / /zhal ni rab legs gtsang ma'i spyan dang ldan/ /dri med spyan mnga' spyan ni shin tu yangs/ /tshems kyi mche ba byin gyis gyen du 'phags/ /smin tshugs 'ja'
121b6(mdo sde): khugs 'dra zhing shangs dbyibs mtho/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang ldan/ /smin ma stug cing tshems kyi mche ba zlum/ /smin ma mnyam zhing 'dab chags 'brel dang
121b7(mdo sde): ldan| |snyan gnyis mnyam zhing tshems kyi mche ba rno/ /zhal gyi mkhur tshos skyon dang bral ba mnga'/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa skyon bag yong ma mchis/ /dpral ba'i dbyes la gnyer ma
122a1(mdo sde): mi mnga' zhing / /mgur ni dung 'dra mkhregs pa'i sku mnga' la/ /tshigs rnams sred med bu yi stobs dang ldan/ /yan lag dam pa dbu ni
122a2(mdo sde): gdugs dbyibs 'dra/ /dbu yi stod rnams lcang lo 'khyil dang ldan/ /dbu nag stug cing spos zhim dri dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i dbu skra gshor ba ma lags te/ /dbu skra ma
122a3(mdo sde): 'dzings shin tu mdzes pa'i sku/ /dbu skra stug cing legs par rim gyis gnas/ /dbu dang ba spu 'jam zhing phra la nag /dbu skra bung ba'i lto ltar nag dang ldan/ /mnyam
122a4(mdo sde): zhing khod snyoms dbu mchog chu rlabs 'dra/ /seng+ge khri dang nya dang rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu bum pa g.yung drung 'khyil/ /dpal gyi be'u dang dung dang pad+ma dang / /bkra
122a5(mdo sde): shis ldan rnams phyag zhabs mthil la mnga'/ /rgyal po chen po bzang mdzes 'di dag ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po'i mchog /dpe legs smos pa 'di
122a6(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni/ /mu stegs can mi gzhan la yong ma mchis/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni/ re zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i gzugs kyi che ba nyid de/ de ni/ sems
122a7(mdo sde): can thams cad la ma mchis pas de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa ste/ sems
122b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i byams pa de'ang ma chags la sgrib pa ma mchis shing rtag tu 'byung ste/ lhun gyis grub par rgyas par
122b2(mdo sde): 'gengs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ nor
122b3(mdo sde): bu rin po che chu 'dang ni/ rang bzhin gyis dag cing chab kyi rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du dge sbyong gau ta ma de'ang nang yongs su dag cing
122b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bar mdzad pa ste/ de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ dus rnams kun dang zhing
122b5(mdo sde): kun dang / /'jig rten byams pas khyab par mdzad/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa yang / /khyab mdzad kun mkhyen byams dang ldan/ /zla med thub pa'i byams pa yis/ /ma khyab
122b6(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' ma mchis te/ /khams dang bsam pa rnams kyang khyab/ /de bas kun mkhyen skyon ma mchis/ /dper na nor bu chu 'dang ba/ /shin tu rnam dag chab dang bgyid/ /de bzhin
122b7(mdo sde): drang srong thugs dag pa/ /skye bo'i rnyog pa dang bar mdzad/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags te/
123a1(mdo sde): rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun par zhugs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa gzigs na sems can
123a2(mdo sde): rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / ma rig pa chen po sgo nga'i sbubs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa gzigs na sems can rnams la dge
123a3(mdo sde): sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / 'khor ba chen por lhung ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po
123a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / rtag tu g.yen spyo zhing ma zhi ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs
123a5(mdo sde): ba'i chu bo chen pos khyer ba'i sems can rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / g.yang sa
123a6(mdo sde): chen po nas lhung zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / lam ngan
123a7(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i sems can 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs pa
123b1(mdo sde): chen po'i bcing bas bcings pa/ rtag tu dkri bas dkris pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / yun
123b2(mdo sde): ring por yul gyis dgang dka' zhing ngoms mi shes pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / sred pas
123b3(mdo sde): 'khol cing rtag tu gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / rga shis yongs su mnar
123b4(mdo sde): zhing shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / nad sna tshogs mang pos yongs su mnar
123b5(mdo sde): zhing rtag tu nad par gyur pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / mi gsum rab tu 'bar zhing rtag tu
123b6(mdo sde): sreg pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / dman zhing yongs sum dag la 'khor ba rnam par 'phel
123b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / rtag tu skrag cing rtag tu yid skrag pa'i sems can dag gzigs
124a1(mdo sde): na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / ro bro ba chung ba la chags shing nyes dmigs ma mthong ba'i
124a2(mdo sde): sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / dregs pa sna tshogs mang pos smyos shing yun ring por gnyid kyis
124a3(mdo sde): log pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / dgon pa chen po'i lam du zhugs shing gsod pa rtag
124a4(mdo sde): tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / rtag tu gnod par gyur cing dus thams
124a5(mdo sde): cad du 'jug pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / ma rig pas long bar gyur cing rtag tu rab rib
124a6(mdo sde): kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur cing dru bu 'dzings
124a7(mdo sde): pa lta bur gyur la rtswa mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / gnod pa
124b1(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa dang bral ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / mi khom pa dang
124b2(mdo sde): ldan par gyur cing dal ba dang bral ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / the tshom can du gyur cing
124b3(mdo sde): log par lta bar zhugs pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / shing pa la gyi 'da' ba ltar gyur
124b4(mdo sde): cing lta ba sna tshogs la brten pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang sems phyin ci
124b5(mdo sde): log tu gyur cing mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis
124b6(mdo sde): pa la dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / khur gyis gzir cing
124b7(mdo sde): yun ring po nas dub ste sdug bsngal ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / mthu chung ba la brten
125a1(mdo sde): c ing snying po ma mchis pa snying por 'du shes pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug
125a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rtag tu nye bar nyon mongs pa dang ldan par gyur cing dri mas gos pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug
125a3(mdo sde): pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags kyis brlags shing yid zhum pa'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang /
125a4(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i zil gyis non cing rtag tu rnyed pa tshol ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po 'jug pa dang / mya
125a5(mdo sde): ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam pa mang pos gzir ba'i sems can dag gzigs na sems can rnams
125a6(mdo sde): la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs rje chen po skye ba ste/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dang ldan pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/ de'i slad
125a7(mdo sde): du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ gti mug mun pa mun nag gis rtag tu/ /sems ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i skye rgu dang / /'khor ba'i
125b1(mdo sde): btson rar chud pa rnam gzigs na/ /drang srong dam pa de ni thugs rje bskyed/ /rtag tu g.yon sbyor gyur dang rtag tu yang / /chu bo bzhi po dag gis khyer gyur cing / /'khor ba'i rgyun la
125b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzigs na stobs bcu mnga' ba thugs rje skye/ /g.yang chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/ /lam ngan zhugs pa'i sems can rnams gzigs
125b3(mdo sde): na| |thub pa thugs rjes zhi ba'i gnas dang ni/ /'phags pa'i rgyal po'i lam la 'god pa mdzad/ /bcings par gyur dang sred pas 'khol ba dang / /rtag tu yul la chags
125b4(mdo sde): dang rga ba dang / /'chi ba'i gting lhung sems can rnams gzigs na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos mnar ba dang / /me
125b5(mdo sde): gsum 'bar ba'i skye rgu 'di dag dang / /ngan song sas 'jigs pa rnams gzigs gyur na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /ro la brkam pa'i sems dang
125b6(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / /bag med rtag tu yul la chags pa dang / /srid pa'i dgon par nyon mongs sems can rnams/ /gzigs par gyur na rnam par grol bar mdzad/ /ma rig
125b7(mdo sde): ljongs shing rab rib khebs pa dang / /bal ba dza dang mun dza 'drar gyur dang / /zhe 'gras gyur ba'i sems can rnams gzigs na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /
126a1(mdo sde): 'khor bar bcings pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / /mi khom skyes pa'i skye rgu 'di dag dang / /log par lta bar lhung ba rnams gzigs na/ /stobs
126a2(mdo sde): bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /sdug bsngal bde dang mi sdug bsngal shes dang / /mi rtag rtag dang bdag ma mchis pa la/ /bdag du 'du shes 'khrul pa rnams gzigs
126a3(mdo sde): na| |stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /khur gyis non cing gzir bar gyur rnams dang / /de bzhin mthu chung brten pa'i byis pa dang / /rtag tu nyon mongs nyon
126a4(mdo sde): mongs rnams gzigs na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa'i yid ldan dang / /sred pa che zhing rtag tu yul brkam dang / /
126a5(mdo sde): srid pa'i 'dod chags rgya mtshor lhung ba rnams/ /gzigs nas rgyal ba'i thugs rje chen po skye/ /nad dang mya ngan rnams pa mang dag gis/ /shin tu gtses pa'i skye rgu nyon
126a6(mdo sde): mongs rnams/ /gzigs nas sdug bsngal ma lus bsal slad du/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs rje rab tu skye/ /thub pa'i thugs rje chen po rtag byung ste/ /de mi 'byung
126a7(mdo sde): ba nam yang srid mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam par gnas pa ste/ /de bas sangs rgyas de la skyon mi mnga'/ /rgyal po chen po/ mdor na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/
126b1(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
126b2(mdo sde): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa ste/ de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad
126b3(mdo sde): ces bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po mkhyen/ /yang dag spong bzhi mkhyen te zla ma mchis/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan spyod la de mnga' che/ /de ltar sems can rlabs
126b4(mdo sde): chen skyon ma mchis/ /'jig rten mgon gcig rdzu 'phrul rkang mnyam pas/ /so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol byon/ /drang srong chen po rig dang rnam grol mkhas thub
126b5(mdo sde): pa rnam dag sems can thabs mkhyen ldan/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la de dbang bsgyur/ /lhag mthong zhi gnas
126b6(mdo sde): gnyis la rnal 'byor pa/ /de bas de la nam yang skyon ma mchis/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen rgyan mchog ldan/ /yan lag brgyad ldan lam chu dri med bkrus/ /bde
126b7(mdo sde): zhing mi g.yo 'jigs dang gang bral ba'i/ /lam de nyid la 'gro ba sbyor bar mdzad/ /thub pa khyu mchog de dang gang 'dra ba'i/ /sems can 'jig rten 'di na 'ga' ma mchis//
127a1(mdo sde): thams cad zil gnon yon tan kun dang ldan/ /yon tan dbang phyug de la smad ma mchis/ /rgyal po chen po/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ stobs
127a2(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan pa'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gang / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ 'di na de bzhin gshegs
127a3(mdo sde): pa ni| gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/ gnas ma lags pa la'ang gnas ma lags par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
127a4(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
127a5(mdo sde): ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa rnams gnas dang / rigs dang / rnam par smin pa las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jig rten gyi khams
127a6(mdo sde): du ma pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa du ma dang / mos
127a7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen
127b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi
127b2(mdo sde): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
127b3(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa dang / rnam par dag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran zhing
127b4(mdo sde): tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rnam pa dang bcas pa dang / sa phyogs dang bcas pa dang / rgyu mtshan dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su
127b5(mdo sde): dran no| |de lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba las bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror skye ba rnams gzigs so/ /zag pa zad pas
127b6(mdo sde): zag pa med pa sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di ni/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
127b7(mdo sde): bcu pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa de stobs bcu mnga' zhes bgyi
128a1(mdo sde): ste| de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas ma lags/ /yang dag ji bzhin
128a2(mdo sde): de mkhyen te/ /dpa' bo chen po yang dag gsung / /de la skyon ni ma mchis so/ /de ni 'das pa'i dus la yang / /ma chags pa yi ye shes 'jug /da ltar byung dang ma
128a3(mdo sde): 'ongs la/ /de yi ye shes rmongs ma mchis/ /las dang las kyi rnam smin dang / /rgyu yi shes pa gang lags pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus par/ /'jig rten rnam
128a4(mdo sde): par 'dren pas mkhyen/ /du ma'i khams can 'jig rten dang / /sna tshogs khams can des mkhyen to/ /khams mkhyen tshul la mkhas pa ste/ /'jig rten gang
128a5(mdo sde): zag zla ma mchis/ /mos pa sna tshogs ldan pa dang / /de bzhin mos pa du ma can/ /'jig rten sgron ma des mkhyen te/ /yang dag ji bzhin gzhan du min/ /dbang
128a6(mdo sde): po rtul ba'ang rab tu mkhyen/ /de bzhin dbang po 'bring yang mkhyen/ /yongs smin dbang po des mkhyen te/ /dbang po tshogs la dbang phyug go /thams cad du ni 'gro
128a7(mdo sde): ba'i lam/ /yang dag ji bzhin des mkhyen te/ /mngon shes dbang po bsam gtan stobs/ /byang chub yan lag rnam thar mkhyen/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /
128b1(mdo sde): rnam par dgod pa'ang des mkhyen to/ /thogs med ye shes gzigs mnga' bas/ /de la thogs pa yong ma mchis/ /sngon tshe dpag tu med pa dag /rnam pa du mar des gzigs te//
128b2(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan gyi ma lus par/ /yang dag ji bzhin gzhan du min/ /de spyan dri ma ma mchis shing / /mi'i las shin tu 'das pa ste/ /sems can shi 'pho skye ba yang / /des ni
128b3(mdo sde): 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa ste/ /rnam par grol ba'ang rab tu mkhyen/ /zag med khams ni gang lags pa/ /de ni 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /sangs
128b4(mdo sde): rgyas mnga' chen sgyur ba yi/ /stobs bcu 'di dag mtshungs ma mchis/ /sems gcig la ni kun gnas kyang / /sems la rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /blang med dor ba med tshul
128b5(mdo sde): du| |lhun gyis grub par de dag 'byung / /sngar bskor 'khor lo'i shugs bzhin du/ /rtog pa mi mngar 'byung ba ste/ /sems can kun gyis rnam bsam pa/ /sems gcig
128b6(mdo sde): gis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /'on kyang sems dang sems can la/ /gnyis kyi blo ni mi 'byung ngo / /de bas sangs rgyas dbang sgyur la/ /skyon ni gang yang mi mnga' ste/ /chos rnams
128b7(mdo sde): kun la mkhas pa de/ /yon tan dpal ni kun las 'phags/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze chen po//
129a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma de mi 'jigs pa gang dag dang ldan pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
129a2(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag gang yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di la dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bdag nyid dam bcas na/ chos
129a3(mdo sde): 'di rnams khyod kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i
129a4(mdo sde): skye rgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs te/ rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs
129a5(mdo sde): pas bde ba brnyes shing mi 'jigs pa brnyes nas gnas te/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog la/ tshangs pa'i
129a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba bskor bar mdzad pa dang / nam de zag pa zad pa ste/
129a7(mdo sde): nga ni| zag pa zad do/ /zhes bdag nyid dam bcas na/ de la khyod kyis zag pa de dag ma zad do/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas
129b1(mdo sde): pa| dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs/ rgyu de yang dag
129b2(mdo sde): par rjes su ma gzigs pas bde ba brnyes shing mi 'jigs pa brnyes nas gnas te/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog
129b3(mdo sde): la| tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba bskor bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
129b4(mdo sde): pas gang dag par du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/
129b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs te/ rgyu de yang dag
129b6(mdo sde): par rjes su ma gzigs pas bde ba brnyes shing mi 'jigs pa brnyes nas gnas te/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog
129b7(mdo sde): la| tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba bskor bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
130a1(mdo sde): pas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang gsungs pa de bsten kyang yang dag par sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang
130a2(mdo sde): bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu
130a3(mdo sde): de yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs te/ rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs pas bde ba brnyes shing mi 'jigs pa brnyes nas gnas te/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam
130a4(mdo sde): 'cha' zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog la/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par
130a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du ma bskor ba bskor bar mdzad pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin
130a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni/ 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ de'i slad du de la skyon ma mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ nga dang mtshungs pa'i
130a7(mdo sde): sems can ni/ /'ga' med lhag pa ga la zhes/ /mi yi 'dren pa 'khor nang du/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog par mdzad/ /nga yi chos rnams sangs rgyas pa/ /de dag yang dag
130b1(mdo sde): gzhan du min/ /de gzigs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de/ /bsnyengs ba ma mnga' seng+ge bzhin/ /la la de la rgol 'gyur ba'i/ /rgyu ni yang dag mi gzigs te/ /rgyu yang gzigs
130b2(mdo sde): par ma gyur pas/ /'dren pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' sgrog /zag pa thams cad zad gyur te/ /nga yi sku la zag pa med/ /de phyir lhar bcas 'jig rten na/ /nga dang mtshungs pa
130b3(mdo sde): gang yang med/ /bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag /skye bo rnams la ngas bstan pa/ /de kun yang dag nyid du smras/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /nges par 'byin pa'i
130b4(mdo sde): chos gang dag / ngas sangs rgyas nas rab bstan pa/ /chos rnams de dag bsten byas nas/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba med/ /de 'dra dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen/ /de bzhin
130b5(mdo sde): gshegs pas bde brnyes pas/ /'jigs med bde ba brnyes gyur te/ /thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs/ /sus kyang bskor bar ma gyur ba'i/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor
130b6(mdo sde): lo rab tu bskor/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten dag na bskor mi nus/ /rgyal po chen po/ yang dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
130b7(mdo sde): pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan pa'o/ /smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gang yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po
131a1(mdo sde): chen po| de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba dang / ca cau mi mnga'
131a2(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga' ba dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ba dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms
131a3(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba dang / 'dun pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang / dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa
131a4(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye
131a5(mdo sde): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro
131a6(mdo sde): zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
131a7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i
131b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams te/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas de'i slad du de la skyon ma
131b2(mdo sde): mchis lags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas la ni 'khrul mi mnga'/ /ca co de bzhin mi mnga' ste/ /de yi dgongs pa nyams mi mnga'/ /de phyir kun mkhyen
131b3(mdo sde): skyon mi mnga'/ /tha dad 'du shes mi mnga' ste/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i thugs mi mnga'/ /so sor brtags pa'i btang snyoms te/ /'dun pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ /de yi
131b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtag tu 'bar/ /bsnyel ba mnga' ba ma lags te/ /shes rab dang ni rnam grol dang / /dbang po gzigs pa nyams mi mnga'/ /ye shes kyis kyang de mi
131b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs/ /de yi lus dang ngag yid las/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ /ye shes kyi ni rjes su 'brang / /ye shes 'bral ba ma mchis te/ /'das pa'i dus la thogs
131b6(mdo sde): ma mchis/ /ma 'ongs dus dang da ltar la'ang / /de yi ye shes thogs ma mchis/ /dge sbyong bdag nyid che ba yis/ /de yi yon tan 'di 'dra bas/ /'di las gzhan
131b7(mdo sde): yang tshad med pa/ /bdag gis bgrang bar rngo mi thogs/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa
132a1(mdo sde): de lta bu dag thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la
132a2(mdo sde): dad pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa skyes par gyur te ston pa'i 'du shes rnyed nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang / byang chub ston pa'i 'du shes dang /
132a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par sgrol ba'i 'du shes dang / yang dag par skul ba'i 'du shes dang / rjes su dran par byed pa'i 'du shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
132a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i 'du shes kyang thob par gyur to/ /des 'du shes yid la bya ba de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mu tig gi phreng ba 'bum ri ba dang / rin
132a5(mdo sde): thar med pa'i ras bcos bu phrugs su sbyar bas gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la chos kyi dgab ba'i phyir bskon no/ /'di skad kyi tshig tu brjod pa'ang ched du brjod de/ bden
132a6(mdo sde): smra| khyod kyis chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so/ /bden smra/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ thams cad
132a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mthun pa'i phyir rjes su mthun pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/
132b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba nas 'byung bar byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dag par byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ ser sna'i sgo glegs rnams
132b2(mdo sde): 'joms pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ gtong ba'i rnga rnams rdung bar byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ nga rgyal gyi ri rnams snyil bar byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos
132b3(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di ni/ sred pa'i rgya mtsho skem par byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ mi shes pa'i thibs po snang bar byed pa'o/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di ni/ sems
132b4(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dus dang tshod las mi 'da' ba'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 'di skad cas smras
132b5(mdo sde): so| |rgyal po chen po/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod lam ni/ gang yang rung sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis so/ /chos bstan
132b6(mdo sde): pa gang yang rung theg pa chen po dang mi mthun pa de gang yang ma mchis so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par mi sgrub pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /nyon mongs pa
132b7(mdo sde): thams cad zad par mi bgyid pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa mi ston pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa mi sgrub pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /
133a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi mthun pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba thams cad ni/
133a2(mdo sde): bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyis ka'i don yongs su grub par bgyid pa'o/ /gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras bstan pa 'di ni/ bshad pa'i tshe rgyal po
133a3(mdo sde): gtum po rab snang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dad pa thob par gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu bcu drug gi dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul zhes bya ba'i dad pa thob par gyur to/ /
133a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu khri brgyad stong gis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i pho brang de'i mi dang / gcer bu pa'i bu'i 'khor de'i
133a5(mdo sde): nang nas mi khri sum stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos gcer bu pa'i bu bden
133a6(mdo sde): smra la chos kyi dag pa pa'i phyir bskon te 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod par gyur te/ bdag cag gis 'di ltar rigs kyi bu bden smra mthong zhing rjes su mthun pa'i
133a7(mdo sde): chos bstan pa 'di thos pa ni/ /bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes brjod nas 'di skad kyi tshig kyang smras te/ /bden smra tshur spyon/ da bcom ldan 'das de
133b1(mdo sde): blta pa dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bzhud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ bdag cag nyid kyi skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so/ /bden smras smras pa /
133b2(mdo sde): kun kyang tshur shog /rgyal po dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ grong rdal gyi mi dang bcas/ yul gyi mi dang bcas/ 'khor gyi mi dang bcas par lhan cig
133b3(mdo sde): mthun par bgyis te bkod pa chen pos 'dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis grong khyer thams cad du dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du su
133b4(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba de'i chad pa ni/ gsad pa'o/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas grong gi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi bka'
133b5(mdo sde): de thos nas me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rnams thogs te/ grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal nas phyi rol tu thon te skyed
133b6(mdo sde): mos tshal du 'dong bar chas nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang la sdod cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra dang lhan cig /blon
133b7(mdo sde): po'i tshogs dang lhan cig / rgyal bu gzhon nu dang dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig /btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig /grong rdal ba'i mi dang yul gyi mi rnams dang lhan cig /
134a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi dang chab sgo ba rnams dang lhan cig tu thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing dpung gi bkod pa chen pos mdun du bdar nas gdugs
134a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag ni/ bsgrengs/ sil snyan bye ba 'bum dag ni/ bun long du byas/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dbyangs ni/ bsgrags/
134a3(mdo sde): rol mo'i spyad kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / khar dkrol dang / pheg gi sgra ni/ bsgrags/ rta dang glang po che rnams sgra ni/ 'byin/ bkra shis kyi bum pa gser
134a4(mdo sde): thag gis btags pa 'bum dag thogs pa rnams ni/ mdun du bkye/ glang po che'i shing rta pa rnams dang / rta'i shing rta pa rnams dang / srog chags 'bum phrag
134a5(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i rnam par rtse
134a6(mdo sde): ba chen pos rang gi skyed mos tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan
134a7(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra'ang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
134b1(mdo sde): nas lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing 'dug go / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gcer bu pa'i bu
134b2(mdo sde): bden smra bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gcer bu
134b3(mdo sde): pa'i bu bden smra 'di ci zhig 'dod de 'dir 'ongs snyam nas de ltar rnam par brtags te gcer bu pa'i bu bden smra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bden smra/ khyod ci zhig 'dod
134b4(mdo sde): de de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du 'ongs/ ci bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod dam/ chos nyan par 'dod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gcer bu pa'i bu bden smras tshe dang
134b5(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kho bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa ma yin/ chos nyan par 'dod pa'ang ma yin te/
134b6(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu| kho bo ni/ chos thams cad mi 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs mthong
134b7(mdo sde): ba ni| de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/
135a1(mdo sde): sa'i khams mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mthong ba ni/

135a3(mdo sde): mthong ba ma yin/ gang zag mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ ngar 'dzin pa mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ nga yir 'dzin
135a4(mdo sde): pa mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin/ mtshan ma mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtshan

135a7(mdo sde): mthong ba'o/ /mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /rna ba sgra la rnam par rig pa med par mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs
135b1(mdo sde): pa mthong ba'o/ /sna dri la 'pho ba med par mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /lce ro la rnam par shes par mi mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /
135b2(mdo sde): lus reg bya la reg par mi mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /yid chos la rnam par ma brtags par mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /
135b3(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bden smra/ de ltar mthong bas gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin na/ 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar blta bar bya/ bden smras smras pa/
135b4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rigs su mi blta'o/ /rus su mi blta'o/ /mtshan nyid du mi blta'o/ /mtshan nyid med par mi blta'o/ /chos su mi blta'o/ /chos ma yin
135b5(mdo sde): par mi blta'o/ /yang dag par mi blta'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin par mi blta'o/ /dmigs par mi blta'o/ /dmigs pa med par mi blta'o/ /yid la bya bar mi blta'o/ /
135b6(mdo sde): yid la bya ba med par mi blta'o/ /rtog par mi blta'o/ /mi rtog par mi blta'o/ /'dus byas su mi blta'o/ /'dus ma byas su mi blta'o/ /dngos po yod par mi blta'o//

136a1(mdo sde): blta'o| |rnam par shes par mi blta'o/ /nye bar len par mi blta'o/ /nye bar len pa med par mi blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ skye bar mi

137a2(mdo sde): pa| btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te kho bo la chos kyi 'du shes skye ba zhig yod dam/ chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes skye ba zhig yod na ni/ kho bo'ang bcom ldan 'das

137a4(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa'ang med la chos kyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus

138a3(mdo sde): cad ni| 'pho ba med pa ste/ 'gro ba med cing shi 'pho dang / skye ba med pa'o/ /smras pa/ bden smra/ de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong khyod ni/ skye'o/ /rga'o/ /

138a7(mdo sde): so legs so/ /bde na smras smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis don ni/ gang / rnam par nges pa ni/ gang yin pa mkhyen tam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/

139a7(mdo sde): chen po| gnas 'di thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /maud+gal gyi bu
139b1(mdo sde): chen po| 'on kyang mgo tsam zhig bstan gyi/ rigs kyi bu bden smra 'dis kha dog dang / gzugs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs kyis sems can ji snyed yongs su smin par

139b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /spyod pa'i gzugs kyis sems can gling bzhi pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

141b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ btsun pa 'od srung / chos thams cad de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin na/ de la ci'i phyir khyod bla na med pa
