148b1(mdo sde): ba'ang zhing der 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de yi sangs rgyas zhing mchog der/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung kun dpa' zhing mdzangs/ /rkang gnyis mchog de'i 'dus pa dang
148b2(mdo sde): por ni| |rgyal sras grags pa'i 'od ldan gang 'byung ba/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog /rnam dag gang+gA'i rdul bas mang ba 'byung / /blo bzang ldan
148b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ /skye ba gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad cu 'byung / /'dus pa gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mchog /dkrigs phrag drug cu dag ni 'byung
148b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs de'i tshe yi tshad 'gyur ba/ /bskal pa bar ma drug cu tshang ba ste/ /rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i chos kyi
148b5(mdo sde): sgron ma yang / /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu tham par gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi sku gdung ring bsrel rgyas mdzad cing / /de ni gdul
148b6(mdo sde): ba rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur/ /drang srong che de byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas mya ngan 'da'/ /'di ni bkod chen zhes bya'i thub dbang 'gyur/ /
148b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra las rgyal bar 'di 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste/ /'jig rten phan par mdzad pa 'di bzhin no/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri med
149a1(mdo sde): pa| |rab zhi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur/ /nga yi mkhyen pa de 'dra nam mkha'i tshad/ /bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes/ /
149a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i los shes da ltar ci zhig sems/ /ye shes kun tu thogs pa med pa mnga'/ /nga yi tshig ni dag cing rdzun med de/ /rdzun du mi smra don dam bden pa la/ /nga gnas
149a3(mdo sde): nas ni nam yang mi smra'o/ /ji skad gsungs pa 'di la yid ches gyis/ /drang srong chen po'i gsung 'di thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur te/ /
149a4(mdo sde): de tshe khams der skye bar shog cig ces/ /zhing mchog der skyes dad pas smon lam btab/ /'jig rten khams mchog der ni skye 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de
149a5(mdo sde): dag lung bstan te/ /der ni khyed kyis bde gshegs thob gyur nas/ /kun kyang sems can don mang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde rgyal po 'di bstan de yi tshe/ /sa chen 'di yang
149a6(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+mar gnas pa dag /de tshe thal sbyar thub la 'di skad gsol/ /khyod kyis chos tshul dam pa 'di gsungs pa/ /thub
149a7(mdo sde): pa zla med rang bzhin shin tu legs/ /chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i chos 'tshal bdag cag 'dir mchis lags/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan
149b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs la rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas gos re re bzhag ste gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol
149b2(mdo sde): nas tshig 'di skad kyang smras te/ kye ma 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/ dang po ni/ grong khyer wA ra NA sir bskor to/ /chos kyi
149b3(mdo sde): 'khor lo gnyis pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos rin po che 'di dang mi
149b4(mdo sde): 'bral zhing skyes bu dam pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga chen po dag sgra mngon par 'byin par gyur
149b5(mdo sde): to| |lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du mngon par bab par gyur to/ /steng
149b6(mdo sde): gi bar snang la'ang lha rnams gyis lha'i gos dag g.yab mo thabs su bskor te tshig 'di skad kyang brjod par gyur to/ /skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
149b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal
150a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi
150a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam du bgyis shing 'chang ba
150a3(mdo sde): na bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
150a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can
150a5(mdo sde): gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig
150a6(mdo sde): y od pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
150a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro
150b1(mdo sde): byas| bla mar byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol
150b2(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags te/ 'di ltar bgrang ba'am/ brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
150b3(mdo sde): stsal pa| 'jam dpal/ de bas kyang gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/ glegs bam du bris
150b4(mdo sde): te 'chang ngam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung 'bog pa de bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
150b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad
150b6(mdo sde): du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring po ji srid cig tu dzam+bu'i gling na mchis par 'gyur lags/
150b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas gang gi tshe rgyal po brgyad kyis nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas
151a1(mdo sde): za ma tog brgyad du bcug ste rang rang gi yul du mchod rten gyi khang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras ni/ nga'i ring
151a2(mdo sde): b srel rnams las brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i za ma tog tu bcug ste rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol tu sa brkos nas ring bsrel la pog snod
151a3(mdo sde): kha gab bcad nas spos kyis ni/ bdugs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni/ btsugs/ rin po che'i me tog ni/ gtor/ lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me me
151a4(mdo sde): lce gcig tu 'bar ba ni/ bus shing / ring bsrel gyi za ma tog 'jog par 'gyur/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bsdad pa'i phyir mdo'i rgyal po 'di
151a5(mdo sde): gser gyi glegs bam la bris nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa de ni/ nga mya ngan las
151a6(mdo sde): 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni/ mo'u rgya'i rigs su skyes pa/ dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba/ mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ stobs kyi 'khor los
151a7(mdo sde): bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ de nga'i rnam pa las rjes su dran par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i bstan pa la yang dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dbang
151b1(mdo sde): po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal
151b2(mdo sde): po mya ngan med pas bkur ba grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir skye bo mang
151b3(mdo sde): pos yongs su bskor cing bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg thogs
151b4(mdo sde): t e rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas mchod pa'i cho ga mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas te sa'i phyogs de nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de phyung nas nyi ma
151b5(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du spos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / me tog phreng thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / sil snyan thams
151b6(mdo sde): cad dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs thams cad kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te skar ma dang / sbyor ba dang ldan pa gcig la yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal
151b7(mdo sde): pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe chos smra ba dbang po bde bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring bsrel gyi za ma tog nas phyung nas
152a1(mdo sde): byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang pos shes par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang
152a2(mdo sde): pos yongs su bzung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nyung ba dang / klog pa nyung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ rtag tu sgrom
152a3(mdo sde): du bcug pa dang / snod du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi rnam grangs
152a4(mdo sde): 'di ni| mos par dka' zhing yid ches par dka' la rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mun sprul du mngon par yid ches pa'am/ 'jug par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/
152a5(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la la dag gis thos te yid ches par gyur tam/ tshol lam rtog na/ de dag
152a6(mdo sde): ni| 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ legs par spyod pa spyad pa/ theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges par rig par
152a7(mdo sde): bya ste| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam/
152b1(mdo sde): du byas shing 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong bar gyur to/ /mnyes par byas so//
152b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas so/ /zhes bya ba dang / de dag gis ni/ nga'ang skyed mos tshal 'di na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa 'di'ang mthong ngo / /zhes
152b3(mdo sde): de ltar shes par bya'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di longs shig /zungs
152b4(mdo sde): shig / kun chub par gyis shig /dbang po rnon po rnams ma gtogs par gar bab bab kyi mdun du ma ston cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
152b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin pa dang / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen yin pa dang / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan pa
152b6(mdo sde): yin pa dang / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba sgom pa yin pa dang / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
152b7(mdo sde): pa'i gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo/ de bas na/ nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ chos kyi mdzod srung ba de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs
153a1(mdo sde): par 'di ni/ shin tu sba bar bya zhing su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam
153a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
153a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs
153a4(mdo sde): shig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar chad med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
153a5(mdo sde): pa'i yul zhes bya ba dang / theg pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
153a6(mdo sde): bden smra'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum cu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
153a7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa las sems skyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgu khris ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can tshad
153b1(mdo sde): med pa dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
153b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
153b3(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
153b4(mdo sde): yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i
153b5(mdo sde): spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi
153b6(mdo sde): lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru Na nir de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU
153b7(mdo sde): tra| bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang /
154a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i
154a2(mdo sde): ri sngon rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa/ sa'i snying po byang chub sems dpas mngon par bstod
154a3(mdo sde): pa/ chos kyi gdan/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba/ de bzhin gshegs
154a4(mdo sde): pa 'byung ba/ chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba/ yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul na
154a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ shin tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas
154a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs ni/ mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni/ brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni/ legs par mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol
154a7(mdo sde): tu phyin pa ni/ brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms pa la ni/ mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa
154b1(mdo sde): ni| rgyun mi chad cing dge slong stong phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ /bya ba byas pa/ byed
154b2(mdo sde): pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin
154b3(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo
154b4(mdo sde): la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin
154b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
154b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sprin las lhag mthong dang /
154b7(mdo sde): rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i glog phyung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems
155a1(mdo sde): sa dang mnyam pa/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo thog yang dag par 'phel
155a2(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun tu ston pa
155a3(mdo sde): dang / sems can gyi pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu skem pa dang / shes pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu
155a4(mdo sde): 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa
155a5(mdo sde): tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang 'phel ba kun tu ston pa/ ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam bas tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rin po che shin tu
155a6(mdo sde): brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi sgul cing 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu
155a7(mdo sde): bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin po/
155b1(mdo sde): ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi
155b2(mdo sde): mig dang ldan zhing chos zab mo la skrag pa med pas pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha' yas thug pa med
155b3(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
155b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa kun tu ston
155b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
155b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs
155b7(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po bsags pa'i
156a1(mdo sde): 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs
156a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes
156a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang
156a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom
156a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug bzhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
156a6(mdo sde): pa chen po de'ang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen
156a7(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156b1(mdo sde): po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gzud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos
156b2(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs
156b3(mdo sde): s o| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes
156b4(mdo sde): bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par
156b5(mdo sde): ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar
156b6(mdo sde): du 'khor gyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/
156b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim par byed pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon
157a1(mdo sde): pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba/ gzhi bai DUR+ya dkar po'i dbyibs dang / dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi khang
157a2(mdo sde): pa dag dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang / nor bu rin po che snying po'i kha khyer dag dang / rin po che dri ma
157a3(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dgab pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng
157a4(mdo sde): rab tu dpyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / lha'i dar gyi lda ldi mngon par dbyangs pas bsngags pa bstan pa dpag tu
157a5(mdo sde): med cing thug pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor gyi khyams de'ang tsan+dan sprul gyi snying pos
157a6(mdo sde): bskus pa/ tsan+dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ dri'i mchog a ga ru dam pa'i snying pos bdugs pa/ klu'i mu tig dang rin po
157a7(mdo sde): che'i me tog gis rnam par spras pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
157b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad na rgyan mdzes pa bgod pa ji snyed ba de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun tu snang ngo / /der gdan seng+ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig
157b2(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mtho ba/ rab tu bzang ba/ yangs pa/ rgya che ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ yid
157b3(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir them skas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad
157b4(mdo sde): phyed kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rin po che an+da rnyil dang / mthon kha chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can /
157b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i ne tso'am ci dang / rin po che ser pos spras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba kun tu bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams
157b6(mdo sde): la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/ drang pa/ ma yo ba bzhi stong byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du stong
157b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang de lta bu'i them skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ /
158a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma
158a2(mdo sde): thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te snang ba chen po'ang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
158a3(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig / nyan thos kyi tshigs dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du

158a7(mdo sde): khyu mchog tu gyur pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang / sangs rgyas
158b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

158b3(mdo sde): gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la
158b4(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi ma me dang nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul
158b5(mdo sde): pa yi lha 'od shin tu dri med pa/ /thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ /ri bo lhun po dang ni khor khor yug rtse mo
158b6(mdo sde): bsnyil te zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na/ /dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabs su mchi/ /de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i
158b7(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i
159a1(mdo sde): d bang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das

159a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas

159b6(mdo sde): mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na/ /chos kyi

160a1(mdo sde): pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha
160a2(mdo sde): r nams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom
160a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ /chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang / /thugs rje brnyes nas byams
160a4(mdo sde): pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa/ /gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba mtshungs par mkhyen/ /chos kyi khyad par sems
160a5(mdo sde): lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas
160a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom
160a7(mdo sde): l dan 'das them skas su zhugs pa dang 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mu tig gi do shal gyi
160b1(mdo sde): sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag
160b2(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi g.yos pa/ /mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

160b4(mdo sde): khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba/ /zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas/ /slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung

161a1(mdo sde): pos mchod gyur pa/ /bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs
161a2(mdo sde): pa| |shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing / /skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad+ma kha 'byed pa/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

161a4(mdo sde): pa lags/ /bdag cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/ /lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang

171a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying
171a5(mdo sde): p os chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams
171a6(mdo sde): rin po che bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng+ge'i khri 'phang du shin ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams
171a7(mdo sde): cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong
171b1(mdo sde): ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam
171b2(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhi
171b3(mdo sde): g shegs pa'i gdan seng+ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs
171b4(mdo sde): te gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/ /lha
171b5(mdo sde): dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa
171b6(mdo sde): 'di| |chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma bral/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing / /rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/ /mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni
171b7(mdo sde): rnam par sgrub pa ston/ /bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min/ rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/ /bkod pa thams cad 'dir
172a1(mdo sde): ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis/ /gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag
172a2(mdo sde): 'tshal ba/ /de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so/ /rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba/ /de ni sgyu ma'i rnam bar sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ /
172a3(mdo sde): sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang / /sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bstan/ /gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /
172a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi seng+ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis/ /gdus dang rgyal mtshan mchog dan dar gyi phreng ba bsgrengs/ /de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis/ /khyod
172a5(mdo sde): kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang / /sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs ston/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu bsrungs
172a6(mdo sde): pa'i gsung / /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang / /bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs/ /rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod
172a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos bshad gsol/ /khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du/ /rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags/ /gang gi don du lhags
172b1(mdo sde): pa'i don de stsal du gsol/ /seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams
172b2(mdo sde): cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas byang chub
172b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang /
172b4(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs
172b5(mdo sde): kyi phyag rgya'i skor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye she sla gzhol
172b6(mdo sde): ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul
172b7(mdo sde): gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa/ snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdu
173a1(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta
173a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/
173a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par
173a4(mdo sde): nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten
173a5(mdo sde): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo
173a6(mdo sde): gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la
173a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang / sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen
173b1(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi sang dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta
173b2(mdo sde): bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bsnyad pa dang / bshad pa dang / bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub
173b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tshom
173b4(mdo sde): thams cad gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
173b5(mdo sde): chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
173b6(mdo sde): s ems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs
173b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
174a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lda ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon
174a2(mdo sde): bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te me tog gi lda ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon
174a3(mdo sde): par 'thor ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams
174a4(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i drir byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer
174a5(mdo sde): dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs so/ /
174a6(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzum pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan
174a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzum par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha'
174b1(mdo sde): yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang / mos par byin gyis brlabs so/
174b2(mdo sde): /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
174b3(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos
174b4(mdo sde): t hams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub
174b5(mdo sde): kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems
174b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang / phyir rgol
174b7(mdo sde): ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
175a1(mdo sde): par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
175a2(mdo sde): r nam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji
175a3(mdo sde): snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur ba ring thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te 'khor gyi
175a4(mdo sde): k hyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lha'i mchod pa rnam pa
175a5(mdo sde): b rgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas
175a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ chos bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems
175a7(mdo sde): d pa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi su ga las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i
175b1(mdo sde): las mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do/ /
175b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag /legs so legs so/ /gang gi phyir khyed bdud
175b3(mdo sde): kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba'ang thob cig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /
175b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags
175b5(mdo sde): pa ni| mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'ang ye shes kyi stobs
175b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin
175b7(mdo sde): po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun
176a1(mdo sde): pa mun nag thams cad sel to/ /grogs po dag /de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal
176a2(mdo sde): nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa
176a3(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa
176a4(mdo sde): 'di ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /deng ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi
176a5(mdo sde): ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ e ma byang chub sems
176a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni/ che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i
176a7(mdo sde): ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma mchis pa/ rig pa dang rnam par grol bas snang bar
176b1(mdo sde): gyur pa| sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son
176b2(mdo sde): pa| thabs mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ bdud kyi las dang / rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i
176b3(mdo sde): tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis
176b4(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi rlabs thogs
176b5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad
176b6(mdo sde): kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / skad la mkhas
176b7(mdo sde): pa| mi'am ci dang / bya ka la ping+ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su
177a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ brtan zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo
177a2(mdo sde): zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu/ smon pa ma mchis
177a3(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar
177a4(mdo sde): gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs pa/ ded dpon chen po
177a5(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs
177a6(mdo sde): can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la
177a7(mdo sde): mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpa' ba/ bdud bzhi dang /
177b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
177b2(mdo sde): la snyoms par 'jug pa/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/ ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed
177b3(mdo sde): pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu
177b4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams
177b5(mdo sde): cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
177b6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin
177b7(mdo sde): par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang
178a1(mdo sde): dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
178a2(mdo sde): shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag
178a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i
178a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ sems can thams
178a5(mdo sde): cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
178a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
178a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/ nges
178b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/
178b2(mdo sde): theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
178b3(mdo sde): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu
178b4(mdo sde): 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang
178b5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang ston pa'i rngo mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag
178b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
178b7(mdo sde): pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni/ ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
179a1(mdo sde): sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
179a2(mdo sde): ste| dper na/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya bor nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang /
179a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni/
179a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
179a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni/ ring po mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
179a6(mdo sde): d pa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum
179a7(mdo sde): cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o// //de nas bcom ldan
179b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs
179b2(mdo sde): p a'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu
179b3(mdo sde): bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu de nas
179b4(mdo sde): t hams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan
179b5(mdo sde): brgyar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
179b6(mdo sde): d bang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
179b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / seng+ge'i khri dang / lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me/ lhang nge / lhan ne'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
180a1(mdo sde): g zungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la
180a2(mdo sde): g zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
180a3(mdo sde): gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni/ bai DUR+ya/ g.yogs ma ni| gser/ snying po ni/ rin po che ne
180a4(mdo sde): tso'am ci/ rtsibs ni/ an+da rnyil las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu dpyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba/
180a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
180a6(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi chad
180a7(mdo sde): par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can/ /don rnams ma
180b1(mdo sde): lus ston pa kun nas spyan/ /rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung / /zhal yang rnam par spyod
180b2(mdo sde): zhing 'od mdzad pa/ /'dren pa de ni bdag gi lus la yang / /lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na/ /gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran
180b3(mdo sde): pa dang / /blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs/ /rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag /bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu
180b4(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang / /spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs/ /sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen par dka' ba la/ /nyam chung dag
180b5(mdo sde): gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus/ /sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du/ /sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang / /
180b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gi 'byung ba dang / /snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang / /dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal/ /theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud
180b7(mdo sde): cing / /mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang / /gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/ de dag phan slad sangs rgyas la yang zhu/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu tshar
181a1(mdo sde): gcad cing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu gzung / /bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod/ /lus can rnams la bshad pa'i
181a2(mdo sde): dus 'di lags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas/ /bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud/ /bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpog pas/ /mkhas pa
181a3(mdo sde): yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen 'jug dang / /ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslab pa dang / /chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab brlabs pa/ /
181a4(mdo sde): 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan
181a5(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub
181a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod yul ni/ tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing / de
181a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
181b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/
181b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tshom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo
181b3(mdo sde): chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi mi gtong pa'i snying rje chen po dang / snying
181b4(mdo sde): rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
181b5(mdo sde): ngag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/
181b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba
181b7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
182a1(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil
182a2(mdo sde): 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang ba thob par 'gyur
182a3(mdo sde): b ar de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin tu rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad
182a4(mdo sde): du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu
182a5(mdo sde): dam pa| khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus
182a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod legs so/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs
182a7(mdo sde): shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs
182b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
182b2(mdo sde): pos bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu /
182b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan
182b4(mdo sde): dang / gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims
182b5(mdo sde): kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod
182b6(mdo sde): pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems
182b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di
183a1(mdo sde): lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
183a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum
183a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang
183a4(mdo sde): smon pa de yang dag par grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
183a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin/
183a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa sgyu med pa yin te/ lnga po 'di
183a7(mdo sde): dag go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid la chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims
183b1(mdo sde): kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa ma
183b2(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i
183b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te/ drug po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul
183b4(mdo sde): khrims kyi rgyan ni/ bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson
183b5(mdo sde): 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun
183b6(mdo sde): po 'di dag go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa
183b7(mdo sde): dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khyon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa
184a1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen
184a2(mdo sde): mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ dgu po 'di dag
184a3(mdo sde): ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsal ba yin/ bcings
184a4(mdo sde): pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cang shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
184a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyi rgyan
184a6(mdo sde): dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan
184a7(mdo sde): dang / bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin
184b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo
184b2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
184b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
184b4(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
184b5(mdo sde): thams cad la byams pa ste/ 'di ni/ gcig go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe
184b6(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ gsum po 'di dag
184b7(mdo sde): ste| gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / bcos ma med pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
185a1(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang
185a2(mdo sde): gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag
185a3(mdo sde): go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de
185a4(mdo sde): dag gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang gnyid dang / rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang / the tshom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag
185a5(mdo sde): spong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
185a6(mdo sde): pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste/
185a7(mdo sde): drug po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
185b1(mdo sde): mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson
185b2(mdo sde): 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang
185b3(mdo sde): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
185b4(mdo sde): gyi rgyan ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag
185b5(mdo sde): pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
185b6(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
185b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas
186a1(mdo sde): nas 'dod pa dag las dpen pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
186a2(mdo sde): dpen pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su
186a3(mdo sde): dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs
186a4(mdo sde): par byas te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags
186a5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas
186a6(mdo sde): te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang
186a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi ba rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams
186b1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas
186b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mtshed rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes
186b3(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas so/ /snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
186b4(mdo sde): dag par 'das te ci'ang med do snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par
186b5(mdo sde): 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag
186b6(mdo sde): p ar 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la sngon gyi byin
186b7(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par gnas/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ dgu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
187a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang /
187a2(mdo sde): zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang /
187a3(mdo sde): sems dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs
187a4(mdo sde): thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
187a5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
187a6(mdo sde): la the tshom med pa ste/ 'di ni/ gcig go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
187a7(mdo sde): 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ gsum po
187b1(mdo sde): 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag
187b2(mdo sde): go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes
187b3(mdo sde): pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyi rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go /rigs kyi
187b4(mdo sde): bu| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa
187b5(mdo sde): dang / shes rab mchog gis bsam gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa
187b6(mdo sde): dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas chos kyi phung po yongs
187b7(mdo sde): su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum
188a1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid
188a2(mdo sde): pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul
188a3(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag ca lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /
188a4(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nyes par smras pa'i tshig rnams
188a5(mdo sde): la khong khro ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa
188a6(mdo sde): dag la chos kyi sku la rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos
188a7(mdo sde): pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas bstan pa yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las sgrol bas blang ba med pa
188b1(mdo sde): dang / dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'gyur par shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag
188b2(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su
188b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas
188b4(mdo sde): gzungs yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
188b5(mdo sde): kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag
188b6(mdo sde): par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po
188b7(mdo sde): yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
189a1(mdo sde): nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
189a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa
189a3(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong dang mnyam pa
189a4(mdo sde): nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba
189a5(mdo sde): bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ dgu
189a6(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas
189a7(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang / rkyen nye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pas log pa
189b1(mdo sde): nyid du nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad
189b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
189b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtog
189b4(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan
189b5(mdo sde): lta bur shes pa dang / 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag ca lta bur shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i
189b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas
189b7(mdo sde): dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ /de la byang
190a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni/ gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ gcig ste/ gcig gang
190a2(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni/ gcig go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ gnyis po 'di dag ste/
190a3(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/
190a4(mdo sde): gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di
190a5(mdo sde): dag go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i tshig dang /
190a6(mdo sde): rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang / rdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
190a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye
190b1(mdo sde): shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten
190b2(mdo sde): thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ drug po 'di dag ste/
190b3(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig
190b4(mdo sde): dang / g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / snod la mkhas pas phyed par chos ston pa dang /
190b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang
190b6(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med
190b7(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
191a1(mdo sde): kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa dang / gnod
191a2(mdo sde): sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang / lto
191a3(mdo sde): 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs
191a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyan ni/ dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i
191a5(mdo sde): nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel zhi bstan pa shes pa dang / yang
191a6(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su mthun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa dang / mngon par chags pa rnams la sreg pa'i
191a7(mdo sde): bskal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
191b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blo'i chos skye ba'i sgo
191b2(mdo sde): dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa
191b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang /
191b4(mdo sde): dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang
191b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni/ bcu po 'di dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
191b6(mdo sde): gsungs so/ /gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa/ /blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog /shin tu rnam
191b7(mdo sde): des don dang de bzhin gzungs/ /de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing / /de yi rnam par ltung ba kun chad pa/ /'di ni tshul
192a1(mdo sde): khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no/ /lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa ste/ /de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub/ /nan tan snying por
192a2(mdo sde): byed dang yang dag ldan/ /'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no/ /de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te/ /shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong / /de yi mya
192a3(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa sgyu ma min/ /'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan/ /tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag /tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma
192a4(mdo sde): med| |de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa dag cing
192a5(mdo sde): de bzhin brtson 'grus dag / bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag /thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin/ /g.yo ba med cing brtan la shin
192a6(mdo sde): tu gnas/ /sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med/ /lhod pa spangs shing dgad sla gso yang sla/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /brtson
