192a7(mdo sde): 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste/ /de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/ /de la yid la chags par 'gyur med de/ /'di ni gang dag tshul
192b1(mdo sde): khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste/ /bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rab zhi/ /'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhad par 'gyur/ /'di ni gang
192b2(mdo sde): dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin/ /de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid/ /'dir ni rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed
192b3(mdo sde): pa| |'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /mkhas pa de ni dag gi rgyan thob ste/ /de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems
192b4(mdo sde): brgyan| |'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dge pa'i rgyan/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan/ /theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed/ /gang
192b5(mdo sde): phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas/ /rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan par byed/ /byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing / /byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed/ /
192b6(mdo sde): stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing / /nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan/ /de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed/ /mkhas pa rtag tu
192b7(mdo sde): drang dang mnyen pa yin/ /g.yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med/ /gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin/ /de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel/ /bag
193a1(mdo sde): yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug sgom/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste/ /mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan
193a2(mdo sde): byed| |rnal 'byor pa ni zhig nas nges sems sbyor/ /de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson/ /dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog /'phags pa'i rigs
193a3(mdo sde): la dbang ni sgyur ba yin/ /chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur/ /de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med/ /de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med/ /bden pa
193a4(mdo sde): snang ba yongs su shes pa shes/ /tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste/ /shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag /gnyis bsal nas ni rnam
193a5(mdo sde): par grol ba dag / lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag /dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags/ /'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag /
193a6(mdo sde): dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med/ /'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ /shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te/ /rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i
193a7(mdo sde): phyir| |bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams/ /'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te/ /gzugs
193b1(mdo sde): brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur
193b2(mdo sde): te| |mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang / /dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni brtson
193b3(mdo sde): 'grus brgyan gyur te/ /skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang / /de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni
193b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan brgyan gyur te/ /de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang / /mkhas pa mngon par shes pa skyed pa dang / /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyod/ /
193b5(mdo sde): shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de/ /shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing / /sems can chos dang de bzhin
193b6(mdo sde): zhing rnams sbyong / /dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug /yang dag spong pa rnams la gnyis med de/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben/ /sems
193b7(mdo sde): can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes/ /bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non/ /chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs/ /de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro
194a1(mdo sde): ba med| |'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ /de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes/ /de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas
194a2(mdo sde): te| |chos kyi phung po ci zhig phung po shes/ /khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes/ /des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes/ /rten pas bsags
194a3(mdo sde): pas chos rnams 'byung med de/ /don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes/ /tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes/ /dus gsum la ni chags
194a4(mdo sde): med ye shes 'jug / rnam par bzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes/ /'di ni gang dag shes rab
194a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rgyan/ /rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no/ /rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /'pho
194a6(mdo sde): med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do/ /'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste/ /rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu
194a7(mdo sde): ma 'dres shes/ /de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de rab shes/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med/ /shes
194b1(mdo sde): rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs par/ /brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed/ /de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med/ /chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed/ /
194b2(mdo sde): don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas/ /nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud/ /chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang / /rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang rdzun
194b3(mdo sde): med tshig / thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang / /mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed/ /nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes/ /gang zag med pa'i chos nyid
194b4(mdo sde): rton byed cing / /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan bar gyur pa yin/ /de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun/ /gzung bar 'os
194b5(mdo sde): dang dus su 'os pa yin/ /de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod/ /phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug /de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste/ /shugs can dang
194b6(mdo sde): ni myur dang rtag mi chags/ /rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig /legs par brgyus pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin/ /lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu
194b7(mdo sde): shes| |gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang / /mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes/ /'khor lhags shes nas pa gong
195a1(mdo sde): med pa ste/ /smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur ba'ang med/ /'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod/ /'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung
195a2(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snel zhi yi/ /gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun/ /nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston/ /yul mngon
195a3(mdo sde): chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste/ /theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang brjod/ /dogs pa kun gyi tha tshom gcod pa ste/ /blo yi chos rnams mngon sum
195a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos/ /yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes/ /don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te/ /'di ni sangs
195a5(mdo sde): rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes/ /rnam pa byang ba'i phan
195a6(mdo sde): yon thug pa med/ /de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes/ /sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste/ /
195a7(mdo sde): de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang / /bskal par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang / /yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so/ /bam po
195b1(mdo sde): gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ snang ba gang dag gis
195b2(mdo sde): s nang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams
195b3(mdo sde): gyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba
195b4(mdo sde): dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
195b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
195b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
195b7(mdo sde): ba ma byas pa gsog pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrog pa dang / mi dge ba'i
196a1(mdo sde): chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun
196a2(mdo sde): sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang / dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la
196a3(mdo sde): snang ba thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
196a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes
196a5(mdo sde): kyi blo gros yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / rigs pa'i blo gros yin
196a6(mdo sde): gyi 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros
196a7(mdo sde): yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can
196b1(mdo sde): la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
196b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs
196b3(mdo sde): te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par
196b4(mdo sde): rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snel zhi'i
196b5(mdo sde): rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'i tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
196b6(mdo sde): cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
196b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig
197a1(mdo sde): rtan pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /
197a2(mdo sde): lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag
197a3(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / glo bur gyi nyon
197a4(mdo sde): mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i
197a5(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
197a6(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad
197a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba
197b1(mdo sde): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes
197b2(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po
197b3(mdo sde): 'di dag go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa sgom pa gang
197b4(mdo sde): gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa
197b5(mdo sde): gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang /
197b6(mdo sde): bden pa sgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i
197b7(mdo sde): snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa sgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas
198a1(mdo sde): kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden
198a2(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang
198a3(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang / lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir
198a4(mdo sde): nges par rtog pa'i snang ba dang / sngon gyi gnas bskal ba grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems
198a5(mdo sde): la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i
198a6(mdo sde): snang ba dang / zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi
198a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
198b1(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni/ brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni/ dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe
198b2(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i snang ba dang /
198b3(mdo sde): sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par
198b4(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba
198b5(mdo sde): ni| dgu po 'di dag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pa ni/ /sngon chad las
198b6(mdo sde): dge bsags pa chud mi gzon/ /phra bar bsngo ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ /phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed/ /thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed pa med/ /rnam
198b7(mdo sde): par nges pa myur du thob par 'gyur/ /nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni sbas/ /dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral/ /dran pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags/ /bya
199a1(mdo sde): ba bya ba dag ni rnam par 'byed/ /dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni/ /rgyal ba rang byung dag gi byin gyis rlob/ /dam pa'i chos
199a2(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus/ /shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnam bral te/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/ /blo gros bzang
199a3(mdo sde): ldan snang ba thob gyur nas/ /dogs pa dang ni the tshom rnams kyang gcod/ /dran dang ldan pa rang byung ye shes kyis/ /byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed/ /
199a4(mdo sde): de ni don gyi blo gros can yin gyi/ /tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min/ /sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can/ /rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod
199a5(mdo sde): ma yin| |chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de/ /nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral/ /shes rab dang ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i byang
199a6(mdo sde): chub 'gal mi byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan/ /nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin/ /rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi/ /
199a7(mdo sde): de ni blo gros chung du 'dod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi/ /bdud kyi blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin/ /blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi/ /
199b1(mdo sde): sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min/ /chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni/ /the tshom med cing rtogs par khong du chud/ /de ni dgongs te gsungs la
199b2(mdo sde): mkhas 'gyur zhing / /sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan/ /so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan zhing / /de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med/ /rkyen byung
199b3(mdo sde): byed pa po dang rnam bral bar/ /rten pa'i chos rnams dag ni rab tu shes/ /de ni snrel zhi'i rgyu la mkhas gyur cing / /spyi'u tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud/ /
199b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud/ /'jig rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis/ /lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba shes/ /
199b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis/ /shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin/ /kha na ma thor bcas dang ma tho med/ /ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug/
199b6(mdo sde): lam ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu 'bras bu yod par chos ston to/ /zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi/ /chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug/
199b7(mdo sde): de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing / /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la/ /de yi shes pa rtag tu rab tu 'jug /
200a1(mdo sde): de ni de yis dri bral rab rib med/ /skyon med thob nas spyad pa rnams kyang spyod/ /rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /de yi
200a2(mdo sde): shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug / rang bzhin gyis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang / /kun nas nyon mongs pa yi tshul yang shes/ /ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur
200a3(mdo sde): pa ni| |skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes/ /'di 'dra 'di ni theg pa chen po la/ /chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin/ /de ni brgyad pa yi ni shes pa dang / /
200a4(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs la shes pa 'jug pa dang / /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yi shes pa dang / /phyir mi 'ong la shes pa 'jug pa dang / /de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang
200a5(mdo sde): rgyal dang / /'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag /kun la de yi shes dang sgrub pa rnams/ /lhag ma lus pa med par rab tu 'jug /gang gis
200a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / /'khrugs med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de la rab bsgoms smra ba dpa' bo rnams/ /bden pa'i snang ba
200a7(mdo sde): dag dang ldan pa yin/ /bden pa dag ni sgom pa byas pas na/ /skyon med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po thob/ /gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi pa dang / /
200b1(mdo sde): rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /sgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i stag /de dag bzod pa dag ni thob 'gyur dang / /gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang
200b2(mdo sde): rgya ba| |bden pa de dag lnga ni snang bar 'gyur/ /lha yi mig gis su ni de yis kyang / /gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong / /lha yi rna ba nges par rtogs pa
200b3(mdo sde): yis| |phyogs bcu dag gi sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi gnas shes pa yi snang ba yis/ /bskal pa khrag khrig dag ni rjes su dran/ /'od gsal ba yi
200b4(mdo sde): shes pa'i snang ba yis/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la mkhas/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi ni shes pa'i snang ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing ni khrag khrig rnams su 'gro/ /zag
200b5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin/ /bsod nams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas pa'i/ /mngon shes thog ma 'gro ba nye bar
200b6(mdo sde): 'gro/ /de yi shes pa chags pa med pa yis/ /'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni gcod par byed/ /nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dran dang blo gros rtogs
200b7(mdo sde): dang chos shes snang / /bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te/ /mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin/ /sgrub pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang / /rgya chen blo dang
201a1(mdo sde): spobs pa mtha' yas dang / /yang dag lta ba dang ni lhag mthong dang / /shin tu 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur/ /snang ba shin
201a2(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag pa brgyad/ /'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni/ /re zhig byang chub thob par ma gyur kyang / /de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
201a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug
201a4(mdo sde): gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /bcu drug gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du kyi
201a5(mdo sde): ma sems can 'di dag ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa/ lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/ lta ba thams cad spang pa'i phyir de dag la chos
201a6(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin
201a7(mdo sde): ci log tu gyur nas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug
201b1(mdo sde): par 'du shes pa dag ste/ phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
201b2(mdo sde): po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa/ dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa dag ste/ ngar
201b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /
201b4(mdo sde): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ sgrib pa lngas bsgribs te 'dod pa'i zug rdus zug pa/ khong khro ba mang ba/ rmugs pa dang gnyid la chags pa/ dam pa ma
201b5(mdo sde): yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/ zab mo'i chos la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/ sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du
201b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di ni/ skye mched drug gis chags pas chags te/ mig gis gzugs
201b7(mdo sde): rnams mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa yin/ rna bas sgra thos/ snas dri snams/ lces ro myangs/ lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg /yid
202a1(mdo sde): kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/ skye mched drug gis chags pa sdang
202a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ nga rgyal
202a3(mdo sde): dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log
202a4(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas chung du dag pas bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ /mtshungs pa dag pas ni/ bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag
202a5(mdo sde): la rlom sems su byed pa dang / ches che ba dag pas kyang bdag cag ches che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nas
202a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ ma thob par bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/ bdag cag ni/ 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems pa/
202a7(mdo sde): log pa'i lta ba la yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la
202b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ lam ngan par zhugs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dang ste/ lam ngan pa spang
202b2(mdo sde): zhing 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems
202b3(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni/ sred pa'i khol po chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la yongs su zhen pas spags pa/ rang dbang med pa/ bdag la mi dpon ba dag ste/ rang dbang yod
202b4(mdo sde): cing bdag la dbog par bya ba dang / gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying
202b5(mdo sde): rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ phan tshun mi 'phrod pa/ khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems mang ba dag ste/ khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang /
202b6(mdo sde): gnod sems spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di
202b7(mdo sde): dag ni| sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
203a1(mdo sde): zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang
203a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ brkam pa/ chags pas zil gyis non pa/ chog mi shes shing 'phags pa'i shes
203a3(mdo sde): rab kyi gnas pa dang bral ba dang ste/ chags pa spangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can
203a4(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med par lta zhing rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas
203a5(mdo sde): pa dag ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang / las dang / bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang
203a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / skye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog
203a7(mdo sde): dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag ste/ 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang / lta bar gyur pa
203b1(mdo sde): thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag
203b2(mdo sde): ni| 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba/ phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/ khams gsum thams cad las dbyung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan
203b3(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ bdud kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings
203b4(mdo sde): pa| g.yo ba dang | rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/ bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad las rnam par dgrol ba dang / g.yo dang / rlom sems spang
203b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir de dge la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ mya ngan las
203b6(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i sgo bcad cing ngan 'gro'i sgo phye ba dag ste/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo gcad pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam
203b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems
204a1(mdo sde): dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma 'dres pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ de
204a2(mdo sde): dag la brtson na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dag
204a3(mdo sde): gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang / bdag shes rab kyis sad par mthong nas shes rab kyis sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
204a4(mdo sde): dpa'i las ma 'dres pa dang po'o/ /sems can dag chung du la mos pa dang / bdag rgya chen po la mos par mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang
204a5(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa
204a6(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang / bdag 'tsho ba yongs su dag par mthong nas sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs
204a7(mdo sde): su dag par sbyor ba dang / sems can dag lta bar gyur par bying ba dang / bdag yang dag pa'i lta bar zhugs par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags
204b1(mdo sde): pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ma rig par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ba shags par mthong zhing bdag rig
204b2(mdo sde): p a'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu 'god
204b3(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems
204b4(mdo sde): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can dag ser sna can du gyur te kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / bdag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar
204b5(mdo sde): mthong nas sems can rnams bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag ngang tshul ngan pa can du gyur te sdom pa la mi gnas pa dang /
204b6(mdo sde): bdag tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas nas sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag gnod sems mang zhing khro
204b7(mdo sde): ba shas che ba dang / bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas pa
205a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag le lo can du gyur te brtson 'grus chug nab dang / bdag le lo med cing brtson
205a2(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang / bdag
205a3(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag ste bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la rab tu
205a4(mdo sde): 'god pa dang / sems can dag shes rab 'chal bar gyur te dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang / bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang bral bar
205a5(mdo sde): mthong nas sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang / gti mgu dang bral ba yang dag par shin tu 'jug pa dang / sems can dag rigs pa ma yin par lhung zhing
205a6(mdo sde): yang ba'i byed pa brtsams pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang /
205a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i las rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
205b1(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul par gyur pa dang / bdag nyon mos pa thams cad las log par mthong nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la rab
205b2(mdo sde): tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcing pas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su
205b3(mdo sde): mos pa dang ldan zhing dmigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mthong nas sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / dmigs
205b4(mdo sde): pa dang bral pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te byang ba ma yin pa dang / bdag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas sems can rnams
205b5(mdo sde): dul ba dang / spas pa dang / byang ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shes te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang / bdag
205b6(mdo sde): byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes te dge ba'i rtsa ba srung bar gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
205b7(mdo sde): chud mi gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang / bdag chu bo thams cad las yang dag
206a1(mdo sde): par 'das par mthong nas sems can rnams chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba la spyor ba dang / sems can dag bka'
206a2(mdo sde): blo mi bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / bdag bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin par mthong nas sems can rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun par
206a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag phongs pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang / bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge
206a4(mdo sde): ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dbul zhing
206a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang / bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob
206a6(mdo sde): par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag rtag tu na zhing khams rnam pa bzhi po'i sbrul gdug pas zin pa dang / bdag nad med cing bde la 'gyur
206a7(mdo sde): ba med par mthong nas sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu gtibs
206b1(mdo sde): shing ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang / bdag ye shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can
206b2(mdo sde): dag khams gsum la chags pas chags shing rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong zhing / bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la
206b3(mdo sde): mkhas par shes nas sems can rnams khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag g.yon phyogs kyi
206b4(mdo sde): lam du zhugs shing g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang / bdag g.yos phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam
206b5(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag lus dang srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang / bdag lus dang srog la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par
206b6(mdo sde): mthong nas sems can rnams lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
206b7(mdo sde): 'dun dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi
207a1(mdo sde): gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang / sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang / bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par
207a2(mdo sde): gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring du gnas shing /
207a3(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang / bdag rjes su dran pa drug ma btang bar mthong nas sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug sgom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /
207a4(mdo sde): sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams las dang
207a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag
207a6(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge
207a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i las sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byang
207b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul yin te/ de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/ /rigs
207b2(mdo sde): kyi bu| yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni/ tshad med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang
207b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'ang de snyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
207b4(mdo sde): khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi las gang
207b5(mdo sde): yin pa de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya
207b6(mdo sde): phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ni/
207b7(mdo sde): rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa
208a1(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
208a2(mdo sde): kyi las gang yin pa bas 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni/ phyin ci log
208a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las ni/ nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni/ phyin ci log med cing tshad
208a4(mdo sde): med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis
208a5(mdo sde): non to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yid rang sa shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
208a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
208a7(mdo sde): 'das| ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang /
208b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
208b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po/
208b3(mdo sde): 'jug /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni/ ji tsam/ rnam pa ni/ gang lags/ rtags ni/ gang lags/ mtshan ma ni/ gang lags/ gnas
208b4(mdo sde): ni| gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las ni/ ji ltar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni/ ji tsam/ rnam pa ni/ gang
208b5(mdo sde): lags| rtags ni/ gang lags/ mtshan ma ni/ gang lags/ gnas ni/ gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad
208b6(mdo sde): gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas mngon sum du bdag cag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol/
208b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
209a1(mdo sde): khyod de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs
209a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'phrin las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
209a3(mdo sde): rje chen po ni/ skye ba'ang med/ 'jug pa'ang med do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni/
209a4(mdo sde): rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni/ bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pas yang dag par bskyed pa ste/ 'jug pa'ang med/ log pa'ang med
209a5(mdo sde): do| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni/ ma btang ba/ sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
209a6(mdo sde): po de ni/ ji tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du tshad med/ de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de tsam du mi zad cing / de tsam du ring
209a7(mdo sde): du song ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go /byang
209b1(mdo sde): chub ji 'dra ba thugs rje chen po'ang de 'dra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med par
209b2(mdo sde): byang chub thob bo/ /de la rtsa ba ni/ gang / gnas ni/ gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni/ rtsa ba'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni/ gnas so/ /de gnyis ni/ de
209b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med par byang
209b4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag gis ni/ rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du ma chud pas de dag
209b5(mdo sde): gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi
209b6(mdo sde): ba'o| |de la zhi ba ni/ gang / nye bar zhi ba ni/ gang zhe na/ nang ni/ zhi ba'o/ /phyi ni/ nye bar zhi ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni/ bdag dang / bdag gis stong
209b7(mdo sde): ste| de ni/ de'i rang bzhin no/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni/ bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste/ de ni/ de'i rang bzhin no/ /mig stong par
210a1(mdo sde): yongs su shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /rna ba stong par yongs su shes nas sgra rnams
210a2(mdo sde): la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /sna stong par yongs su shes nas dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lce stong par yongs su
210a3(mdo sde): shes nas ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lus stong par yongs su shes nas reg bya rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes
210a4(mdo sde): bya'o| |yid stong par yongs su shes nas chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag gis ni/ zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba khong
210a5(mdo sde): du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go / rigs kyi bu/ sems rang bzhin
210a6(mdo sde): gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir byang chub rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ kun nas
210a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzhol ba/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam
210b1(mdo sde): pa ste| rang bzhin de ni/ shin tu 'od gsal ba nyid do/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas glo bur gyi nyon mongs
210b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
210b3(mdo sde): chen po 'jug go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o/ /de la blang ba med pa ni/ gang / dor ba med pa ni/ gang zhe na/ blang ba med
210b4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o/ /dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad mi 'dor ba'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang /
210b5(mdo sde): dor ba med par chu bor 'jug pa na/ ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang / pha rol med pa ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ltar rgal to/ /de ltar
210b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad pha rol med pa dang / pha rol dang bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
210b7(mdo sde): bya'o| |byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis ni/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams
211a1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o/ /

211a7(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni/ dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar na/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /

211b4(mdo sde): ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug

214a6(mdo sde): pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ngo / /stong pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du chos de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon

216b7(mdo sde): ba las shin tu 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang la rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya
217a1(mdo sde): pa ni| 'dus ma byas la mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /rnam pa dang / rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di'ang byis pa so so'i skye po rnams kyis
217a2(mdo sde): khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
217a3(mdo sde): ni| zag pa med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa'o/ /de la zag pa med pa'o/ gang / nye bar len pa med pa ni/ gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ zag
217a4(mdo sde): pa bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta
217a5(mdo sde): ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ nye bar len pa bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar 'dod pa'i nye bar len pa dang /
217a6(mdo sde): bral ba dang / lta ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang / bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin
217a7(mdo sde): pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de la nye bar len pa bzhi po 'di dag thams cad kyang ma rig pas mun par byas shing sred pas bsnyen te bdag go
217b1(mdo sde): snyam du mngon par zhen pas nye bar len pa dag go / de la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su shes nas bdag rnams par dag pas sems can
217b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par rtogs so/ /bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer
217b3(mdo sde): med do| |gnyis su med pa'i don gang yin pa de skye ba med do/ /skye ba dang 'gag pa med pas sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa rnams mi 'jug go /gang
217b4(mdo sde): la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa
217b5(mdo sde): gang yang med do/ /der tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo / /gang ma rig pa kun nas mi ldang ba de srid pa'i yan lag bcu
217b6(mdo sde): gnyis kun nas mi ldang ngo / /gang srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas ni ldang ba de mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de nges par gyur pa'o/ /gang nges par gyur pa de
217b7(mdo sde): nges pa'i don to/ /nges pa'i don gang yin pa de don dam pa'o/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de gang zag med pa'i don to/ /gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de
218a1(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i don to/ /brjod du med pa'i don gang yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
218a2(mdo sde): don gang yin pa de chos kyi don to/ /chos kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid kyi don to/ /de bzhin nyid kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to/ /
218a3(mdo sde): des na sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo / /sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /zhes bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin

218a5(mdo sde): tshe sems med pa dang / dmigs pa med par mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa mthong ngo / /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par

218b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ /de la dag pa ni/ gang / dri ma med pa ni/ gang / nyon mongs pa med pa ni/ gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni/ dag pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /smon
218b2(mdo sde): pa med pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /'byung ba med pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /

218b4(mdo sde): pa'o| |spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ nyon mongs

218b6(mdo sde): rol tu mi rgyu ba ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /nad dang phyi mi dmigs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /phung po yongs su shes pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dri ma
218b7(mdo sde): med pa'o/ skye mched 'dor ba ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /'das pa la zad par shes pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la mi skye bar shes pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /de

219a3(mdo sde): zhi ba'o| |nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de nye bar zhi bar byed pas mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de nye bar zhi ba'o/ /nye bar zhi ba gang yin

219a7(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gzod ma nas dag pa/ gzod ma nas dri ma med pa/ gzod ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
219b1(mdo sde): pas de lta bu'i tshul dang mthun par chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te ma dag pa dang / dri ma med pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas
219b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs nas sems can thams cad la rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go / de bzhin gshegs pa ni/

219b4(mdo sde): y ongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas des de bzhin gshegs
219b5(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas chos bshad du
219b6(mdo sde): gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab bo/ /de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsol to/ /khyod kyi
219b7(mdo sde): chos ni zhi zhing rab zhi la/ /dag cing rnam dag dri med 'od gsal te/ /brjod med sgra med yi ge med 'phags par/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni thugs su chud/ /yun
220a1(mdo sde): ring gnyid log gti mug rgyags pas bsgribs/ /nor pa'i sems can sad par mdzad don du/ /de skad khyod kyis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /

220b7(mdo sde): med pa dag btul bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos rnam par rol par rig nas sems can tshad med/ /grangs med pa dag gis byang chub tu
221a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po rnam pa bcu drug po 'di ni/ lhun gyis 'grub

221a3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su gnas par spro ste/ gal te sems can de dag 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'dul bar 'gyur ba lta
221a4(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yongs su mi skyo zhing / thugs rje chen po de'ang yongs su mi nyams so/ /de ltar sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

224b1(mdo sde): dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa de ltar gang dag sangs rgyas rnams la yon
224b2(mdo sde): 'bul ba de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du rgyun mi chad de/ rgyu chud mi za ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
224b3(mdo sde): rje chen po bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las sems can gang+ga'i'i klung gi bye ma'i sum cha snyed kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
224b4(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i phyed snyed kyis ni/ rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sams dpa' gang+gA'i
224b5(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ni/ snying rje chen po rnam pa bcu drug thob par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi bzod pa'ang
224b6(mdo sde): thob par gyur to/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid
224b7(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gsol te lha dang / mi'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod do/ /bam po bzhi
225a1(mdo sde): pa| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la
225a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i las gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las ni/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag go /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs
225a3(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes bla na med pas gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gnas ma yin pa la'ang
225a4(mdo sde): gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la gnas ni/ gang / gnas ma yin pa ni/ gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di
225a5(mdo sde): ni| gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / dag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes bar spyad pa'i rnam par
225a6(mdo sde): smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa ste/ gang
225a7(mdo sde): lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga'
225b1(mdo sde): ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par
225b2(mdo sde): 'grub pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang / gnod sems kyis mdzes par 'gyur ba dang / le los mngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang / sems
225b3(mdo sde): rnam par g.yeng pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa dang / gang 'chal ba'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms par 'gyur ba ni/
225b4(mdo sde): gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod pa ste/ gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub
225b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang / bzod pas mdzes par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grub kyis mngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang / bsam gtan
225b6(mdo sde): gyis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa dang / gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par 'joms pa 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs
225b7(mdo sde): yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang mtshams med pa byed pa sems gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang tshul khrims rnam par
226a1(mdo sde): dag pa'i sems gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ gang
226a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa can gyis rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /gang stong pa nyid la mos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni/
226a3(mdo sde): gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang 'gyod pa la rab tu gnas bas sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/
226a4(mdo sde): gnas med do/ /gang kun nas ldang ba med pa'i sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs
226a5(mdo sde): med de/ gang bud med lus de nyid kyis 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di ni/
226a6(mdo sde): gnas med do/ /'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/ gang bud med kyi lus brjes nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs
226a7(mdo sde): pa'am| sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mi mnyam
226b1(mdo sde): pas rgyal srid byed pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang mnyam pas byed pa 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang byang
226b2(mdo sde): gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi log par ltung bar 'gro ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /bde 'gror 'gro ba ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs
226b3(mdo sde): med de/ gang srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe ring bar 'gyur ba nas log par lta ba dag log par lta ba can log pa'i las yang dag par
226b4(mdo sde): blangs pa'i rgyas 'phags pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ba'i bar 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/ gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i
226b5(mdo sde): rgyus tshe ring par 'gyur ba nas yang dag par lta ba 'phags pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ba'i bar 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang brgyad
226b6(mdo sde): pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang 'bras bu thob nas ldang ba 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs
226b7(mdo sde): med do/ gang rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang re ltar thogs kyang srid pa bdun du 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas yin
227a1(mdo sde): no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang lan gcig phyir 'od ba srid pa gnyis pa mngon par 'grub pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /
227a2(mdo sde): gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par byed pa 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin
227a3(mdo sde): zhing go skabs med de/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'di ni/ gnas
227a4(mdo sde): yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang dgra bcom pa nyid mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang dgra
227a5(mdo sde): bcom pa la nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang 'phags pa'i gang zag
227a6(mdo sde): ston pa gzhan gyi lung nod pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang lha gzhan med pa 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang mi skye
227a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di
227b1(mdo sde): ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par ldang ba
227b2(mdo sde): 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ldang ba 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang de bzhin
227b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba 'di gnas med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom
227b4(mdo sde): pa 'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/ /gnas ma yin te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang
227b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar
227b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang
227b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyi rgyu ba shes pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang mi shes pa 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /gnas ma
228a1(mdo sde): yin te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa dmigs pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs
228a2(mdo sde): pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /'di ni/ gnas ma yin te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la log pa'i tshig 'byung ba 'di ni/ gnas
228a3(mdo sde): med do| |gang bden pa'i tshig 'byung ba 'di ni/ gnas yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa
228a4(mdo sde): dmigs pa 'di ni/ gnas med do/ /'di ni/ gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa 'di ni/ gnas yin
228a5(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yi ge rnams kyis tshad bstan du med de/ yang dag
228a6(mdo sde): pa'o| |de kho na'o/ /gzhan ma yin pa nyid do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sa kun 'grum par 'gyur yang srid/ /nam mkha' g.yo bar 'gyur srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas
228a7(mdo sde): gnas min bshad pa ni/ /gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/ /skyes bus kha dog lnga can du/ /nam mkha' gzugs su byed kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas gnas min bshad
228b1(mdo sde): pa ni| gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/ /tha ma dang ni 'bring dang mchog /gang dag sangs rgyas gnas bshad pa/ /de kun de bzhin bshad pa ste/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba
228b2(mdo sde): yod ma yin/ /tha ma dang ni 'bring dang mchog /gang dag gnas min bshad pa yang / /de kun de bzhin bshad pa ste/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /gnas
228b3(mdo sde): dang gnas min rab shes pa/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /des ni phyad par yang dag dang / /chos kyang srog chags rnams la bshad/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze
228b4(mdo sde): gzhan| |gang du thams cad rgyug byed cing / /gnas dang gnas min ma shes pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni de med do/ /gnas gang dang ni ldan pas na/ /sems can thar byed
228b5(mdo sde): dpung 'gyur ba/ /yon tan kun ldan sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ni yang dag rab tu bshad/ /sems can gang dag snod min gang / /de la sangs rgyas btang snyoms mdzad/ /
228b6(mdo sde): gang gi dus na 'grol 'gyur ba/ /de yi dus la rab tu gzhes/ /gang gis sems can thar byed pa/ /kha na ma tho med pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas blo mchog ldan pa yin//
228b7(mdo sde): 'phrin las dang po 'di yin no/ /gnas dang gnas min bshad pa ni/ /dpag tu med cing grangs med de/ /drang srong chen po'i stobs 'di ni/ /pha rol rgol pas thub par
229a1(mdo sde): dka'| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang / las len
229a2(mdo sde): pa rnams gnas dang / rgyu dang / dngos po dang / rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rigs kyi
229a3(mdo sde): bu| 'di la 'das pa'i las len pa gang dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ mi dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'byin pa de de bzhin
229a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'byin pa
229a5(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
229a6(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//
229a7(mdo sde): las len pa gang da ltar byung ba'i dus na dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
229b1(mdo sde): to| |las len pa gang da ltar byung ba'i dus na khyad par la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /
229b2(mdo sde): las len pa gang da ltar byung ba'i dus na'ang dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
229b3(mdo sde): t o| |las len pa gang da ltar byung ba'i dus na'ang khyad par la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang khyad par la brten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
229b4(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang 'das pa na sbyor ba dman la de ma 'das pa'i dus na rgya che zhing sbyor ba rgya che bar 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /
229b5(mdo sde): las len pa gang rtsom pa chud la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba dang / las len pa gang rtsom pa chen por gyur la khyad par chung dur 'gyur ba dang / las len pa gang
229b6(mdo sde): nyan thos nyid kyi rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab
229b7(mdo sde): tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar byung ba na sdug bsngal la
230a1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang / las len pa gang de ltar byung ba na bde la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug
230a2(mdo sde): bsngal par 'gyur ba dang / las len pa gang da ltar byung ba na sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na'ang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang / las len
230a3(mdo sde): pa gang da ltar byung ba na'ang bde la ma 'ongs pa na'ang rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar
230a4(mdo sde): na| 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams kyi las gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa gang yin
230a5(mdo sde): pa de de bzhin gshegs pas de kho na dang / gzhan ma yin pa la brten par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos
230a6(mdo sde): ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las gnyis pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu la mkhas pa
230a7(mdo sde): ste| |las kyi rnam smin tshul mkhyen spyan dang ldan/ /dus gsum dag la chags pa mi mnga' ste/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /rgyu ni gang zhig bde
230b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba ste/ /lha dang mi yi rnam par smin ldan dang / /gang yang sdug bsngal dag tu 'gyur byed pa/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge'i
230b2(mdo sde): las rnams kyi/ /rgyu dang rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab mkhyen te/ /nor bu rin chen phyag tu bzhag pa bzhin/ /las gang chung du'i rgyu las byung
230b3(mdo sde): gyur la/ /tshad med rgyu yang 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / /gang yang rgya che ba dang chung du yang / /de ni ji lta bzhin du sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /gang yang nyon thos kyi ni rgyu 'byin dang / /rkyen
230b4(mdo sde): gyi theg pa de bzhin 'byin pa dang / /gang yang rgyal ba'i rgyu ni 'byin 'gyur ba/ /de kun bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /rgyu ni gang zhig sdug bsngal 'gyur byed la/ /de
230b5(mdo sde): yang bde ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang / /rgyu ni gang zhig bde bar 'gyur byed la/ /de yang sdug bsngal dag tu 'gyur ba dang / /rgyu ni bde la sdug bsngal gnas pa dang / /rgyu yang
230b6(mdo sde): bde la bde bar gnas pa dang / /las kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid ni/ /rgyu dang mthun par bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /dus gsum dag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /rgyu gang
230b7(mdo sde): las 'jug byed dang las kyang ni/ /gzhan ma yin par sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ /de bzhin rgyal bas phyed par rab tu mkhyen/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
231a1(mdo sde): pas sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
231a2(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs yang
231a3(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ gang zag gang 'dod chags sa gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa dang / gang zag gang zhe sdang la gnas shing
231a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags la mos pa dang / gang zag gang gti mug la gnas shing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mos pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs
231a5(mdo sde): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang dge ba la gnas shing dge ba la mos pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang dag sbyor ba dman
231a6(mdo sde): zhing bsam pa rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang dag sbyor ba rgya chen zhing bsam pa dman pa la mos pa
231a7(mdo sde): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la ngas par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis sbyor ba khyad
231b1(mdo sde): par du 'phags shing dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis log pa nyid du nges la nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis ma
231b2(mdo sde): nges la yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges la rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin
231b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis
231b4(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs
231b5(mdo sde): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis dman pa la brten cing khyad par gnon par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis khyad par du gyur nas kyang dman pa la gnas
231b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa tha dad pa
231b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa gang gis rnam par
232a1(mdo sde): grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
232a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las gsum pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs mos pa du mar blo gros tshad med pa/ /de yi
232a3(mdo sde): mos pa de bzhin gshegs pas lhag ma ma lus mkhyen par gyur/ /'di na gang gis mos pa zhe sdang rgyus byung 'dod chags gnas pa dang / /zhe sdang gnas shing gti
232a4(mdo sde): mug mos pa sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /gti mug gnas pa'i sems ni dge dang 'dod chags la yang 'jug pa dang / /de 'og gang 'jug pa dang sems can
232a5(mdo sde): sbyor ba dman la rgya chen mos/ /bsam pa rgya che ba dang gang dag sbyor ba rgya chen yod kyang ni/ /mos pa dman par gyur pa de yang bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /mos
232a6(mdo sde): pa gang gis sems can sbyor ba dman la rgya cher 'gyur ba dang / /sems can blo gros rgya chen 'gyur la dman par 'gyur ba de yang mkhyen/ /log pa nyid du gang nges
232a7(mdo sde): pa yang yang dag nyid du nges 'gyur dang / /khams gsum pa las rnam par grol ba'i mos pa'ang sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen/ /dus gsum thams cad dag gi sems can
232b1(mdo sde): kun gyi skye dang kha dog dang / /de bzhin yongs spyod tha dad pa dang rtse mo las ni nyams 'gyur dang / /gang yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i mos pa rgyal bas thams cad
232b2(mdo sde): mkhyen| |mkhyen nas chos ston mdzad pa 'di yong bde gshegs 'phrin las yin zhes gsungs/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang /
232b3(mdo sde): khams sna tshogs can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed
232b4(mdo sde): gsog pa'i khams de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed gsog pa
232b5(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed gsog pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis
232b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i khams su'ang 'jog par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi
232b7(mdo sde): khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab
233a1(mdo sde): tu mkhyen to/ /rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na /nang
233a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen
233a3(mdo sde): to| |ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ snang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i
233a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /lus kyi
233a5(mdo sde): khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
233a6(mdo sde): phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang
233a7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rab tu
233b1(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
233b2(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ kun tu rtog pa las byung bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dus byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /
233b3(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu
233b4(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /rnam par byang ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'khor ba'i khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan
233b5(mdo sde): nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar na/ 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang yin
233b6(mdo sde): pa dang / rab tu gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / rjes su khrid pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / thogs pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba'i khams gang yin
233b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bsam pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nges par sems pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / rten pa'i khams gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas rab
234a1(mdo sde): tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bzhi pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /mi yi seng+ge
234a2(mdo sde): khams rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /gang du gang gi khams ni ji 'dra 'jug pa dang / /khams gang dge brgya chen kun tu 'byung byed pa/ /de kun bde bar
234a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas ma lus rab mkhyen to/ /bsod nams bsod nams min dang mi g.yo rgyus byung myong / /gang gis 'byung ba thob par 'gyur bzhi pa'i khams/ /khams
234a4(mdo sde): gang gnas nas khams las rnam par grol 'gyur ba/ /khams de shes rab chen po bde bar gshegs pas mkhyen/ /mig gi khams dang de bzhin gzugs dang
234a5(mdo sde): yid kyi khams/ /rang bzhin stong par rgyal bas spyod pa'i bdag nyid mkhyen/ /de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce dang de bzhin lus/ /yid dang chos kyi khams kyang rtag tu
234a6(mdo sde): stong par mkhyen/ /chu dang me dang sa dang rlung gi khams 'di dag /nam mkha' mnyam par mi yi seng+ges rab tu mkhyen/ /'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med
234a7(mdo sde): khams 'di dag / yongs su rtog las yang dag byung bar ma lus mkhyen/ /nyon mongs khams ni rgyal bas rang bzhin med par mkhyen/ /rnam byang rang bzhin 'dra bar
234b1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pas mkhyen/ /mi mkhas dag gis 'khor ba rtag tu 'dus byas dang / /mya ngan 'das pa gang la mtshan nyid gsum med dang / /khams gang mi dge
234b2(mdo sde): bas ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /gang yang dge bas 'jug pa thams cad gcod pa dang / /sna tshogs khams dang du ma'i khams can 'jig rten 'di/ /sangs
234b3(mdo sde): rgyas mkhyen kyang ngas mkhyen snyam du rlom sems med/ /nam mkha' ji lta bzhin du mtha' yas phyogs rnams kyi/ /khams rnams de bzhin mi yi seng+ges rab tu mkhyen/ /
234b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i ye shes dam pa de ni thug pa med/ /de yi mtha' ni 'gro ba rnams kyis shes mi nus/ /'di ni skyob pa rdul med rnams kyi 'phrin las bzhi/ /de yis sems can
234b5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i khams rnams cho ga mkhyen/ /gang dag las legs byas pas dul gyur de dag la/ /'khrul pa brgya lam na yang nam yang mi 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan
234b6(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/
234b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rigs
235a1(mdo sde): k yi bu| 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dbang po rtul po rnams kyang sems can dbang po rtul por yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
235a2(mdo sde): du rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin du dbang po 'bring yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rno ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /
235a3(mdo sde): dbang po dman pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar
235a4(mdo sde): phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
235a5(mdo sde): bcos ma skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
235a6(mdo sde): skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba
235a7(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi
235b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
235b2(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po rab tu mkhyen to/ /rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus
235b3(mdo sde): kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / po'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i
235b4(mdo sde): dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rab tu mkhyen to/ /dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
235b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po rab tu mkhyen to/ /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang
235b6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i dbang po rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par gyur te sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa
235b7(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po gang rna ba'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gang sna'i dbang po'i rgyu
236a1(mdo sde): las byung la lce'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba
236a2(mdo sde): dang / dbang po gang lus kyi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la mig gi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gang sbyin
236a3(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po can yin la de'ang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas sbyin pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems
236a4(mdo sde): c an gang tshul khrims kyi dbang po can yin la de'ang sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas tshul khrims kyi
