268b3(mdo sde): mi mtho ba'o/ /mi dma' ba'o/ /ma yo ba'o/ /ldab ldib can ma yin pa'o/ /gya gyu ma yin pa'o/ /mi brlang ba'o/ /mi rtsub pa'o/ /ma 'chal pa'o/ /'jam pa'o/ /mnyen pa'o/ /las
268b4(mdo sde): su rung ba'o/ /ra ra po ma yin pa'o/ /byung rgyal ma yin pa'o/ /brtabs pa ma yin pa'o/ /rnam par myur ba ma yin pa'o/ /rab tu myur ba ma yin pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'o//
268b5(mdo sde): shin tu nges pa'i tshig go /shin tu dga' ba skyed pa'o/ /shin tu snyan pa'o/ /shin tu gdangs snyan pa'o/ /shin tu gsal pa'o/ /thags thogs med pa'o/ /rdzogs
268b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |snyan pa'o/ /'brel pa'o/ /bsgrags pa'o/ /mchod par gyur pa'o/ /mdzes pa'o/ /rdul med pa'o/ /rdul dang bral ba'o/ /tha ba med pa'o/ /dri ma med pa'o/ /dri
268b7(mdo sde): ma dang bral ba'o/ /rmongs pa med pa'o/ /shin tu zur phyin pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'o/ /rab tu grol ba'o/ /'od gsal ba'o/ /drang ba'o/ /mi dman pa'o/ /mi 'dzings
269a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |dib dib po ma yin pa'o/ /bde ba skyed pa'o/ /lus tshim par byed pa'o/ /sems dga' ba skyed pa'o/ /'dod chags zhi bar
269a2(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /zhe sdang 'dul ba'o/ /gti mug sel ba'o/ /bdud 'joms pa'o/ /sdig pa sel ba'o/ /rgol ba 'dul ba'o/ /rnam par shes par byed pa'o/ /rnga'i sgra'o/ /
269a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa'o/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs so/ /brgya byin gyi sgra'o/ /tshangs pa'i sgra'o/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra'o/ /sprin gyi sgra'o/ /sa'i sgra dbyangs so/ /
269a4(mdo sde): khrung khrung gi sgra'o/ /rma bya'i sgra skad do/ /khu byug gi sgra'o/ /shang shang te'u'i sgra'o/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po'i sgra'o/ /ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i sgra'o/ /pi wang dang / pi wang
269a5(mdo sde): rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / gling bu dang / dung dang / sil snyan gyi sgra'o/ /kun shes par bya ba'o/ /rnam par shes par bya ba'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'o/ /mnyan
269a6(mdo sde): par 'os pa'o/ /zab pa'o/ /rdzun pa ma yin pa'o/ /rna ba bde bar byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o/ /tshig dang yi ge nyams pa med pa'o/ /tshig dang yi ge shin
269a7(mdo sde): tu nges pa'i tshig go / don dang ldan pa'o/ /chos dang ldan pa'o/ /dus dang ldan pa'o/ /dus tshigs thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /dus las mi g.yo ba'o/ /dbang po mchog
269b1(mdo sde): dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ston pa'o/ /sbyin pas brgyan pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /bzod pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis shin
269b2(mdo sde): tu sbyangs pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyis las su rung bar byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa'o/ /byams pas shin tu brtsams pa'o/ /snying rjes skyo ba med pa'o/ /rab
269b3(mdo sde): tu dga' ba'o/ /'od gsal ba'o/ /btang snyoms kyis nges par brtags pa'o/ /theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod
269b4(mdo sde): pa'o| |phung po gsum rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par sbyangs pa'o/ /bden pas yongs su bsgos pa'o/ /ye shes kyis yongs su bsgos
269b5(mdo sde): pa'o| |mkhas pas ma smad pa'o/ /'phags pas bsngags pa'o/ /nam mkha'i tshad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
269b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni/ de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o//
269b7(mdo sde): 'di ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ngag ni gsal zhing dri
270a1(mdo sde): med yon tan kun gyis 'phags/ /zhing stong rgyas par 'gengs shing skad cig las kyang skad rnams kun grag ste/ /sems can kha
270a2(mdo sde): cig nyan thos theg dang de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa thos/ /thos nas sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin byang chub 'dir yid 'jud/ /yi ge rnams ni mtshams
270a3(mdo sde): sbyor ma yin phan tshun 'gal bar 'gyur ba'ang min/ /de ltar chos rab ston kyang sems ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba med/ /ji ltar brag ca g.yo ba med cing
270a4(mdo sde): byed pa med par sgra sgrog pa/ /de ltar mi yi dam pa sgra rnams sgrog cing sems can tshim par byed/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi
270a5(mdo sde): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin/
270a6(mdo sde): yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
270a7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi shes
270b1(mdo sde): pa rig pa'o/ /chos thams cad nges par bsam pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/ /dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /rkyen las skye ba
270b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o/ /srid pa gsum bsal ba'o/ /nga rgyal gyi rim pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o/ /sgyu dang g.yo
270b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o/ /ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog dang bral ba'o/ /lam gyi yan
270b4(mdo sde): lag shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ /nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las ye shes sngon
270b5(mdo sde): du 'gro ba ni/ de lta bu'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang
270b6(mdo sde): po sems dang yid kyis gzhal ma yin/ /ye shes rnam par dag gis 'dren pa kun gyi las rnam dag /bde gshegs ye shes de ni sems can kun gyi bsam pa la/ /
270b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du rjes su zhugs shing chos dbyings rang bzhin no/ /bsam gtan dang ni de bzhin ting 'dzin kun dang rab tu ldan/ /sems dang yid kyi rnam par rtog pa kun
271a1(mdo sde): tu rgyu ba med/ /bdud kyi yul las grol zhing bdud kyi las las shin tu 'das/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing dri med rnam par 'gyur
271a2(mdo sde): ba med| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug go /ji ltar 'jug ce na/
271a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang / zhig pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rtswa dang / shing
271a4(mdo sde): gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags
271a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can de dag gi spyod pa sna tshogs su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /
271a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams
271a7(mdo sde): cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can ji snyed cig nyan thos kyi theg par btul ba de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi
271b1(mdo sde): theg par btul ba de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can ji snyed cig theg pa chen por btul ba de dag thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
271b2(mdo sde): rnam par phye ba thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /chos gnas
271b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can thams cad
271b4(mdo sde): kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro bar skye ba rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po sna tshogs dang / spyod pa sna tshogs dang /
271b5(mdo sde): bsam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
271b6(mdo sde): pas mngon sum gyi shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pas bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyi rgyud 'das pa btang ba
271b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyad par chos ston te/ 'di ni/
272a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las sum cu pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /zhing dang sems can dang ni chos smra
272a2(mdo sde): la| |sangs rgyas ye shes chags med tshad kyang med/ /'dren pas sems can gang dag thar byas dang / /zhing du dge slong dge 'dun gyur grangs dang / /sems can
272a3(mdo sde): bsam pa dbang po gang yin dang / /dbyibs dang sgra yi rim pa gang dang sems/ /ming dang sbyor ba gang dag 'das pa kun/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag gzigs
272a4(mdo sde): pas rtogs/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug go /ji ltar 'jug
272a5(mdo sde): zhe na| sems can nam/ chos sam/ zhing gang dag kha cig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig par 'gyur ba de
272a6(mdo sde): dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /bskal pa'i mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus 'jig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas
272a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sa'i khams su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rtswa dang /
272b1(mdo sde): shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / skar ma'i gzugs su 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / zhing rab 'byams re rer sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur
272b2(mdo sde): ba ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed
272b3(mdo sde): pa dang / zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub pa dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam du 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin
272b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rab 'byams re res nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos sems can thar bar byed par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag
272b5(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhing rab 'byams re re na sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed
272b6(mdo sde): c ig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyun bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin
272b7(mdo sde): par ma 'ongs pa la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /de la
273a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bya'o/ /dri med mig gis ma 'ongs dus na ni/ /cung zad 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'jig 'gyur dang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun
273a2(mdo sde): na rgyal ba dang / /de dag thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dmigs par gtong ba na/ /de yi sems ni nam yang g.yeng ba med/ /sems can rnams
273a3(mdo sde): la de bzhin chos ston te/ /'di ni rkang gnyis mchog gi 'phrin las yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang da ltar byung ba'i dus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong
273a4(mdo sde): ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug go / ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
273a5(mdo sde): cad bgrang ba rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
273a6(mdo sde): cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i
273a7(mdo sde): skar ma'i gzugs thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu dag
273b1(mdo sde): na da ltar byung ba'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char brlags pa thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mo'i blangs
273b2(mdo sde): pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu
273b3(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs su gyur pa la bab pa'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyang skra'i
273b4(mdo sde): rtse mos rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i
273b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang
273b6(mdo sde): rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu
273b7(mdo sde): dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i mir gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung
274a1(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu dang / thar pa'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i sems can
274a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dag nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i sems can
274a3(mdo sde): gdul bar 'os pa rnams kyi dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /gdul bar 'os pa ma yin pa dag gi dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
274a4(mdo sde): d e ltar rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med cing gnyis su med pa la gzung ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos
274a5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul
274a6(mdo sde): thug pa med/ /tshad med gzhal du med cing bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing dpe yang med pa ste/ /'gro ba kun gyis shes par mi nus so/ /phyogs bcu dag na
274a7(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba yi/ /'gro ba'i bya bar byur pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyal bas rjes su mkhyen/ /'di ni rang byung rnams kyi las kyi mchog /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
274b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las de dag dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'dul lo/ /de bzhin
274b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni/ tshad med mod kyi/ sems can rnams gzud pa'i phyir mdo tsam du tshad kyis bstan to/ /bam po drug pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gzhan
274b3(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las gang yin pa de ni/ tshad med pa'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes par
274b4(mdo sde): bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /yi ge rnams kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan dag gis thob par dka' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyun chad pa med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
274b5(mdo sde): thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song ba'o/ /'bad pa'i bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /rnam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /chos
274b6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi bya ba ma yin pas sna tshogs su byar med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gtam sna tshogs kyi ched du 'byung
274b7(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/ sems can sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi phyir ma yin/ zhing sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi phyir ma yin/ bstan pa sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi phyir ma yin/ bsam pa sna tshogs
275a1(mdo sde): kyi gtam gyi phyir ma yin/ rnam par grel ba sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi phyir ma yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi phyir
275a2(mdo sde): ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings ro gcig pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
275a3(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams chos khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
275a4(mdo sde): dper na/ nor bu mkhan mkhas pa nor bu sbyong ba'i cho ga shin tu shes pa des nor bu'i rigs las sbyang ba ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas bul thog gi chu rnon pos bkrus te skra nag
275a5(mdo sde): po'i la bas byi dor bya bas byi dor byed kyang de tsam gyis brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod kyi/ de'i 'og tu dngul chu rnon po dang bcas pas bkrus te shing dang snam bus byi dor
275a6(mdo sde): bya bas byi dor byed do/ /de tsam gyis kyang brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod de/ de'i 'og tu'ang sman chen po'i khu bas bkrus te ras phra mos byi dor bya bas byi dor byed do/ /byi dor
275a7(mdo sde): byas te nor bu mching bu'i rigs dang bral nas bai DUR+ya zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su ma dag pa'i sems can gyi khams rig nas
275b1(mdo sde): mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gyis 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams yid 'byung
275b2(mdo sde): bar byed/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'jug par byed do/ /de tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing / de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
275b3(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khong du chud par byed do/ /de tsam gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod kyi/
275b4(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gtam dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i gtam gyis sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'dzud do/ /sems
275b5(mdo sde): can rgyu dang rang bzhin sna tshogs pa de dag mnyam du zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pas sbyin gnas bla na med pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir rigs
275b6(mdo sde): kyi bu| khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun gyi rjes su song ba dang / thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / dus gsum
275b7(mdo sde): gyi rjes su song ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
276a1(mdo sde): 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la'ang gnas so/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyang mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
276a2(mdo sde): du'ang ston to/ /brjod du med pa'i chos ston pa'i tshig kyang mi 'dor ro/ /sgra ji bzhin gyi rnam par rig byed kyis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /sems can
276a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dmigs pa dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byang
276a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ gang rgyun chad pa med pa/ rgyun chags pa/ rgyun mi gcod pa/ byang chub sems
276a5(mdo sde): dpa' lung bstan pa'i gtam rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las yang dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
276a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'phrin las bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag rnam pa drug tu
276a7(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur to/ /snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar gyur to/ /me tog gi sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to/ /'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gzi brjid
276b1(mdo sde): che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma
276b2(mdo sde): yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bstan
276b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba
276b4(mdo sde): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs
276b5(mdo sde): byed pas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod do/ /dbu'i gtsug tu me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor to/ /thig le lta bu'i rgyan dang / rna cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / nor bu'i
276b6(mdo sde): rgyan phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / rgyan zla gam dang / spen tog rgyan dang / rgyan ne'u le can dang / sor gdub rgyan dang / gdu bu rgyan ta la 'dab dang / rgyan
276b7(mdo sde): lcam khris can dang / se ral phreng dang / rkang gdub dang / do shal dang / mgo rgyan dang / lag rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / rkang rgyan rnams kyis kyang gtor to/ /rin
277a1(mdo sde): po che bai DUR+ya dag kyang gtor to/ /dzam+bu'i chu ba'i gser rin po che rnams dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po rnams dang / rin po che dpal gyi snying
277a2(mdo sde): po rnams dang / rin po cha an+da rnyil rnams dang / rin po che me mdog rnams dang / rin po che skar 'od rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas rnams kyis kyang
277a3(mdo sde): gtor to/ /gser phye dang / dngul phye dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dang /
277a4(mdo sde): tsan+dan dmar po'i phye ma dang / ke sa ra'i phye ma rnams kyis kyang mngon par gtor to/ /lha'i me tog rnams kyang mngon par gtor ba la 'di lta ste/ me tog mnad ra pa dang
277a5(mdo sde): mnad ra ba chen pa dang / yongs 'du dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / s+tha la dang / s+tha la chen po dang /
277a6(mdo sde): me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo dri med dang / 'dab brgya dang / 'dab stong dang / 'dab 'bum dang / kun nas 'od dang / kun tu srung dang / kun tu cher
277a7(mdo sde): snang mig tu sdug dang / skar 'od dang / 'od byed dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / me tog de lta bu dag kyang mngon par gtor to/ /chu nas skyes pa'i me tog ut+pa
277b1(mdo sde): la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyang gtor to/ /thang las skyes pa sna ma'i me tog dang / paR+shi ka dang / a ti mug+ta ka dang / tsam+pa ka dang / mya ngan
277b2(mdo sde): 'tshang dang / d+ha nu ka ri dang / skya snar dang / me tog btang gzung dag kyang gtor to/ /sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag kyang kun tu yang dag par sbyar ba la 'di lta ste/
277b3(mdo sde): pheg rdob pa dang / gling bu dang / rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byas so/ /spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i
277b4(mdo sde): char dang / rin po che'i char dang / rgyan gyi char dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi char dang / gos kyi char dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra'i char yang mngon par phab bo//
277b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te bcom ldan 'das la
277b6(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi lus bor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lus bor ma thag tu de nas steng gi bar snang la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi
277b7(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod pa khebs par byas te/ rin po che'i dra ba mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma dpyangs pa/ kun nas mig mang ris su bris pa/ shin tu yongs su las su byas
278a1(mdo sde): pa| dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i pad+mas spras pa byung bar gyur to/ /mu thig gi rgyan phreng de dag gi mu tig gi
278a2(mdo sde): 'bru re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo / /de dag byung nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor
278a3(mdo sde): ba byas te rin po che bkod pa'i pad+ma'i seng+ge'i khri de dag la 'khod do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag gis
278a4(mdo sde): c hos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang bskal par brjod pa yongs su thug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i mchod pa bkod pa
278a5(mdo sde): bsgrubs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus bkod pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ de dag gis
278a6(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa la rgyan gyi mchog gis brgyan par gyur to/ /'khor 'di las sems can tshad med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
278a7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
278b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams las rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi
278b2(mdo sde): khyab ba| byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas btang ba/ rnam par brtags pa ma yin pa/ ma 'khrugs pa/ ma rnying
278b3(mdo sde): pa| ma nyams pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug lon te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par 'dug
278b4(mdo sde): n as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa
278b5(mdo sde): na bstan pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dun par bya ba dang / mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa dang / bskal ba bzang
278b6(mdo sde): po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par su spro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
278b7(mdo sde): g yur nas 'dug pa de pad+ma'i stan las langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom
279a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rgyan bkod pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma 'khrugs pa/ ma rnying ba/ ma nyams
279a2(mdo sde): pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa dang / da ma lags pa bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan thams
279a3(mdo sde): cad la'ang mchod pa bgyid par spro'o/ /de'i tshe bdud rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba shin tu gnas pa'i gling bzhi pa na gnas pa 'khor de nyid du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'
279a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ snod gang gis bkod pa 'di rnying par gyur gyi bar du 'dzin pa'i khyod kyi snod de ji tsam
279a5(mdo sde): zhig / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos bdud rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/
279a6(mdo sde): snod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'chags par 'gyur ba/ bar du gcod pa dang bcas pa dag go /nam mkha' ni/ mi shigs pa bar du gcod pa med pa ste/ snod de
279a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchog yin no/ /grogs po/ mig ma 'dzum par nga'i lus la ltos shig dang / snod chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud rnam par 'phrul bas byang
279b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i lus la mig mi 'dzum par bltas pa dang / des byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i lus kyi dkyil
279b2(mdo sde): lta ba'i dkyil 'khor na chu'i rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo / /ci'i phyir chu'i rgyal por snang ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de chus rab tu gang
279b3(mdo sde): ste rgya mtsho gcig pa ltar snang ngo / /de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe la chos
279b4(mdo sde): kyang ston to/ /chu'i phung po de las rin po che bkod pa'i pad+ma mngon par 'phags te/ de la bcom ldan 'das de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bzhugs so/ /de nas
279b5(mdo sde): bdud rnam par 'phrul pas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po la phyag btsal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
279b6(mdo sde): cad rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal pos bdud rnam par 'phrul ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snod mthong ngam/ smras pa/ mthong
279b7(mdo sde): ngo / /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis snod 'di lta bu 'dis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du rin po che bkod pa chen po ma bskams pa/ ma rnying pa 'di 'dzin par nus sam /
280a1(mdo sde): de nas bdud rnam par 'phrul pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngon
280a2(mdo sde): chad skyes bu dam pa 'di'ang ma mthong ngo / /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang ma thos pas ci bdag nyan thos kyi theg pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bgyi'am snyam
280a3(mdo sde): pa las| deng bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang thos/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa 'di'ang
280a4(mdo sde): mthong bas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi
280a5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs la/ de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur du
280a6(mdo sde): lags kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di lta bu yongs su mi gtong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rnam par 'phrul pa la legs so//
280a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu go cha bgos pa dang / rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di lta bu dang
280b1(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
280b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs gang la rab tu gnas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa

280b4(mdo sde): kyi gzungs gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

281a1(mdo sde): gzungs dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa

281b6(mdo sde): mu med pa'i bar dag dbyangs kyis go bar byed do/ /des rgyad grags kyi tshad tsam gyi seng+ge'i khri byin gyis brlabs te/ de la 'dug nas chos ston to/ /ji ltar mos pa'i sems

282a4(mdo sde): do| |yi ge'i sgra gcig la 'jug pas yi ge'i sgra thams cad la 'jug pa ston to/ /yi ge'i dang po a zhes bya ba brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa brjod

282b6(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /rlom sems med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ g.yo ba med pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rnam par shes pa med pa'o/ /tshig gi lam

283b1(mdo sde): phyir chos thams cad ni/ las med pa'o/ /'pho ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rnam par smin pa med pa'o/ /sa bon med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gdung ba med pa'o//

283b6(mdo sde): phyir chos thams cad ni/ tshor ba med pa'o/ /'du shes kyi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ 'du shes med pa'o/ /sred pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos
283b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ 'du byed pa med pa'o/ /so sor rnam par rig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rnam par shes pa med pa'o/ /khams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir
284a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ khams med pa'o/ /yul gyi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ 'dren pa med pa'o/ /rgyu ba med pa'i phyir
284a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ yul med pa'o/ /kun brtags pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ 'dod pa med pa'o/ /'jug pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gzugs
284a3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /nges par sems pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa'o/ /'khrugs pa spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ 'khrugs pa med pa'o/ /
284a4(mdo sde): gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ yid med pa'o/ /yul gyi lam las shin tu
284a5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gzung ba ma yin pa'o/ /rtag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ kun gzhi med pa'o/ /rten pa dang mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir chos thams

291a3(mdo sde): su snang ba'am/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gyi dbyibs kyi gzugs su snang ba'am/ gzhal med khang dang / longs spyod kyi gzugs su snang ba'am

291a5(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba ngan pa dang / 'bring dang / rab dang / gzugs su snang ba de dag thams cad rgya mtsho chen po la rgya dang bcas par mi nyung / mi mang /
291a6(mdo sde): lhag pa med pas de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems
291a7(mdo sde): dpa' yang sems can thams cad la lus rgya dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad la ngag rgya dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /sems can thams
291b1(mdo sde): cad la sems rgya dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa'i gsungs gi 'phrin las ji snyed 'jug pa de dag byang
291b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas phyag rgyas btab pa dang mtshungs par 'byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab ste gang ci
291b3(mdo sde): brjod pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas rnam par mi rtog par phyag rgya thams cad ston pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyag
291b4(mdo sde): rgya bstan pa ni/ 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ a zhes bya ba ni/ mngon par 'du byed med pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad la 'dod chags dang
291b5(mdo sde): bral ba thob pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni/ don dam pa bstan pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni/ mig rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni/ ming
291b6(mdo sde): dang gzugs thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni/ sred pa'i 'khri shing dang bral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /da zhes bya ba ni/ stobs bcu yongs su
291b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /Da zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug dang bral ba dang / gdung
292a1(mdo sde): bas gdungs pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /Sha zhes bya ba ni/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni/ g.yon
292a2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi lam rnam par spangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na bstan pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ya zhes bya ba ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /sta zhes
292a3(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ khengs pa'i tha ba dang bral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /ka zhes bya ba ni/ the tshom dang bral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni/ bden pa bstan pa'i phyag rgya'o//
292a4(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba ni/ lam rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ga zhes bya ba ni/ zab mo la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /s+tha zhes bya ba ni/ mthu dang stobs kun tu bstan
292a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /dza zhes bya ba ni/ rga shi las shin tu 'da' ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni/ gcan gzan gyi nyes pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /
292a6(mdo sde): d+ha zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sha zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /kha zhes bya ba ni/ nam
292a7(mdo sde): mkha' mi zad pa'i chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'o/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni/ zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /su zhes bya ba ni/ rmugs pa'i sgrib pa
292b1(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kun tu shes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ha zhes bya ba ni/ nyams pa la rten pa'i
292b2(mdo sde): chos rnam par spangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /b+ha zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po dang / dngos po med pa rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod
292b3(mdo sde): pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jig pa dang / gti mug rnam par spong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sma zhes bya ba ni/ bran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / brjod pa med pa'i
292b4(mdo sde): phyag rgya'o/ /ha zhes bya ba ni/ bod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni/ thibs po dang / ling
292b5(mdo sde): tog dang / ma rig pa sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /Tha zhes bya ba ni/ mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /Na zhes bya ba ni/ gya nom pa'i chos rjes su rtogs par
292b6(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /pha zhes bya ba ni/ 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ska zhes bya ba ni/ phung po yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /dz+wa zhes bya ba
292b7(mdo sde): ni rims nad sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sh+tsa zhes bya ba ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni/
293a1(mdo sde): lam gyi rgyun gcod cing mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su thob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni/ yi ge'i mtha' thug pa
293a2(mdo sde): med pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa ji snyed kyis chos ston pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstan pa rab tu
293a3(mdo sde): shes te| rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/
293a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'di la rab tu gnas pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang dang gang du chos bstan pa de dang / der
293a5(mdo sde): de'i pad+ma'i stan sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa 'byung ste/ de pad+ma'i stan de la 'dug ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las pad+ma'i char 'bab bo/ /pad+ma de dag
293a6(mdo sde): las kyang chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ zab mo bstan pa dang / sna tshogs bstan pa dang / dpe brjod pa bstan pa dang / mdo
293a7(mdo sde): dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de
293b1(mdo sde): lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / rmad du byung ba'i sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa dag ston par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma las
293b2(mdo sde): chos brjod pa byung ba de'ang de med pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'ang btang snyoms su byed cing mi smra ba dang / mnyam
293b3(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ro/ /pad+ma 'byung ba las nges par byung ba de'ang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi
293b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa'ang byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag 'byung ngo / /'od zer de dag las kyang pad+ma dag 'byung ngo / /
293b5(mdo sde): pad+ma dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams 'byung ste/ de dag phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong nas sangs rgyas
293b6(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa byed de/ 'di ni/ pad+ma bkod pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/ /
293b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bstan pa gcig la mi chags so/ /bstan pa gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / bdun dang / brgyad dang / dgu dang /
294a1(mdo sde): bcu dag la mi chags so/ /bstan pa nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad
294a2(mdo sde): cu dang / dgu bcu dang / brgya dag la mi chags so/ /bstan pa stong la mi chags so/ /bstan pa bye ba brgya phrag stong la mi chags so/ /bstan pa ther 'bum dang /

294a5(mdo sde): la mi chags so/ /bstan pa gling bzhi pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed la mi chags so/ /bstan pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu

294a7(mdo sde): snyed la mi chags pa nas bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed la mi chags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos kyi sgo gang dang gang
294b1(mdo sde): brtsams pa'i chos kyi sgo de dang de'i bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag bstan pa gcig gis ston to/ /gnyis dang / gsum dang /

294b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'byor pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig dang / don dang / tshig 'bru dang ldan par ston kyang chags pa med cing rgyun chad pa med de/ 'di ni/ chags pa med
294b4(mdo sde): pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la so so yang dag par nges pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs gang zhe na/ gang don so so yang dag par rig pa
294b5(mdo sde): bstan pa mi zad pa shes pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa mi zad pa shes pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa mi zad pa
294b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa mi zad pa shes pa ste/ shes pa 'di lta bu rab tu thob pa de la shar phyogs kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
294b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rang rang gi skad kyis don la mkhas pa yongs su dris/ gang dag lho phyogs kyi sems can de dag gis ni/ chos la mkhas pa
295a1(mdo sde): yongs su dris/ gang dag nub phyogs kyi sems can de dag gis ni/ nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yongs su dris/ gang dag byang phyogs
295a2(mdo sde): kyi sems can de dag gis ni/ spobs pa la mkhas pa yongs su dris na/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi las kyang de snyed du tshad med de/ dus gcig
295a3(mdo sde): tu brjod cing skad sna tshogs la 'jug pa la brjed par mi 'gyur/ sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skad la 'jug pa shes pas skad thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs
295a4(mdo sde): te| skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rnam par rig pa tshim par byed de/ 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la
295a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub
295a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs 'di lta bu rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus na 'dug pa'i spyi gtsug gi drang thad
295a7(mdo sde): kyi steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis legs par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i gzugs 'byung ste/ de bzhin
295b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs des phyag g.yas pa de'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog go / phyag bzhag ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus kyi

295b4(mdo sde): gam| zhag gnyis sam/ zhag gsum mam/ zhag bzhi'am/ zhag bdun nam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ dus sam/ lo khyud kor ram/ lo brgya'am/

295b6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de'i chos kyi sgo yongs su zad par mi 'gyur/ lus dang sems ngal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes pa chen po bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi

296a1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par bstan pa shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byin gyis

296a5(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ro/ /legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang
296a6(mdo sde): phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis rab tu gsungs pa'i gsung brgyad po/ /theg pa 'dir ni de dag rnam par nges
296a7(mdo sde): thob pa| |mdo sde bye ba stong phrag thug pa med 'chad kyang / /de ni don dang tshig 'bru gang la'ang chags pa med/ /yid 'ong shin tu snyan cing chags par 'gyur
296b1(mdo sde): ba'i dbyangs/ /bye ba stong phrag tshad med zhing du go byed pa/ /sems can rnams kyis de thos mya ngan 'das par 'gro /sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs 'di thug

296b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /mi zad chos kyi za ma tog 'di dran pa yi/ /gang gis gzungs thob mtha' mar thug par yongs bcad pa/ /mnyam nyid tshul bzhin chos la sems

296b5(mdo sde): rgya'i gzungs ni rab thob pa/ /de yi kha nas phyag rgya bsam yas brjod pa na/ /gang dag gling bzhi gzugs kyi rnam pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag kun dang rgya mtsho mtsho

296b7(mdo sde): 'byung / /'di ni pad+ma bkod pa'i gzungs te yongs su dag /chags pa med pa'i gzungs ni gal te thob gyur na/ /tshig gcig brjod pa rab tu smra dang gnyis

297a3(mdo sde): tshom kun bcad dogs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzungs thob pa/ /gzi brjed chen po de ni stan la 'dug pa na/ /
297a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas phyag g.yas de yi spyi bor 'jog mdzad de/ /de yang rgyal ba'i spobs pa ci 'dra bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs rnams 'di dag rab tu

297a7(mdo sde): las 'phags 'gyur zhing / /ri rab bzhin du yul rnams kyis ni mi bskyod 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni srid kun rnam
297b1(mdo sde): par spangs pa'i spyad spyod de/ /mu stegs can gyi tshogs kun 'joms pa sgrog pa na/ /seng+ge bzhin du 'khor du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /sa ltar dge ba
297b2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par skyed par 'gyur/ /chu ltar dri ma rnams ni rab tu ded par 'gyur/ /me ltar rlom sems med cing rnam rtog med par 'gyur/ /rlung ltar
297b3(mdo sde): yul rnams la ni chags pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni smra tshe shes dang dbang po 'khrug pa med/ /de ni sman
297b4(mdo sde): pa bzhin du 'gro ba thar byed 'gyur/ /phan par 'dod pas chos kyi bkru sman sbyin par byed/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /skye ba'i
297b5(mdo sde): tshogs rnams de la lta bas mi ngoms te/ /zla ba bzhin du dge ba dag ni rnam sbyor 'gyur/ /sems snyoms gzi brjid chen po 'od zer mnyam par gtong / /gang
297b6(mdo sde): gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni 'gro ba'i srid pa ma lus skem par byed/ /nyi ma bzhin du 'od byed mun pa sel bar 'gyur/ /gnyid
297b7(mdo sde): log sems can srid pa gsum las sad par byed/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni kun la cung zad tsam yang 'dzin pa med/ /
298a1(mdo sde): de ni rgyal po bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug che/ /rnam thos bu bzhin nor ldan chos rnams ston par byed/ /gang gis gzungs
298a2(mdo sde): kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dran ldan klu dang 'drar 'gyur te/ /sprin gyi bya ba med cing mkha' las glog phyung nas/ /zhi bar bya phyir de
298a3(mdo sde): ni chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /'khor rnams thams cad khyu mchog gyur pa'i gdong du blta/ /brgya byin
298a4(mdo sde): bzhin du dman pa ma yin gzugs mchog ldan/ /blo chen 'gro ba rnams la chos dang don rnams sems/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob
298a5(mdo sde): gyur pa| |de ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa yongs dag bsam gtan byed/ /tshangs pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag snying rje ldan par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di kun zil
298a6(mdo sde): gyis mnan nas bsam gtan byed/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang la mchod pa byed/ /de ni
298a7(mdo sde): rtag tu mngon shes lnga las nyams mi 'gyur/ /zhing brgya bsam gyis mi khyab dag tu mkha' nas 'gro /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /
298b1(mdo sde): de ni ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas yon tan thob/ /phyogs na rgyal ba rnams ni de yi bsngags brjod de/ /bu gcig pa zhig yon tan ldan pa bzhin du bstod/ /gang
298b2(mdo sde): gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni spobs pa phreng ba legs brgyus ji bzhin te/ /mdo sde zab mo sna tshogs mang po 'chad pa na/ /spobs pa rgya
298b3(mdo sde): che yangs shing zad pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de la rgyags pa med cing g.yo med nga rgyal med/ /dran ldan blo gros ldan
298b4(mdo sde): zhing blo ldan rtogs dang ldan/ /ye shes mtha' yas spyod yul nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de yi
298b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas nyes pa thams cad rab tu chad/ /shes rab ye shes thabs dang zung du 'brel par 'gyur/ /byams dang snying rje dag kyang zung du 'brel par 'gyur/ /
298b6(mdo sde): gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni smra tshe 'khrul ba cung zad mi dmigs te/ /bdag nyid che de sems can rnams kyi sgra skad shes/ /spyod dang
298b7(mdo sde): dbang po dang ni mos pa thams cad shes/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /des ni chos la lhag mthong dge dang dran pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul dang
299a1(mdo sde): ni spong dang dbang po stobs lnga dang / /byang chub yan lag de bzhin lam mchog zhi gnas thob/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams
299a2(mdo sde): rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod yul rang gis rtogs/ /pha rol phyin pa dag ni kun gyi pha rol son/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po kun la
299a3(mdo sde): mkhas shing blo gros ldan/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de la nam yang 'khrul ba cung zad mi dmigs te/ /des pa de ni zhi zhing
299a4(mdo sde): nyer zhi myos pa med/ /de ni spyod la rab tu gnas gyur shin tu dul/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni bde gshegs spyan sngar
299a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i steng na 'dug / de yi lus ni chos kyi rgyus byung rdul dang bral/ /de yi lus la mngal gyi dri mas gos mi 'gyur/ /gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab
299a6(mdo sde): tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs chos smra ste/ /de ni lus dang ngag yid las rnams gang byed pa/ /thams cad shes pas byas te skye bo phan par
299a7(mdo sde): byed| |gang gis gzungs kyi mchog rnams rab tu thob gyur pa/ /de ni smra tshe bsngags pa zad par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can thams cad 'dren pa shes rab cher
299b1(mdo sde): gyur kyang / /de yi bsngags pa bskal pa mang por bsam mi khyab/ /bam po bdun pa ste/ tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
299b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po/ khyod kyis gzungs rnam par nges
299b3(mdo sde): par bstan pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang / ji ltar yang khyod chos 'di dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / ji ltar yang khyod sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
299b4(mdo sde): la gzungs kyi sgo'i tshig zab mo rnams yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po/ khyod kyis rnam
299b5(mdo sde): grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgyas
299b6(mdo sde): pa| tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par snang byed kyi bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa
299b7(mdo sde): dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa de'ang bai DUR+ya
300a1(mdo sde): ltar dag par gyur te/ me long lta bur shin tu byi dor byas pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams der rin po
300a2(mdo sde): che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rin po che'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma tshad
300a3(mdo sde): shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur pa sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /lha dang mi de dag kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa la yongs
300a4(mdo sde): su longs spyod par gyur to/ /zas dang skom yang bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod
300a5(mdo sde): dag yongs su spyod pa ltar lha dang mi de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar gyur to/ /lha dang mi de dag kyang 'dod chags chung ba/ zhe sdang chung ba/
300a6(mdo sde): gti mug chung ba/ rnam pa bzang ba/ shin tu rnam par rig par byed par gyur to/ /'jigs rten gyi khams de ni/ nyi ma dang / zla bar btags pa rnams
300a7(mdo sde): med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de ni/ lus kyi 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas zhing gsal
300b1(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na pad+ma kha zum pas mtshan mo zhes bya ba dang / pad+ma kha bye bas nyin mor bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyin mtshan du gdags
300b2(mdo sde): pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba snyoms
300b3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag drug cur gyur to/ /khyim pa tshad med pa dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
300b4(mdo sde): dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /de ni/ theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa rnam par dgod pa gzhan med par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ phyir mi
300b5(mdo sde): ldog pa dag pa'i gtam yang dag par ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa phyed du gyur to/ /mi rnams kyang bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
300b6(mdo sde): med par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gang dag sa la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni/ mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro /gang dag
300b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni/ lha zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par lha dang mi rnams kyi kha dog dang /
301a1(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa tha dad du bya ba med par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po
301a2(mdo sde): gzhan gang yang med do/ /lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa dang / chos nyan pa la 'dun par gyur pa ma gtogs par lha
301a3(mdo sde): gzhan med/ ston pa gzhan med/ gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal/ las gzhan mi byed/ gzhan yid la mi byed par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni bud med du gdags pa med
301a4(mdo sde): do| |sems can de dag bslab pa gsum po dag la slob pa ma gtogs par ltung bar gdags pa med do/ /bslab pa las 'da' bar gdags pa med do/ /bslab pa gsum gang zhe na/
301a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang thams
301a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi gtong ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o/ /de la lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas lhag
301a7(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab thob pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu gnas nas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'o/ /byang chub sems
301b1(mdo sde): dpa' de dag ni lung phog pa med par bslab pa 'di lta bu dag la slob pa dag go / 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i chos bstan pa'ang de
301b2(mdo sde): lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
301b3(mdo sde): dri ma med par snang ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs gang la rab tu gnas nas
301b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin pa dang / chos bstan pa na zad par mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par bgyi ba'i
301b5(mdo sde): gzungs de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
301b6(mdo sde): kyi bu/ khyod gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ byang chub sems
301b7(mdo sde): dpa' dag gzungs de la rab tu gnas nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin to/ /legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed do/ /de skad ces
302a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
302a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ gang thos pas bdag cag de bzhin du sgrub cing gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs gang cung zad 'jug pa tsam
302a3(mdo sde): zhig legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bas byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs
302a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rdul dang bral gyur te/ /dri ma med cing dri ma kun tu spangs/ /sems ni rtag tu dag cing dri med pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /lus kyi ngag rnams dag cing yid
302a5(mdo sde): kyis ni/ /zla ba lta bur dri bral dri med 'od/ /byams pa'i sems dang yid kyang snyoms gyur pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /gnyis su lta ba dag las rnam grol
302a6(mdo sde): zhing / /rtog dang rnam par rtog dang kun tu bral/ /'du shes rnams ni yongs su shes gyur pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /dran dang blo gros rtog la 'jug pa 'grub//
302a7(mdo sde): shes rab che ldan yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing dag /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum
302b1(mdo sde): po rgyun mi chad pa dang / /dri gsum rnam spangs srid pa gsum las grol/ /gnyis la yid gnyis za ba mthar 'byin pa/ /rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni dag pa
302b2(mdo sde): yin| |'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug bcom/ /dus ngan rnyog spangs yon tan kun dang ldan/ /nyon mongs mun pa rab rib sel byed pa/ /rin chen sgron ma gzungs kyi
302b3(mdo sde): mchog yin no/ /'jig rten dag na sgra skad tha ma dang / /'bring dang mchog ni ji snyed yod pa dag /sgra rnams kun la shin tu zhugs gyur pa/ /rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni rdul
302b4(mdo sde): dang bral/ /zab mo'i chos rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing / /tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mtha' yas mang / /bdag dang sems can dag tu lhung ba med/ /gnyis med ldan pa
302b5(mdo sde): 'di ni gzungs yin no/ /so so yang dag rig pa thob gyur cing / /rkang pa snying po bzhi la rab gnas te/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang yang dag rab ldan pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron
302b6(mdo sde): ma'i gzungs yin no/ /dam pa'i don gyi chos kyi tshul gyur cing / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang bsdu dang ldan/ /mngon par shes pa lnga la 'gro byed pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron
302b7(mdo sde): ma'i gzungs yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ /yang dag spong ba rnams dang rtag tu mthun/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi la spyod byed pa/ /'di ni rin chen
303a1(mdo sde): sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /dbang po lnga po dag dang ldan gyur cing / /stobs lnga dag la gnas pa mi g.yo'i shugs/ /byang chub yan lag rnams dang rab
303a2(mdo sde): ldan pa| |'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyis 'gro byed cing / /zhi gnas mchog dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel/ /rig dang rnam par
303a3(mdo sde): grol bas 'gro byed pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /sa rnams gnon pa dag ni rab ldan zhing / /mtshams sbyor grol ba'i lam dang rjes su mthun/ /nyes pa
303a4(mdo sde): rnams ni kun tu spangs gyur pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /'jig rten thams cad na ni snang byed cing / /nyi dang zla yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /rnam par dag
303a5(mdo sde): cing mig ni 'byed byed pa/ /'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no/ /'dir ni lha mig dag ste rab rib med/ /shes rab mchog gi mig kyang rnam dag pa/ /'dir ni
303a6(mdo sde): chos kyi mig kyang dag gyur te/ /rgyal ba dam pa'i spyan ni rnam par dag /'dir ni nyon mongs bdud kyang dag par gyur/ /phung po lnga yi nyes pa 'dir yongs dag /'dir ni
303a7(mdo sde): 'chi bdag bdud kyang dag gyur cing / /'dir ni sde dang bcas pa'i bdud kyang bcom/ /'dir ni gzungs la rab tu gnas nas su/ /bye ba khrag khrig dag gi zhing du 'gro /
303b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khrag khrig dag kyang mthong 'gyur zhing / /bla na med pa'i chos kyang nyan par byed/ /rgya chen chos ni thos par gyur nas kyang / /gzungs kyi dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin par
303b2(mdo sde): byed| |don dang tshig 'bru dag kyang gzungs ldan par/ /sems can thams cad la ni ston par byed/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis rnam par phye bas na/ /sems ni skad cig 'jig par shes
303b3(mdo sde): gyur te| |chos rnams rab tu dbye ba shes thob pa/ /gzungs 'di la ni gnas par gyur pa yin/ /spobs pa thob cing gsum rig chags pa med/ /mig gsum rnam par dag
303b4(mdo sde): pa'ang rab tu thob/ /rnam par thar pa gsum gyi don kyang thob/ /'dir ni gzungs rnams thob par gyur dang ldan/ /gang dag gzungs rnams mang po gzhal yas shing / /tshad
303b5(mdo sde): med pa dag nges par bstan pa yang / /gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na/ /de dag thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan gang dang rnam thar gang dag dang / /snyoms
303b6(mdo sde): 'jug ting 'dzin gang dag mtha' yas dang / /mngon par shes pas rnam par rol dang gzungs/ /mtha' yas de dag la ni rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa la/ /
303b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas sgo nas klung mtsho mtshe'u 'jug pa/ /de ltar gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yang / /mtha' yas chos rnams kyi ni sgo mor 'jug /zad pa med pa'i sgra la 'jug pa
304a1(mdo sde): yang / /zad pa med pa'i shes pas khong du chud/ /gzungs 'di smra bar byed pa de yis ni/ /bsod nams thams cad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di rab
304a2(mdo sde): tu thob par gyur pa ni/ /rin chen dam pa dri med lag tu 'gyur/ /gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang ni rigs dang yang / /rus dang skye ba dag ni rnam par dag /zab mo'i tshul dag la
304a3(mdo sde): ni 'jug pa dang / mi skye ba la bzod dang ma skyes dang / /phyir mi ldog pa'i shes pa'i sa dag kyang / /gzungs 'di yin par nges par bstan pa yin/ /byang chub bla med mchog
304a4(mdo sde): 'di tshol byed pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po gang dag gis/ /gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur na ni/ /byang chub bla na med pa rnyed mi dka'/ /gang dag phyogs bcu
304a5(mdo sde): rnams na bde bar gshegs/ /'gro la phan dang bde phyir chos ston pa/ /gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na/ /de dag spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di rab
304a6(mdo sde): tu thob par gyur pa dag / dga' dang mos dang bsam pa shes nas ni/ /de dag 'bras bu yod pa ston pas na/ /sems can khrag khrig dag ni tshim par byed/ /gzungs 'di
304a7(mdo sde): la ni gnas pa'i dpa' bo dag / 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor byed cing / /sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams las 'grol/ /theg pa dam pa la yang 'jog
304b1(mdo sde): par byed/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni/ /bsngags dang yon tan legs pa brjod byas kyang / /drang srong chen pos de yi yon tan gyi/ /mtha' ma brjod du nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /
304b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang pa des gzungs bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de las byang chub sems
304b3(mdo sde): dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzungs thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal gyis ni/ rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di thob par gyur to//
304b4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po/ /khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis gyur tam/
304b5(mdo sde): the tshom za ba lta na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
304b6(mdo sde): po| khyod kyis de tshun chad bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag la gzungs rnam par nges pa 'di yongs su dris so/ /yongs su dri ba byas so/ /des na khyod da ltar yang
304b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba de ltar 'jigs pa med cing / gzungs kyi rnam par nges pa 'di'ang ston to/ /khyod kun tu lta ba'i blos chos 'di mngon sum du gyur
305a1(mdo sde): pas rnam grangs 'dis na/ ngas khyod byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan
305a2(mdo sde): to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
305a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di rab tu thob cing / thob nas kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid pa dang / 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pas
305a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
305a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rtsa ba la gnas par gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi las byed par gyur pa de'i tshe gzungs 'di rab tu thob bo/ /chud za
305a6(mdo sde): bar mi byed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs
305a7(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba ni/ gang lags/ shes rab kyi las ni/ gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad
305b1(mdo sde): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/
305b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /ji ltar thos pa'i chos gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ shes
305b3(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ /dpyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gang dpyad pa gzhan dag la nye bar ston pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /
305b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams tshul bzhin la rab tu dgod pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /yang dag par sbyor ba ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /yang dag par sgrub pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sems
305b5(mdo sde): la nges par sems pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /sems la nges par sems pa yang dag par ston pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /rab tu dben par gnas pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o//
305b6(mdo sde): lus dang sems dben par shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /gcig pur dga' ba ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gcig pur bgrod pa'i lam sgrub pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /
305b7(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa
306a1(mdo sde): ba'o| |rig pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /dran pa med cing yid la
306a2(mdo sde): byed pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /yang dag par spong ba sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis spangs par rab tu shes pa ni/ shes rab
306a3(mdo sde): kyi las so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa rdzu 'phrul thob pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /dad pas mos te yid ches pa
306a4(mdo sde): ni| shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sems mi 'jug pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /lus dang sems
306a5(mdo sde): shin tu sbyangs pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /dran pa dang shes bzhin ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /dran par bya ba rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /ting nge 'dzin
306a6(mdo sde): rim gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par gnas pa thob pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /shes rab kyi dbang po la
306a7(mdo sde): brten pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /stobs lnga'i gnas shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /
306b1(mdo sde): bdud dang nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su
306b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /lam gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos thams cad gzings lta bur shes nas chos dang chos ma yin pa la
306b3(mdo sde): mi gnas pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa ni/ shes
306b4(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ /drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde kun chub par byed pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa
306b5(mdo sde): ni| shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /don la rton pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /rnam par shes pa la so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /ye shes la rton pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /
306b6(mdo sde): gang zag gi sgra la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos nyid la rton pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni/ shes
306b7(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rab tu shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos thams cad mngon par
307a1(mdo sde): 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag
307a2(mdo sde): pa shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
307a3(mdo sde): shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /don thos nas skrag pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /don so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /yang dag pa'i chos nyid thos
307a4(mdo sde): nas skrag pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /nges pa'i tshig thams cad la skrag pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /nges
307a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob nas skrag pa med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa
307a6(mdo sde): ni| shes rab kyi las so/ /sems can la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /
307a7(mdo sde): bdag la byed pa dang / gzhan la byed pa la snying rje ba ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /mtha' gnyi ga bsal ba'i snying rje chen po ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /chos la
307b1(mdo sde): sems pa la mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i dga' ba ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba
307b2(mdo sde): ba dang bral ba'i btang snyoms ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gnyis dang bral ba ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos kyi
307b3(mdo sde): sku rab tu shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /chos rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /dge
307b4(mdo sde): 'dun rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /'dus ma byas su so sor rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa
307b5(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /tshul khrims mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni/ shes
307b6(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ /lha rjes su dran pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /thos pa la rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /'jig
307b7(mdo sde): rten thams cad la rtog pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /ma byas pa'i las byed pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las
308a1(mdo sde): so| |nga rgyal med pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /ye shes chen po thob pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /bdag gi don ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gnyi ga'i don ni/
308a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi las so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu 'dzin pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi las
308a3(mdo sde): so| |chos bstan pa shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
308a4(mdo sde): pa ni| shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu dgod pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /
308a5(mdo sde): srid par 'gro bar skye ba thams cad kyis skrag pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /bsam bzhin du skye ba ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni/ shes rab
308a6(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o/ /bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bzod pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /zad pa shes pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /mi skye ba shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ /rjes su mthun
308a7(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/ shes rab kyi las so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i sa ni/ shes
308b1(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /gang ci shes par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
308b2(mdo sde): bya ba de thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi
308b3(mdo sde): las so| |shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / las bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'khor gyi
308b4(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod pa'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
308b5(mdo sde): gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams 'di'ang
308b6(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / las bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
308b7(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bshad pa na rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid kyis nam mkha' yongs su 'dzin pa 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la
309a1(mdo sde): yongs su dris shing yongs su dri ba byas te/ sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/ /rkyen ni 'di yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
309a2(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub kyi sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa la spobs pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' shes
309a3(mdo sde): rab brtsegs la shes rab brtsegs zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi
309a4(mdo sde): khams 'byung ba bzang po na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal spas zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi
309a5(mdo sde): khams 'byung ba bzang po de'i sems can rnams ni bde bas tshim pas gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal spas de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems
309a6(mdo sde): dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur to/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni nyan thos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
309a7(mdo sde): p a dpal spas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spobs pa rgya chen po nye bar bzung ste dri ba bye ba phrag brgya ched du mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka'
309b1(mdo sde): stsal pa| skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi nang nas su dus ji srid cig na dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po 'di dri ba re re la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyas lan 'debs par spro/ de'i nang nas byang
309b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kha cig gis gsol pa/ mtshan mo 'di bas te lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/ dgung bdun na'o/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/ dgung zla phyed
309b3(mdo sde): na'o| |kha cig gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dris pa 'di dag bdag cag gis dgung zla gcig na lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya
309b4(mdo sde): ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal spas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag stan las mi
309b5(mdo sde): ldang zhing spyod lam 'khrug pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du bgyis te dri ba 'di bas par lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /skyes bu dam pa des seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags ma thag
309b6(mdo sde): tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /snang ba chen po'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ /snang ba des bskul nas sa bla'i lha
309b7(mdo sde): nas bzung ste gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'dus so/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po'ang 'dir 'dus par
310a1(mdo sde): gyur to| |de ltar skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas byang
310a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dran pa'i glos 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / gzungs kyi stobs
310a3(mdo sde): dang / spobs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang stobs kyis dri ba ched du mdzad pa bye ba phrag brgya po de kun tu bzung nas
310a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i mdun du dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po re re la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgyas lan btab ste/ phyed pa dang / rgyun
310a5(mdo sde): chad pa med pa dang / rjes su 'brel pa dang / tshig dang yig 'bru ldan pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis de'i lan btab pa dang / 'khor de las srog chags
310a6(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi bcu ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
310a7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal spas des de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen
310b1(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/ /sa bla'i lha nas bzung ste gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar kyi lha rnams kyis kye ma gang shes rab dang / spobs pa dang / bstan pa
310b2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs su 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgra byung ste sgra bsgrags so/ /de ltar na/ de shes rab brtsegs shes rab brtsegs zhes ming du
310b3(mdo sde): btags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za
310b4(mdo sde): ba lta na| khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya
310b5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ma mos gyur nas ma thos chos rnams rtag nyan
310b6(mdo sde): pa| |shes rab rtsa ba sems can dag pas thob nas ni/ /'dzin cing byams pas 'gro ba dag la ston byed pa/ /shes rab las te byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu byed/ /dpyod
310b7(mdo sde): pa'i dran pa chen po 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /dpyad nas 'gro la brtag tu ston pa shes rab las/ /gal te tshul bzhin rab sreg 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /de la sbyar nas ston pa shes rab
311a1(mdo sde): las zhes bya/ /yang dag sbyor la gal te sbyor ba shes rab rtsa/ /sgrub cing ston par byed pa de ni shes rab las/ /sems la nges par sems rnyed 'di ni shes
311a2(mdo sde): rab rtsa| |nges par sems pa spyod pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /gcig pu dben par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /lus dang sems la nga'i med 'di ni shes rab las/ /gang tshe
311a3(mdo sde): 'du 'dzis 'jigs gyur de ni shes rab rtsa/ /gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la rig byed shes rab las/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dga' ba 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /rig dang
