311a4(mdo sde): rnam par grol la reg 'di shes rab las/ /rnam thar gsum la mngon par brtson pa shes rab rtsa/ /rig gsum mngon du byed pa shes rab las zhes bya/ /gal te dran
311a5(mdo sde): ba nyer gzhag sgom pa shes rab rtsa/ /dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las/ /sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod pa shes rab rtsa/ /chos 'di rang bzhin spangs pa de ni
311a6(mdo sde): shes rab las/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi sgom shes rab rtsa/ /lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /dad pas mos nas yid ches pa ni shes rab rtsa//
311a7(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad gang bral de ni shes rab las/ /zhum med rtag tu brtson pa de ni shes rab rtsa/ /lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs de ni shes rab las/ /dran dang shes
311b1(mdo sde): bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las/ /rang gis ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa/ /rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod 'di
311b2(mdo sde): shes rab las/ /gal te shes rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa/ /'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad thos pa shes rab las/ /stobs lnga po dag rjes su sgom pa shes rab rtsa/ /bcom
311b3(mdo sde): nas ye shes thob pa de ni shes rab las/ /byang chub yan lag rjes mthun bzod pa shes rab rtsa/ /chos kun rjes su gang rtogs de ni shes rab las/ /lam gyi yan lag skye gnas sgrub
311b4(mdo sde): pa shes rab rtsa/ /chos dang chos min spon ba 'di ni shes rab las/ /sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las/
311b5(mdo sde): drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde tshig 'dzin shes rab rtsa/ /nges pa'i don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /don la rab tu rton pa 'di ni
311b6(mdo sde): shes rab las/ /rnam par shes la tshul bzhin tshol pa shes rab rtsa/ /ye shes la ni rab tu rton 'di shes rab las/ /gang zag gang la'ang ma zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /gal te
311b7(mdo sde): chos nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /'du byed mi rtag yongs su tshol ba shes rab rtsa/ /gal te gzod nas ma skyes shes pa shes rab las/ /'du byed sdug bsngal mos par
312a1(mdo sde): byed pa shes rab rtsa/ /chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos pa shes rab las/ /chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa/ /sems can 'di
312a2(mdo sde): dag gdod nas dag de shes rab las/ /mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa/ /'gro ba shin tu mya ngan 'das 'di shes rab las/ /don gyi rjes su rtogs pa 'di ni
312a3(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa/ /don rtogs so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las/ /gal te chos nyid mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa/ /chos la so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las/ /sgra rnams
312a4(mdo sde): kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab rtsa/ /nges tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las/ /skrag med blo yis spobs pa de ni shes rab rtsa/ /spobs pa so so yang dag rig pa shes
312a5(mdo sde): rab las/ /gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams de shes rab rtsa/ /dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las/ /bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /
312a6(mdo sde): gang gis gnyi gar mi rtog de ni shes rab las/ /mchog tu dga' la dga' ba thob 'di shes rab rtsa/ /dga' med gdung ba med pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /byams dang gnod
312a7(mdo sde): par mi byed de ni shes rab rtsa/ /gnyis las sems grol thob pa de ni shes rab las/ /blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa/ /gang tshe chos sku rjes su rtogs pa shes
312b1(mdo sde): rab las/ /chos kyang rtag tu dran pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /chos rnams 'dod chags bral bar rtogs pa shes rab las/ /yon tan las ni dge 'dun dran de shes rab rtsa/ /de yang 'dus
312b2(mdo sde): ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las/ /blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab rtsa/ /gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las/ /tshul khrims shin tu dag pa dran 'di shes
312b3(mdo sde): rab rtsa| |tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas ni shes rab las/ /che ba'i bdag nyid lha dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /dge nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /gang phyir bsgrims te
312b4(mdo sde): thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa/ /gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las/ /legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /las phyis mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes
312b5(mdo sde): rab las/ /nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa/ /ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 'di shes rab las/ /bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ /sems
312b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don byed 'di ni shes rab las/ /gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa/ /sems can spyod pa rjes su rtogs byed shes rab las/ /gzhan gyi blo la yang dag
312b7(mdo sde): thob byed shes rab rtsa/ /sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las/ /blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba dang / don byed sems can yongs su smin byed
313a1(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa/ /gal te don mthun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god/ /'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab las/ /srid pa kun tu 'bar zhes skrag
313a2(mdo sde): pa shes rab rtsa/ /mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab las/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste/ /dbang bskur de yis thob de ni shes rab las/ /gal te byang chub
313a3(mdo sde): shing drung 'dug pa shes rab rtsa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rig pa 'di ni shes rab las/ /byang chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya/ /sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni
313a4(mdo sde): shes rab las/ gang dag byang chub sems la rtag gnas mi g.yo ba/ /de dag shes rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed/ /rtsa ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems/ /
313a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig/ de yi bsngags pa bskal pa bye ba mang brjod kyang / /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' mar thug par 'gyur ba med/ /gang dag
313a6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar byung / /gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub dbang po/ /tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang / /de ni ma
313a7(mdo sde): myos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
313b1(mdo sde): kye ma ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di shin tu rnam par nges shing yi ge rnams kyis bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ don
313b2(mdo sde): gyis 'jug pa mtha' yas pa/ mi brtson pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pas zab pa/ gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar dka'
313b3(mdo sde): ba| skye mched drug la brten pa rnams kyis mthong bar dka' ba/ theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma lags
313b4(mdo sde): pa| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas phye ba ma mchis pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi slad du 'gyur
313b5(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa/ shin tu 'das pas kun gzhi ma mchis pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa/ rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
313b6(mdo sde): snang ba| nges par 'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thabs/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba/ mngon par shes pa thob pa
313b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rnam par dgrol bar bgyi ba/ tshul gcig la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba/ sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la khyad par ma
314a1(mdo sde): mchis pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas mnyam pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa ma mchis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid
314a2(mdo sde): pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ 'gog pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba/ yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du ma mchis pa/ don gyi yang dag par bzhag pa/ sgras rnam par rig
314a3(mdo sde): par bgyi ba/ don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa/ kun rdzob tu mchis pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mthu dang ldan pa/ theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
314a4(mdo sde): gsum po dag rab tu ston pa/ khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa/ rig pa gsum po dag khong du chud par bgyid pa/ rdo rje lta bur ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi
314a5(mdo sde): gnas| sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs
314a6(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa tshad ma mchis pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
314a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems skyed par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyid pa dang /
314b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams mang du
314b2(mdo sde): skyed pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no//
314b3(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ de dag bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
314b4(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi chad
314b5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/ mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ ston tam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston
314b6(mdo sde): tam| sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
314b7(mdo sde): to| |sangs rgyas spyan gyis zhing gang ngas mthong ba/ /rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs phyin yang / /'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na/ /de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o/ /gang gis
315a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i don ldan phra zad pa/ /mdo sde bzang bo 'di ni thos gyur na/ /kun tu 'dzin cing bzung nas klog byed pa/ /'di ni de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phags/ /
315a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyis nyer gnas shing / /chos kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min/ /de pas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo/ /de
315a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag/ khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyin dam pa'i chos
315a4(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su srung bar su spro/ /de nas byang chub
315a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang
315a6(mdo sde): chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus de na'ang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i
315a7(mdo sde): dus na skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi rna bar grags par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin
315b1(mdo sde): gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung / /bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas/ /byin
315b2(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis de dag la/ /mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ /byams pa chen po rab tu gnas/ /kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir/ /mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs
315b3(mdo sde): bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs/ /ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa/ /tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yis/ /mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms
315b4(mdo sde): la| |smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing / /lta ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang / /de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang / /lha dang dri
315b5(mdo sde): za klu dag kyang / /ngas ni byin gyis brlabs pa byas/ /sa dang de bzhin bar snang la/ /lha rnams mang po gang 'khod pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par
315b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing / /bden pa bzhi yis brgyan gyur pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /nam mkha' gzugs can
315b7(mdo sde): byed kyang srid/ /gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni/ /rnam par dkrug par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag
316a1(mdo sde): gis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams/ /mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du/ /rtsa lag dang
316a2(mdo sde): ni bcas rnams kyis/ /srung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal/ /mkhas pa byang chub blo gros kyis/ /gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas/ /rtag par kun tu
316a3(mdo sde): srung ba bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad pa gzo/ /'dren pa chos
316a4(mdo sde): kyi dbang bdag lags/ /mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /mdzad pa gzo ba srung bgyid cing / /'di
316a5(mdo sde): 'dra'i mdo dang de bzhin du/ /mdo sde 'dzin par srung bar 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /
316a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gang dang tshad med dang / /theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang / /de dag don ldan zab mo yi/ /mdo sde 'di las nges par 'byung / /bdag ni tshangs pa'i bde bor te/ /
316a7(mdo sde): gang na tshul 'di 'chad par ni/ /mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin du/ /bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyis tshigs su
316b1(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas gsung ba yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/ /skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas/ dga' ldan rnams su gnas par 'gyur//
316b2(mdo sde): mgon po bdag ni lha yul ba'i/ /phun sum tshogs pa por nas su/ /tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyid cing / /dzam+bu gling du gnas par spro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu nged
316b3(mdo sde): dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/ /de dag bdud las 'di sbyangs pas/ /bdud kyi dbang du mi
316b4(mdo sde): mchi'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni/ /mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du/ /ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur par/ /brtson par bgyid cing 'dun par bgyid/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
316b5(mdo sde): la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni/ /nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa/ /'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la/ /bdag
316b6(mdo sde): ni sgrib par mi bgyid do/ /mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der/ /bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis so/ /mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa/ /de la srung ba bgyid par 'tshal/ de nas bcom
316b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni/ /mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas/ /gang zhig mdo sde
317a1(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod/ /mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di/ /lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad/ /gang dag gus par nyan pa dag/ byang
317a2(mdo sde): chub yang dag 'dzin du stsal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ /mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te/ /
317a3(mdo sde): dam chos yongs su bsrung slad du/ /bdag kyang stong bgyid de dag ni/ /gsol ba ma btab bshes gnyen lags/ /bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni
317a4(mdo sde): byin rlabs kyis/ /'di lta bu yi mdo sde 'di/ /shin tu rgyas par bgyid par 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di
317a5(mdo sde): gnyis gsol to/ /ston pa las ni bdag gis su/ /mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang / /bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu/ /sngon chad nam yang ma thos so/ /mngon sum du ni
317a6(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di/ /blangs shing kun tu bzung lags te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ched du ni/ /shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin
317a7(mdo sde): dang | tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la legs so//
317b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag/ khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ /skyes bu
317b2(mdo sde): dam pa dag / khyed la bsgo'o/ /khyed kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa bzod pa ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
317b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bzung ste/ bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
317b4(mdo sde): ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan
317b5(mdo sde): thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ nga yongs su mya ngan
317b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi
317b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag ni /
318a1(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang gsal
318a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
318a3(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par
318a4(mdo sde): bkra bar byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do/ /gang gi slad du bdag cag gis
318a5(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don ma mchis pa ma lags so/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
318a6(mdo sde): pa'i sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
318a7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun du tshe yongs su skyong bar gyur cig /sems can thams cad la'ang
318b1(mdo sde): phan pa byed par gyur cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das
318b2(mdo sde): ji tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don bzang ba dang / tshig 'bru bzang ba dang / legs par brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu
318b3(mdo sde): dga' ba skyed pa dang / bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa dang / chos thams cad la mkhas par 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim
318b4(mdo sde): par bgyid pa dang / theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba dang /
318b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba las gti mug ma mchis par ston par ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
318b6(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i
318b7(mdo sde): phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /de bzhin gshegs
319a1(mdo sde): pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
319a2(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
319a3(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes
319a4(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra po d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad
319a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ga ga na gany+dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ /bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis
319a6(mdo sde): zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
319a7(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi
319b1(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
319b2(mdo sde): gnas mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs/ mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po
319b3(mdo sde): rab tu skyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i
319b4(mdo sde): mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/ /yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ mngon
319b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ rab tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni/ mnga'/ tshos thams cad la ni/ mnga' brnyes/
319b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni/ shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu ni/ byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi
319b7(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni/ mkhas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni/ rgyun ma bcad do/ /dge slong sa ya phrag drug gi dge
320a1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam
320a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/
320a3(mdo sde): chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/
320a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu
320a5(mdo sde): med| grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
320a6(mdo sde): tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
320a7(mdo sde): thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos nyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad yongs
320b1(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
320b2(mdo sde): dang / /spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lha
320b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
320b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
320b5(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / de dag la
320b6(mdo sde): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag gis mi lang /
320b7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems
321a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la rab tu ston te/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni thams cad dang ldan pa'i
321a2(mdo sde): 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na bdag 'dug pa snyam du sems so/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod pa nyid
321a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi mig sngar snang bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams
321a4(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su
321a5(mdo sde): snang ba lhag ma gzhan thams cad med par gyur te thams cad kyang nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pas shin tu bsregs te
321a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na
321a7(mdo sde): gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi mig sngar mi snang bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig
321b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo / /nam
321b2(mdo sde): mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa 'dug pa de dag ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa'i steng dang / gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi
321b3(mdo sde): snang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snang bar gyur to/ /
321b4(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/ gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i
321b5(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nyid du shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis seng+ge'i khri ni/ 'phang du dpag tshad khrir 'phags pa rab tu snang ngo / /gang la bcom ldan 'das
321b6(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i seng+ge'i khri nge'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
321b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams cad kyang mog mog por
322a1(mdo sde): byas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba mthong
322a2(mdo sde): nas phan tshun du smras pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni/ bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug par gyur kyang bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par
322a3(mdo sde): dbye ba bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ de tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ tshad med do/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus
322a4(mdo sde): g nas brtan shwa ri'i bu khang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btud nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
322a5(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' la mchis pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa 'di ma lags
322a6(mdo sde): pa gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyur cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin can du gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
322a7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
322b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
322b2(mdo sde): bdag gi tshe'i tshad bas par gyur kyang khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na 'khor 'di dag
322b3(mdo sde): t hams cad nam mkha' la song zhing khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang bzhin du bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang 'di
322b4(mdo sde): 'dra'o| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gang gi phyogs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ 'di
322b5(mdo sde): n as shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
322b6(mdo sde): khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da lta bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
322b7(mdo sde): khams de na byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo / /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
323a1(mdo sde): p a de'ang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na seng+ge'i khri dang bcas te ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon
323a2(mdo sde): par 'phags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po der nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan
323a3(mdo sde): te de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
323a4(mdo sde): de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni/ bskal par yang brjod mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis nga'i seng+ge'i khri 'di mthong
323a5(mdo sde): ngam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i
323a6(mdo sde): seng+ge'i khri'ang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag
323a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
323b1(mdo sde): dngos po med pas chos thams cad yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / snang bar gyur pa med
323b2(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang / rgyu dang dmigs pa med bas chos thams cad snang bar gyur ba med pa dang / nye bar zhi bar mtshan nyid pas chos thams
323b3(mdo sde): cad dmigs pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / so so tha dad pa med pas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang / tshul gcig la zhugs
323b4(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang / dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas chos
323b5(mdo sde): thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang / thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i
323b6(mdo sde): sgo dang / yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang / nang dang phyi'i rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang / rang bzhin
323b7(mdo sde): gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /
324a1(mdo sde): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / gzod ma nas ma byung bas chos thams cad mchan nyid med pa
324a2(mdo sde): dang / nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang / bdag po med pas chos thams cad nga yi ba med cing yongs su
324a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang / gzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
324a4(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang
324a5(mdo sde): dngos po med pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / sems dang lus dben pas
324a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med bas chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
324a7(mdo sde): rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigs su med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmigs
324b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas chos thams cad gnas med pa dang / kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / kun gzhi dang bral bas chos
324b2(mdo sde): thams cad kun gzhi med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug
324b3(mdo sde): pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam
324b4(mdo sde): par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod pa chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su thob bo/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams de'i byang chub
324b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pas brgyan cing / bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba'i rjes su song ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing blo shin tu byang ba/ bzod pas
324b6(mdo sde): brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags
324b7(mdo sde): pa| bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam
325a1(mdo sde): par rtsen pa/ shes rab kyis brgyan cing bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan
325a2(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa/ dga' ba chen
325a3(mdo sde): pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing sems can
325a4(mdo sde): thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go / yang shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig
325a5(mdo sde): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/ ye
325a6(mdo sde): shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/ gzungs kyis
325a7(mdo sde): sems brgyan pa/ thos pas dran pa brgyan pa/ nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/ rtog pas don rtogs pa brgyan pa/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/
325b1(mdo sde): khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan pa/ sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tshom med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/ mngon
325b2(mdo sde): par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing lag na rin po che gtong bas mngon par grub
325b3(mdo sde): pa| ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa/ mig
325b4(mdo sde): gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang don thams cad rtogs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas
325b5(mdo sde): brgyan cing don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa/ stobs kyis brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su
325b6(mdo sde): thob pa| mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/ chos
325b7(mdo sde): kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/ snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du thob pa/ 'od
326a1(mdo sde): kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar byed pa/ kun nas ston pas brgyan cing phyad par lung ston pa/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan
326a2(mdo sde): pas brgyan cing de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol pa thams cad ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams
326a3(mdo sde): cad kyis mngon par bstod pas brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad
326a4(mdo sde): kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ gang bkod pa 'di lta bu kun tu snang ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /shA
326a5(mdo sde): kyi'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de nga la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i
326a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang /
326a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
326b1(mdo sde): kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de la
326b2(mdo sde): g sol nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa sangs rgyas
326b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig
326b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de yang snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs
326b5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa/ 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nyi
326b6(mdo sde): ma rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shel dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang / s+tha la dang / s+tha la chen po dang / s+tha la rab
326b7(mdo sde): mdzes dang / dri ma med pa dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rnam dag 'od dang / gser du snang dang / nam mkha' snang ba dang / reg gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / 'dab
327a1(mdo sde): brgya pa dang / ze ba stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel ba dang / dga' byed dang / lha'i stong dang / klu'i me tog dang / dga' ba bde ba kun skyed pa dang /
327a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris dga' ba dang / lus sems tshim byed dang / stong gsum dri dang / nad kun zhi byed dang / nad kun sel dang / bdag gi gzi brjid kyis
327a3(mdo sde): brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpas rig pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
327a4(mdo sde): 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /de nas thams cad dang
327a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug
327a6(mdo sde): pa 'di dag ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bkod pa chen
327a7(mdo sde): po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
327b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
327b2(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa
327b3(mdo sde): gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam ces snyun gsol zhing / byang
327b4(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i tshos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal
327b5(mdo sde): ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing / chos chen po dang ldan pas slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod
327b6(mdo sde): cig / ces de skad kyang gsung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin
327b7(mdo sde): po che'i gdugs byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod/ chos dang don dang yon
328a1(mdo sde): tan ye shes 'phags pas na/ /yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med/ /gnas med nam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu brnyes/ /rab zab kun
328a2(mdo sde): nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang / /gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/ /sems can rnams
328a3(mdo sde): la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/ /bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston/ /khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med/ /tshig gi rang bzhin
328a4(mdo sde): brag ca'i mtshan nyid gzung du med/ /sgra med rtags med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang / /byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung / /sems can kun
328a5(mdo sde): gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig / khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ji 'dra rab mkhyen kyang / /sems dang
328a6(mdo sde): yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas/ /'gro ba rnams la khyed kyis spyod pa kun bstan te/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma mchis/ /gang gi gzugs
328a7(mdo sde): dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar/ /mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang de yi tshul du ston/ /bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa med/ /khyod ni chos la gnas pa
328b1(mdo sde): med cing 'dzin pa med/ /sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas/ /khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston/ /rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa
328b2(mdo sde): na| |gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad skal pa mi mnyam nas/ /khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med mtshan med de/ /'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzad//
328b3(mdo sde): chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/ /byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes/ /bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/ /byang chub mi
328b4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa brnyes/ /mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med/ /stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gso ba ste ya ma brla/ /khyod kyis de 'dra'i
328b5(mdo sde): chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su/ /'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston/ /chos 'di sems can med cing srog dang gang zag med/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas na
328b6(mdo sde): ming yang rnam par dag / sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa/ /mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad/ /brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis
328b7(mdo sde): byang chub 'di tshol phyir/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar spyad/ /sgrub pa med pa'i nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste/ /gang phyir spyod pa'i don de rjes su thob
329a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen/ /mnyam pa nyid
329a2(mdo sde): la mnyam nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog / de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba/ /phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po chu zla
329a3(mdo sde): 'dra ste 'pho ba med/ /sems can rnams ni rmi lam lta bur dngos med de/ /mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung / /byang chub mchog rab brda yi rang
329a4(mdo sde): bzhin khyod kyis brnyes/ /de ni thob dang ma thob pa zhes brjod du med/ /ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang / /tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab
329a5(mdo sde): tu bskor/ /rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab sgrol ba/ /grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu grol/ /theg chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs
329a6(mdo sde): 'byin cing / /nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /gang na sems can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis/ /sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems
329a7(mdo sde): can nyid mi sgrub/ /sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad/ /nam mkha' la ni gzugs
329b1(mdo sde): rnams nam yang mi snang bzhin/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs/ /chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de/ /gang gis de ltar
329b2(mdo sde): don rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa/ /ci tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gis dper bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te/ /rang gi yon
329b3(mdo sde): tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra/ /gnyis med bsngags brjod de ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa/ /
329b4(mdo sde): sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyi mi yi seng+ge bsngags/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags/ /sems
329b5(mdo sde): can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam/ /thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi/ /chos kun 'dod chags bral ba mtshan gyi tshul
329b6(mdo sde): shes pa| |des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
329b7(mdo sde): ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
330a1(mdo sde): kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/ byang
330a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun tu brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ rmi lam na'ang
330a3(mdo sde): mngon par zhen pas dmigs par lta ba mi 'byung ngo / /gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang / gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni/
330a4(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du/ /de dag kyang seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo / /de nas byang
330a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'dus pa chen
330a6(mdo sde): po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
330a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ da skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi
330b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tshom du gyur pa de nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo
330b2(mdo sde): la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tshom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bzhin
330b3(mdo sde): gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye na/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mi chags pa'i ye
330b4(mdo sde): shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa/ ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ snang ba brnyes pa ste/ mun pa thams cad
330b5(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ don mkhyen pa ste/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ dus mkhyen pa ste/ tshod las mi 'da' zhing
330b6(mdo sde): phyad par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ chod mkhyen pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so rigs par chos ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon
330b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems can thams
331a1(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun tu ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/
331a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni/ zil gyis ma non pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon med
331a3(mdo sde): par chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag
331a4(mdo sde): pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu bsgribs pa dang / shin tu
331a5(mdo sde): bsgribs pa dang / kun nas sdang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan
331a6(mdo sde): 'das ni/ stobs dang / drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mi
331a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa
331b1(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs
331b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul ba dang ca co mi mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / rnam
331b3(mdo sde): par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'gras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems
331b4(mdo sde): snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ thugs rje chen po la gnas pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang /
331b5(mdo sde): nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi skyod pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sangs rgyas thams
331b6(mdo sde): cad dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing sems
331b7(mdo sde): can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dod pa med pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang
332a1(mdo sde): bral ba| bcom ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ de ltar
332a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang / chos dang / ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang / ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te
332a3(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces sbras su bgye ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
332a4(mdo sde): kyis mngon par sgrub pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
332a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
332a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid du
332a7(mdo sde): lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der
332b1(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
332b2(mdo sde): zhu bar 'dod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs
332b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa slar smras pa/ gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs/ /shin tu bsam sems ye shes mnyam la gnas/ /sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul//
332b4(mdo sde): de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o/ /snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med/ /yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pa/ /nges byas rnam par thar pa la gzhag pa/ /de dag ched du bde
332b5(mdo sde): bar gshegs la zhu/ /bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid/ /sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'/ /sems can bdag med gnyis las thar byed pa/ /rnam
332b6(mdo sde): par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'di'o/ /cho ga spyod yul brtul zhugs yongs su dag /bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra/ /lhun po lta bar brtan cing mi g.yo ba/ /de
332b7(mdo sde): dag ched du don yod mdzad la zhu/ /mi ldog brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang / /dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra yi nga rgyal bcom/ /nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri sbyong ba/
333a1(mdo sde): mthong dga' de dag don du 'di zhu'o/ /thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'/ /bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur/ /mngon
333a2(mdo sde): shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od/ /rab dag dri med don du bdag zhu'o/ /stong pa mtshan ma med cing mi smon gnas/ /bsam bzhin shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston/ /skyes
333a3(mdo sde): pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med/ /de dag don du mi yi spyod pa zhu/ /nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis/ /rtogs par dka' zhing zab mo mthong dka' ba/ /skye
333a4(mdo sde): bo kun gyi yid rnams kun skul ba'i/ /chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la zhu/ /legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'/ /chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las
333a5(mdo sde): grol| |rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'/ /sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs ba'i don du zhu/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'/ /rtag tu sangs
333a6(mdo sde): rgyas bstod pa kun med blo/ /grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos/ /yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
333a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
333b1(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam
333b2(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams
333b3(mdo sde): lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes
333b4(mdo sde): su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang
333b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod de sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon
333b6(mdo sde): mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad
333b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
334a1(mdo sde): dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang
334a2(mdo sde): bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel
334a3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin
334a4(mdo sde): nyid dbyer med pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams lags/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa rnams lags/
334a5(mdo sde): bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag
334a6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjod par spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
334a7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa rnams lags/ skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing
334b1(mdo sde): bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/ bsod nams kyis tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/
334b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams lags/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad
334b3(mdo sde): kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams lags/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung dmar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
334b4(mdo sde): lags| cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang / mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa
334b5(mdo sde): rnams lags/ myur du theg pa chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
334b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
334b7(mdo sde): don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /'di lta ste/ khyod ni/ sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob
335a1(mdo sde): pa| byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos las mi dom
335a2(mdo sde): pa| ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las
335a3(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha'
335a4(mdo sde): rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
335a5(mdo sde): kyis yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
335a6(mdo sde): mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
335a7(mdo sde): pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnam par
335b1(mdo sde): dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas byang chub rnam par dag pa
335b2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin
335b3(mdo sde): pa de byin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/
335b4(mdo sde): lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin
335b5(mdo sde): pa de byin/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin te/ de rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de byin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha'
335b6(mdo sde): med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing sgrib pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam
335b7(mdo sde): mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral
336a1(mdo sde): bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa med par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam
336a2(mdo sde): mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mi
336a3(mdo sde): gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar
336a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams
336a5(mdo sde): cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de byin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha'
336a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la nga yi ba med pa de bzhin du sems
336a7(mdo sde): can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de byin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub ste/
336b1(mdo sde): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub
336b2(mdo sde): sems dpas sbyin pa de byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad
336b3(mdo sde): yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bur mi gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha'
336b4(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
336b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang
336b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag gi rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam par dag pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos
336b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa/ shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa/ sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems rnam par dag pa/
337a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs med pa ste/ gzugs su ston pa dang / mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mun pa
337a2(mdo sde): med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mi zad pa'i
337a3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa' nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/
337a4(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par
337a5(mdo sde): spyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa de
337a6(mdo sde): dang / de dag ni/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so/ /
337a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin/ /byang chub phyir te rnam smin yong mi 'dod/ /dga'
337b1(mdo sde): zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de/ /rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin/ /mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su/ /lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /
337b2(mdo sde): de dag la ni nam yang 'dzin pa med/ /de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges/ /thams cad gtang yang mi dgar mi 'gyur zhing / /de la zhum pa med de gong ba med/ /de yis nam
337b3(mdo sde): mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms/ /de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa med/ /bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag /byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa
337b4(mdo sde): byin/ /de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par/ /spros pa med par sbyin pa rab tu byin/ /sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam pas sbyin pa gtong / /rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med
337b5(mdo sde): par sbyin/ /bsam pa yengs dag dri ma med pa yis/ /thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dod/ /lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra/ /longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin
337b6(mdo sde): snying po med/ /'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas/ /'jig rten chos kyis mgos sbyin pa byin/ /nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong / /rgyal ba'i tshig gi
337b7(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur snyam ste/ /bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed/ /de ltar brtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin/ /stobs bcus byin pa rtsa ba yin zhes
338a1(mdo sde): gsungs/ /de la rab tu gnas na tshul khrims ldan/ /tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed/ /bsam gtan ma chags shes rab
338a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed/ /sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim/ /nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye/ /sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs/ /phan dang bde ba
338a3(mdo sde): 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu/ /sbyin gtong nyon mongs spang zhing dge ba'i phyir/ /des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur/ /pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste/ /bdag blo rnam
338a4(mdo sde): dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo / /ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong / /de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong / /ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong / /de lta de ltar
338a5(mdo sde): sems can brgya tshim byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi
338a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam
338a7(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / brag ca lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de
338b1(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu| brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims
338b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan
338b3(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad
338b4(mdo sde): du mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa dang / /mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa
338b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba med pa dang / byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
338b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ nam mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' dri
338b7(mdo sde): ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dri ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zhi ba'o/ /nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi mtho ba'o/ /nam
339a1(mdo sde): mkha' mi dma' ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi dma' ba'o/ /nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gzung du med pa'o/ /nam mkha'
339a2(mdo sde): gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gnas med pa'o/ /nam mkha' med pa ma yin te/ tshul khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o/ /nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang
339a3(mdo sde): rtag pa'o/ /nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' rgyu ba med
339a4(mdo sde): pa ste| tshul khrims de'ang rgyu ba med pa'o/ /nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang spros pa med pa'o/ /nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zag pa med
339a5(mdo sde): pa'o| |nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi 'gyur ba'o/ /nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog
339a6(mdo sde): pa ste| tshul khrims de'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad du song ba'o/ /nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste/ tshul
339a7(mdo sde): khrims de'ang mi chod mi phyed pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs
339b1(mdo sde): bcan ma yin pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tshul khrims nam
339b2(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sems kyi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med/ /lus dang sems
339b3(mdo sde): kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams/ /mkhas pa rtag tu nad zhi tshul khrims dregs mi stems/ /blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton/ /las gang ma byas ma
339b4(mdo sde): bsam de bzhin ma brtags te/ /de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas/ /gzugs med mi bden mi g.yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /tshul khrims lta ba'i gnas
339b5(mdo sde): med mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags/ /tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa/ /gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul
339b6(mdo sde): khrims brten/ /de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i gzhi/ /gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa/ /yo byad bsnyungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs
339b7(mdo sde): sems sbyangs pa/ /tshul khrims de yi gnas des sems rkang thar pa'i rten/ /de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thar gnas pa/ /g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i
340a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs gcod/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod/ /byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun mi rtog /gang
340a2(mdo sde): mkhas chos shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/ bam po gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub
340a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang
340a4(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang / sems
340a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar mi spyod ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
340a6(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa
340a7(mdo sde): 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam
340b1(mdo sde): mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni /mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams
340b2(mdo sde): cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ ma smad ma nyams ba ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam
340b3(mdo sde): mkha' ni/ bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i
340b4(mdo sde): bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ ma skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa thams cad
340b5(mdo sde): la khyab pa ste/ byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
340b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang / 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin
340b7(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smon pa med pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod
341a1(mdo sde): kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la
341a2(mdo sde): bzod kyang skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam
341a3(mdo sde): par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o/ /bzod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di dag
341a4(mdo sde): bdag la gshe'ang bzod do/ /snyam pa de ni/ nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di dag gshe ba bdag gis bzod par bya'o//
341a5(mdo sde): snyam pa de ni/ ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni/ yi ge bsnor ba'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ sgra dang / skad kyi bzod pa ste/ de ni/
341a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di'ang stong pa/ bdag kyang stong pa'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
341a7(mdo sde): bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag gis bzod pa bya'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
341b1(mdo sde): shing sA la chen po'i tshal yod par la la zhig 'ongs te shing sA la bcad na/ de la shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni/ bcad do/ /bdag ni/ ma bcad do/ /
341b2(mdo sde): snyam du mi sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med de/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ gang bzod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
341b3(mdo sde): bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad
341b4(mdo sde): gtsang / /yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms/ /phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o/ /lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi
341b5(mdo sde): shing rtsig pa 'dra/ /sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra/ /chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med nam mkha' bzhin/ /lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med/ /bkur sti byed la dga' dang
341b6(mdo sde): zhe sdang med/ /mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med/ /theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de/ /sems can dag par bstan 'dir bzod smra yin/ /srog med gang zag bdag med
341b7(mdo sde): sems can med/ /chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing / /rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed/ /de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid/ /kha ngan zer ba'i tshig
342a1(mdo sde): thos mi gshe zhing / /byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin/ /bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de/ /bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma
342a2(mdo sde): bzod smra yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
342a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom pa yang chos thams cad yongs su
342a4(mdo sde): ma grub par rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes
342a5(mdo sde): su mthong ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
342a6(mdo sde): kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
342a7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang
342b1(mdo sde): gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi
342b2(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang
