342b3(mdo sde): gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu sdud par byed kyang de gcig nas gcig tu sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang
342b4(mdo sde): gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam par brtags te yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang
342b5(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad
342b6(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed pa de'ang sgra brag ca dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de'ang chos kyi
342b7(mdo sde): dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su
343a1(mdo sde): dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di gnyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
343a2(mdo sde): yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so/ /de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o/ /yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ len pa
343a3(mdo sde): med pa| 'dor ba med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang / ngag dang / sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu brtags nas mi dmigs
343a4(mdo sde): shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin
343a5(mdo sde): n o| |ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing
343a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams
343a7(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog skye'ang
343b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyes kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do/ /ji
343b2(mdo sde): l tar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i
343b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad
343b4(mdo sde): la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su
343b5(mdo sde): mi mthong zhing / gang la rtsom pa de'ang rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
343b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas/ /lus dang srog la'ang phangs par mi byed cing / /bdag nyid chen
343b7(mdo sde): po byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /sems can phan pa'i don byed phan sems pa/ /sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ci srid pa/ /byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor/ /de dag skyo bar
344a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'ang yong med de/ /phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed/ /sems can bsam mi khyab pa dgrol bar brtson/ /sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa
344a2(mdo sde): mchod par brtson/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab lta bar brtson/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson/ /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson/ /tshul
344a3(mdo sde): khrims bsam gyis mi khyab srung bar brtson/ /bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson/ /bsam gtan bsam gyis mi
344a4(mdo sde): khyab sems par brtson/ /shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /don dang yon tan sgrub pa rab tu brtson/ /srog dang
344a5(mdo sde): lus kyang mi phangs brtson par byed/ /nyon mongs 'thab pa kun las rnam par grol/ /stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon par brtson/ /bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid
344a6(mdo sde): brtson| |lta las rnam grol byang chub phyir yang brtson/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson/ /sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob/ /g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams ston
344a7(mdo sde): par brtson/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol/ /bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson/ /chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das/ /sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la
344b1(mdo sde): brtson| |'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med/ /sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha' med de/ /mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus
344b2(mdo sde): sbyor| |sems can spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug / chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gag med de/ /mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing / /phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed
344b3(mdo sde): de| |'di 'dra'i chos la sems can sgom du btsud/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
344b4(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag 'jog la nang du sems gnas par
344b5(mdo sde): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba'ang mi dmigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams
344b6(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems kyi sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
344b7(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs
345a1(mdo sde): su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang
345a2(mdo sde): khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la
345a3(mdo sde): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas
345a4(mdo sde): te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la
345a5(mdo sde): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i
345a6(mdo sde): sems ni/ bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la mi mtho mi dma' ba/ mi bstod mi smod pa/ 'gyur
345a7(mdo sde): ba med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ gsog pa med pa/ 'bri ba med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ gtong ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par
345b1(mdo sde): rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/
345b2(mdo sde): spros pa med pa/ gsog pa med pa/ bri ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa/ 'jigs pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa/ gang sems mi gnas pa
345b3(mdo sde): de ni| sems nges par rtog pa'o/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam
345b4(mdo sde): par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par
345b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed
345b6(mdo sde): do| |sems nges par rtog pa ni/ ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa reg cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems
345b7(mdo sde): nges par rtog pa ni/ reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lus dang / reg pa dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges
346a1(mdo sde): par rtog pa ni/ chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//
346a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pas sreg pa na nam mkha' mi 'tshig cing / chus 'jigs pa na nam mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
346a3(mdo sde): dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
346a4(mdo sde): par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang ma tshogs pa yin no/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'ang yin la sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do/ /mnyam
346a5(mdo sde): par bzhag kyang dga' ba med la langs nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs
346a6(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do/ /mnyam par bzhag cing mnyam pa'ang yin la mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston
346a7(mdo sde): pa'ang rab tu ston to/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa'ang mi mthong ngo / /mi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do/ /de ni/ mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba
346b1(mdo sde): med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/ /shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes
346b2(mdo sde): bya'o| |gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no/ /de nas
346b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis dbang po yongs su dag /dran pa rtse gcig yid ni mnyam par bzhag /gnas rnams thams
346b4(mdo sde): cad la yang mi gnas shing / /'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi/ /phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing / /nye bar zhi ba dben
346b5(mdo sde): pa spyod yul te/ /mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid/ /shin tu dben
346b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so/ /'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'chi'i pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang / /ting nge
346b7(mdo sde): 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te/ /de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o/ /gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la/ /sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /
347a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed de/ /de dag bdag dang sems can mi gnas so/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/ /sgyu ma dang /
347a2(mdo sde): yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra/ /rmi lam mchu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du/ /chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /'gro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod yul dang / /'gro ba
347a3(mdo sde): rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing / /sems rgyud la ni sgrib pa med pa ste/ /rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes/ /bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis//
347a4(mdo sde): zhing rnams mang po bye bar der 'gro zhing / /mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i yid/ /rgyal ba bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed/ /dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i
347a5(mdo sde): yid| |zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog pa/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid/ /rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag /mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yod med la//
347a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid ces bya bar mtshan med de/ /mnyam nyid de la gang dag rab gnas pa/ /de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
347a7(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs
347b1(mdo sde): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa
347b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / /don rnam par
347b3(mdo sde): dag pas yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
347b4(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni/ 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub
347b5(mdo sde): kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang
347b6(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par snang yang nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang
347b7(mdo sde): ston la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang
348a1(mdo sde): las byed cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu
348a2(mdo sde): dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba la rab tu rnyed pa yin gyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab
348a3(mdo sde): tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/ /yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa kun nas
348a4(mdo sde): 'bar ba med pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go /gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rnam par mi rtog
348a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig go / yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go /'gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni/ bden pa'i tshig go /ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
348a6(mdo sde): 'di ni| yang dag pa'i tshig go / bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni/ yid rno ba'i tshig go /'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni/ ngoms pa'i tshig go /shin
348a7(mdo sde): tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go /brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ don gyi tshig go /khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mtshungs pa'i tshig go /
348b1(mdo sde): mi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ snying po'i tshig go /mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ ma g.yos pa'i tshig go /rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rdo rje'i tshig go /byed pa byas pa'i phyir
348b2(mdo sde): 'di ni| sgrol ba'i tshig go / rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rnam par dag pa'i tshig go /snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mun pa med pa'i
348b3(mdo sde): tshig go / sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i tshig go /shin tu zab cing byang ba'i phyir 'di ni/ zad pa'i tshig go /'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi zad pa'i
348b4(mdo sde): tshig go / sbyor ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nam mkha'i tshig go /sgrib pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nam mkha'i tshig go /gnas
348b5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni/ kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go /ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshig go /rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di
348b6(mdo sde): ni| ye shes kyi tshig go / gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi rdzi ba'i tshig go /mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni/ lus med pa'i tshig go /kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir
348b7(mdo sde): 'di ni| yongs su shes pa'i tshig go / sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni/ kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i tshig go /rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni/ 'gog
349a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig go / gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni/ sgom pa'i tshig go /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni/ sangs
349a2(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i tshig go / rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni/ chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i phyir 'di
349a3(mdo sde): ni| shes rab ces bya'o/ /gang nges par bstan pa thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung du la'ang mi rtog rnam
349a4(mdo sde): par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
349a5(mdo sde): dag gsungs so/ /shes rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod/ /rab tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing / /rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston/ /mtha' rnams
349a6(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gcod par byed/ /bdag dang sems can la'ang mi gnas shing / /gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis las
349a7(mdo sde): thar byed de/ /shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan/ /shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs med/ /shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol/ /shes rab ye shes
349b1(mdo sde): byed cing rnam par spyod/ /shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston/ /shes rab kyis ni sgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong / /phung po khams ni yongs su shes pa'i mtshan/ /mtshan dang mtshan
349b2(mdo sde): gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa/ /shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes/ /yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mi gos spyod/ /spyad
349b3(mdo sde): pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod/ /shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes/ /mig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing / /dbang po lnga ni yongs su snang bar byed/ /'gro ba lnga
349b4(mdo sde): rnams rab tu gcod par byed/ /phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to/ /pha rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing / /chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas/ /bar snang dang
349b5(mdo sde): ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthun zhing 'phags/ /rnyed dang mi rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' las grol/ /dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa/ /gang rnams
349b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi/ /'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/ /sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs/ /lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu
349b7(mdo sde): 'chad| |bden pa shes par shes rab 'di 'jug ste/ /des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad/ /zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin/ /chos rnams thams
350a1(mdo sde): cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben/ /sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs/ /shes rab blos dpyod pas ni 'di shes so/ /rigs kyi
350a2(mdo sde): bu| de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ de
350a3(mdo sde): dag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
350a4(mdo sde): ' du byed pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed cing de dag thams cad
350a5(mdo sde): kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad med par rab tu gnas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bdag gis bsod nams tshad
350a6(mdo sde): med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems
350a7(mdo sde): dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis
350b1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can
350b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su
350b3(mdo sde): 'jug pas sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang ye shes dang spyod lam tshad med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs
350b4(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par
350b5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang dpyod pa tshad med pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan
350b6(mdo sde): tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su sbyang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma la
350b7(mdo sde): rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug pa ltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sgyu dang
351a1(mdo sde): g.yo med par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang mthun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs
351a2(mdo sde): kyi bu| tshad med pa bcu po de dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ nam byang chub
351a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de nam mkha' tshad med pas de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med par kun tu gnas te/ de bas na/ bsod
351a4(mdo sde): nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams
351a5(mdo sde): cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang
351a6(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang
351a7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon
351b1(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can
351b2(mdo sde): gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can rnams
351b3(mdo sde): dang / gang zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
351b4(mdo sde): zag gzhan la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
351b5(mdo sde): zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos
351b6(mdo sde): 'chad do/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
351b7(mdo sde): gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu 'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis su med pa'i
352a1(mdo sde): mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang gi
352a2(mdo sde): dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de gti mug gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so/ /de bas na/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang
352a3(mdo sde): dag par 'du'o/ /zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ gar yang 'gro ba med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med do/ /chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings
352a4(mdo sde): shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so/ /de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings dang / bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos
352a5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o/ /gang rab tu snang ba de bla ga ba med pa'o/ /
352a6(mdo sde): gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do/ /gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni/ nam mkha'o/ /gang de ltar ye shes
352a7(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub
352b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams
352b2(mdo sde): pa'o| |ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur pa'o/ /shes rab las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos
352b3(mdo sde): thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sems gnyis pa la'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
352b4(mdo sde): mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la'ang mi chags pa'o/ /stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang
352b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba'o/ /mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas
352b6(mdo sde): rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ gang gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi
352b7(mdo sde): mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs
353a1(mdo sde): rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rje su 'ang 'gro ba'o/ /phung po dang / khams
353a2(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'ang
353a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'o/ /gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni/ yid la byed pa thams cad med de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o//
353a4(mdo sde): gang de lta bu rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su
353a5(mdo sde): dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags pa mi byed do/ /'gro ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba
353a6(mdo sde): dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed
353a7(mdo sde): do| |de dran pa yid la mi byed pas gzugs dang / mtshan dang / chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs
353b1(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ gang la mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas gyis gnang ba'i chos rjes
353b2(mdo sde): su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags med pa'o/ /de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ kun gzhi
353b3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang / yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la
353b4(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do//
353b5(mdo sde): chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /yang chos rjes su dran pa ni/ gang gis
353b6(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ba ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas mi
353b7(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang de lta bu'i gnas ni/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so/ /gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rtogs
354a1(mdo sde): pa ste| 'di ni/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon
354a2(mdo sde): par rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do/ /chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa
354a3(mdo sde): med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge
354a4(mdo sde): 'dun zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so/ /gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa
354a5(mdo sde): med pa de ni/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni/ gdags pa dang / tha snyad do/ /'dus ma byas ni/ gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
354a6(mdo sde): pa'o| |tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems
354a7(mdo sde): dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya ba ni/ phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des
354b1(mdo sde): chos gang yang btang ba med do/ /'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de na/ gtong ba'i mchog go /gang
354b2(mdo sde): mi 'dzin pa de ni/ mi gtong ngo / /gang mi gtong ba de ni/ mi snye mas so/ /gang mi snyems pa de ni/ dmigs par mi byed do/ /dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do/ /rgyu ba
354b3(mdo sde): med pa ni/ sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o/ /gang la sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni/
354b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni/
354b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni/ rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang bsngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang
354b6(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ chos dang / chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su med pa de yid la byed pa ci yang
354b7(mdo sde): med do| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
355a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa
355a2(mdo sde): med pa| smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin
355a3(mdo sde): gyis gnas te/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ gnyis kyis rab tu
355a4(mdo sde): phye ba ma yin no/ /mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /bde ba thams cad
355a5(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims
355a6(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang
355a7(mdo sde): zhe na| gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas
355b1(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no/ /yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni/ spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu
355b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams
355b3(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don
355b4(mdo sde): dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
355b5(mdo sde): stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi
355b6(mdo sde): lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o/ /zhes spyi bo lta bu'i
355b7(mdo sde): chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no/ /de'i dran pa de ni/ lta bsam 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas ma
356a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi
356a2(mdo sde): bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba
356a3(mdo sde): ni| nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nyid mtshams sbyor
356a4(mdo sde): ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing /sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rnam
356a5(mdo sde): par rol pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni/ shin tu byin gyis brlabs/ shes rab dang / ye shes ni/ shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni/ sgom pa
356a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag / sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni/ gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu skyed pa'am/ 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing /
356a7(mdo sde): ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba'i las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag
356b1(mdo sde): bar zhugs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang mi 'chad do/ /de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes
356b2(mdo sde): kyi sgo gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang
356b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa gang yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di
356b4(mdo sde): ni| sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos
356b5(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas
356b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan
356b7(mdo sde): nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe
357a1(mdo sde): sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal pa mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dud 'gro'i
357a2(mdo sde): skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/
357a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/
357a4(mdo sde): nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na mtho ba med pa yin
357a5(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
357a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ mi zad pa
357a7(mdo sde): s te| sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug
357b1(mdo sde): pa'ang de snyed do/ /ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o/ /
357b2(mdo sde): chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas
357b3(mdo sde): bshad pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin no/ /ma nor ba de bzhin no/ /gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la
357b4(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
357b5(mdo sde): ces bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom
357b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur
357b7(mdo sde): kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal ba bye ba brag stong du'ang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so/ /yang don gcig tu bstan te ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
358a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do/ /de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing don thams cad mi
358a2(mdo sde): nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ /bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar
358a3(mdo sde): gcod| nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas
358a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo
358a5(mdo sde): nyid du byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o/ /yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul
358a6(mdo sde): gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis
358a7(mdo sde): mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul
358b1(mdo sde): gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags
358b2(mdo sde): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ltar rigs kyi bu/ tha snyad du gzhan rnam par rig pa la brten nas de 'dra ba
358b3(mdo sde): chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni/ tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/ /de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
358b4(mdo sde): dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la
358b5(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems
358b6(mdo sde): can gyi khams ni/ thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtse ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas sems
358b7(mdo sde): can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ /srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yang de 'di
359a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa dang / yang
359a2(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo/ /de la byang chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir sems can
359a3(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to/ /sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang chub
359a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor
359a5(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra
359a6(mdo sde): bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo/ /sbyin pa ni/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas sbyin pa'i
359a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims ni/ lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams tshul khrims
359b1(mdo sde): la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba des de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bzod pa dang /
359b2(mdo sde): des pa ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pas byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin
359b3(mdo sde): te| phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
359b4(mdo sde): thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus ba rtsams nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i
359b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsdos nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan ni/ sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pa'i rgyu
359b6(mdo sde): ste| byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol
359b7(mdo sde): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thos pa ni/ shes rab che ba'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni/ dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i
360a1(mdo sde): thos pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de dge
360a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang / gang bsags pa de dang / de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang / rkyen de ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o//
360a3(mdo sde): gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni/ bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag ni/ bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do//
360a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo / /ji ltar bdag ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam
360a5(mdo sde): du zad do/ /de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro/ /gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
360a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ji ltar na/
360a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs
360b1(mdo sde): la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug
360b2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang
360b3(mdo sde): ldan| tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing lus dben/ sems dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar 'gro zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/
360b4(mdo sde): yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtag pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs
360b5(mdo sde): pa| snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs
360b6(mdo sde): bsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya la da bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes rab shin tu bsgoms
360b7(mdo sde): pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su mthun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par sgrub pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa bskyed do/ byang
361a1(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong /
361a2(mdo sde): sgra thams cad thos/ sems thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ zag pa
361a3(mdo sde): zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing / yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin
361a4(mdo sde): du lhun gyis grub par gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
361a5(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ zab
361a6(mdo sde): mo zhes bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/
361a7(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen/
361b1(mdo sde): gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
361b2(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs
361b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /de la
361b4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes
361b5(mdo sde): pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba
361b6(mdo sde): 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags
361b7(mdo sde): pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smra sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig
362a1(mdo sde): 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i
362a2(mdo sde): rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni/ chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
362a3(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa
362a4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /rang gi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams
362a5(mdo sde): sbyor ba shes so/ /gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs
362a6(mdo sde): ni| kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang mi dmigs pa de ni/ zab mo'o/ /bdag ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma
362a7(mdo sde): nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par dag go /de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma
362b1(mdo sde): skyes| ma skyed/ ma 'gags/ mi 'gag pa ste/ de bas na/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang la
362b2(mdo sde): mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni/ yul du bgrang ba ma yin no/ /gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni/ don dam pa
362b3(mdo sde): ste| de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o/ /de la sems dang / yid 'dzin pa med de rtogs par dka' ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la
362b4(mdo sde): ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing sems can gzhan la'ang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang /
362b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/ bam po gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
362b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang
362b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang rten pa de ni/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ gang rten pa de ni/ dngos po med pa/ gang rten pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa/ gang rten cing
363a1(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba de ni/ mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gang rten pa de la ni/ bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba
363a2(mdo sde): med| skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang rten pa de la ni/ yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang rten pa de la ni/ ci'ang med pa/
363a3(mdo sde): rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba ni/ chos kho na skye/ 'gag pa ni/ chos kho na 'gag ste/
363a4(mdo sde): 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shes las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o/ /chos gang dag rten cing 'brel
363a5(mdo sde): par 'byung ba de dag la ni/ skye ba ci'ang med cing bdag po med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji
363a6(mdo sde): ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba ni/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med/
363a7(mdo sde): 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na/ 'byung gi /rkyen ma tshang na/ 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba ni/ mthar
363b1(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni/ chad pa dang / rtag pa ste/ de gang mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni/ chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral
363b2(mdo sde): ste| de'i phyir dag pas na/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te
363b3(mdo sde): mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid dbyar med pa shes pa
363b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin dbyer med pa de ni/ phyag rgya ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod
363b5(mdo sde): pa| bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
363b6(mdo sde): rten ni/ phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni/ shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin
363b7(mdo sde): tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha' phyag
364a1(mdo sde): rgya| shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i phyag rgya ma snang ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de'ang spyan lnga la mi snang ste/ rang gi
364a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad du ji snyed du tha snyad 'dogs pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa de bzhin
364a3(mdo sde): du tha snyad 'dogs so/ /de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni/ chos rnam par 'jog par byed do/ /gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni/ chos rnam
364a4(mdo sde): par 'jog par mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed do/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do/ /de la de bzhin nyid tha
364a5(mdo sde): dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o/ /gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag de bzhin
364a6(mdo sde): nyid tha dad mi byed do/ /yang ji snyed mang po brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na/ sems can thams cad ni/ nam mkha' la rnam
364a7(mdo sde): par rgyu'ang nam mkha'i khams ni/ 'dres par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu'ang de bzhin nyid ni/ 'dres par mi byed do/ /
364b1(mdo sde): gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi
364b2(mdo sde): bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni/
364b3(mdo sde): rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so/ /yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so/ /ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings
364b4(mdo sde): so| |'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so/ /rgal ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i dbyings so/ /'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i
364b5(mdo sde): phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so/ /gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so/ /don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so/ /gnas med pa'i phyir
364b6(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so/ /'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so/ /ngas par 'gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
364b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so/ /gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams
365a1(mdo sde): cad de ltar zhugs pas de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni/
365a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so/ /
365a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /zhe sdang gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni/
365a4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
365a5(mdo sde): can no/ /nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /'dod pa'i
365a6(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos
365a7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi
365b1(mdo sde): dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis
365b2(mdo sde): su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/
365b3(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos
365b4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /yid kyi bar gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /
365b5(mdo sde): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /phung po'i
365b6(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
365b7(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /
366a1(mdo sde): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i
366a2(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang
366a3(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba'i chos thams cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang
366a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ltar sra
366a5(mdo sde): zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang /
366a6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pas spyor ba mi phyed pa dang / sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams
366a7(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
366b1(mdo sde): mi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa
366b2(mdo sde): mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang /
366b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i tshe bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra
366b4(mdo sde): zhing mi phyed pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni/ nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni/ mi phigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
366b5(mdo sde): bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang bdag nyid ni/ theg pa chen
366b6(mdo sde): po 'di las mi phyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no/ /
366b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma yin
367a1(mdo sde): pa| yul med pa yul thams cad las yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas gang gi yul yongs su sbyong
367a2(mdo sde): ste| de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'ang / ring ba ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben
367a3(mdo sde): pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul ni/ mig gi yul gang yang med do/ /rna ba'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma
367a4(mdo sde): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ rna ba'i yul gang yang med do/ /sna'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin
367a5(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ sna'i
367a6(mdo sde): yul gang yang med do/ /lce'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/
367a7(mdo sde): dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ lce'i yul gang yang med do/ /lus kyi yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye
367b1(mdo sde): pa'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ lus kyi yul gang yang med do/ /yid kyi yul ni/
367b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben
367b3(mdo sde): pa'i yul la ni/ yid kyi yul gang yang med do/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la'ang de bzhin
367b4(mdo sde): no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyi yul thams cad dben par 'jug go /rang gi zhing yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
367b5(mdo sde): la zhugs pa de ni/ /chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa
367b6(mdo sde): med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du de yul thams cad la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang
367b7(mdo sde): gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
368a1(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sum cu rtsa gnyis bo 'di
368a2(mdo sde): dag ni/ gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa
368a3(mdo sde): dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la brten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing
368a4(mdo sde): btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams
368a5(mdo sde): la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul ba mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang | chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par chos
368a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang /
368a7(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa med par byas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug
368b1(mdo sde): mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
368b2(mdo sde): dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang / bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun
368b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pas yongs su mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor
368b4(mdo sde): ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
368b5(mdo sde): la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo
368b6(mdo sde): gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la
368b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa
369a1(mdo sde): dang | bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'gong pa shes
369a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rig pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang / mthun
369a3(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / zhi gnas kyi sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba rjes su
369a4(mdo sde): mthun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
369a5(mdo sde): po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa
369a6(mdo sde): dang | sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi
369a7(mdo sde): ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba ba la 'jug pa
369b1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs
369b2(mdo sde): pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs
369b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
369b4(mdo sde): bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sbyin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ nyi
369b5(mdo sde): shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs
369b6(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med
369b7(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs
370a1(mdo sde): pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig
370a2(mdo sde): btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang /
370a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi
370a4(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de
370a5(mdo sde): dag ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no/ /de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba byas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi
370a6(mdo sde): gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshur shog ces bya ba dang song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags
370a7(mdo sde): pa med pas spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs ba rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ro/ /phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs
370b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chung ma legs par
370b2(mdo sde): brgyan te rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po legs
370b3(mdo sde): par kun tu bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs
370b4(mdo sde): bstan pa nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung
370b5(mdo sde): ba la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gter mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos
370b6(mdo sde): la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig bden pa dang / tha ba med pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa
370b7(mdo sde): shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsong pa dang / gzhan gyi tshig mi gcod pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi yon
371a1(mdo sde): tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po
371a2(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tshom thams cad gcod
371a3(mdo sde): pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig
371a4(mdo sde): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / 'khrul
371a5(mdo sde): pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mya ngan
371a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bas 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
371a7(mdo sde): dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs bar 'gyur ro/ /bka' blo bde ba dang / des pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par
371b1(mdo sde): mi byed pas skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje che ba dang /
371b2(mdo sde): thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes
371b3(mdo sde): bya'o| |sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gzhan
371b4(mdo sde): gyi sems pa dang mthun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos dang / yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ spobs pa
371b5(mdo sde): thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang /
371b6(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la
371b7(mdo sde): dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i gogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i ba shes gnyen bsten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa
372a1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa dang / shes
372a2(mdo sde): rab dang thabs zung du 'brel ba dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung par so sor rtog pa dang / bsam bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam
372a3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho med par
372a4(mdo sde): 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
372a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nas skye ste 'pho zhing 'byung ba skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
372a6(mdo sde): gang dang gang du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni/ rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/
372a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa drang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang /
372b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad
372b2(mdo sde): yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /ji
372b3(mdo sde): ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtog pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /rtan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag
