372b4(mdo sde): par 'da'o/ /byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa
372b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las
372b6(mdo sde): dang / sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig
372b7(mdo sde): rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su
373a1(mdo sde): skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi bsngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la mi smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi
373a2(mdo sde): las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byams pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
373a3(mdo sde): yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang
373a4(mdo sde): 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang /
373a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su mthun pa bdud kyi
373a6(mdo sde): las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud
373a7(mdo sde): kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal
373b1(mdo sde): la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi
373b2(mdo sde): drungs 'byin pa dang / thob pa cung zad kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam
373b3(mdo sde): par mi gnon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu/ ji cam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa
373b4(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /chos bzhis ni/ bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma
373b5(mdo sde): brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / chos
373b6(mdo sde): kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das
373b7(mdo sde): shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams
374a1(mdo sde): cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ /'byung po rnams
374a2(mdo sde): la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams
374a3(mdo sde): dag gis longs spyod mthun pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/ mtho dman gyi yid med pas sems dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam
374a4(mdo sde): pa 'byor ba yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/
374a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no/ /ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi
374a6(mdo sde): 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la
374a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig / ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
374b1(mdo sde): bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs
374b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs
374b3(mdo sde): su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin no/ /zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes
374b4(mdo sde): kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pas spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar
374b5(mdo sde): phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas
374b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i
374b7(mdo sde): rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
375a1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi
375a2(mdo sde): mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad
375a3(mdo sde): kyi sems dang / spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad dang 'dra
375a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod do/ /de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba'am/ gzugs su snang ba'am/ sgrar snang
375a5(mdo sde): ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i
375a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ ro gcig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro
375a7(mdo sde): gcig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ dus las mi yol ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sar rtog
375b1(mdo sde): pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags
375b2(mdo sde): kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu thams cad zad pas bri
375b3(mdo sde): ba'am| gang ba med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba'am/ gang bar mi byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/
375b4(mdo sde): kha tshon tshad med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin
375b5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ sems can tshad
375b6(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/ /'di ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
375b7(mdo sde): la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
376a1(mdo sde): la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la lta ba
376a2(mdo sde): kun nas ldang ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper
376a3(mdo sde): na| rlung mar ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil na mi chags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'ang sems can thams cad la mi chags so/ /
376a4(mdo sde): yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ spyod pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni/ dran pa'o/ /spyod pa ni/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o/ /de dag ni/ mun pa dang bral zhing
376a5(mdo sde): snang ba thob pa'ang yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o/ /snang ba zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de
376a6(mdo sde): dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag
376a7(mdo sde): rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes
376b1(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig
376b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing / /mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/ /mtshan ma ldan pa yongs su spangs nas su/ /byang chub phyir
376b3(mdo sde): bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas/ /de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/ /mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /kun mkhyen ye shes
376b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa/ /gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te/ /gang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyub/ /de ni mthun par sangs rgyas rjes
376b5(mdo sde): su dran| |chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben/ /zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med/ /gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur pa/ /de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa
376b6(mdo sde): yin| |'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ /stong pa mtshan med smon las rnam par grol/ /de la sems med dran dang 'jug pa med/ /de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin/ /phung
376b7(mdo sde): po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong / /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 'dor/ /snyems pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag /'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran/ /
377a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med/ /'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa/ /de ni tshul khrims
377a2(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa yin/ /lha gang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med/ /dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur ba/ /sems can dag pa de dag 'di dran zhing / /bdag kyang myur du de
377a3(mdo sde): 'drar 'gyur snyam sems/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni/ /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi byed/ /chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol/ /de
377a4(mdo sde): 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/ /rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang bsnyes pa/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing / /gang gis rdul med mtha' 'dir rab shes
377a5(mdo sde): pa| |de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin/ /bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag /chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtogs pa/ /de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal
377a6(mdo sde): te| |sems can btang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed/ /sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing / /de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med/ /lta ba nor pa rab tu spang bar ston/ /
377a7(mdo sde): de 'dra de ni sems can mang po spyod/ /'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ /
377b1(mdo sde): de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes/ /sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni/ /brag ca 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing / /de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par/ /de ltar rab
377b2(mdo sde): tu shes pa gzungs thob bo/ /kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang / chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa rab bshad kyi/ /bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems med/ /de ni gzungs
377b3(mdo sde): la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing / /legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa/ /dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur/ /gzungs la
377b4(mdo sde): nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go / chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsags med pas/ /chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min| /dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar/ /de ltar de yang
377b5(mdo sde): chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ /thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur par/ /mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chad/ /sems can dbang
377b6(mdo sde): po sems can 'du shes med/ /sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du/ /rgyun mi chad par chos ni rab ston cing / /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed/ /spobs pa'i
377b7(mdo sde): tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ /chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba bzhes/ /gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la/ /sems can srog dang gang zag mi
378a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ /de ni rgyal pa rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med/ /su yi bzod pa 'di
378a2(mdo sde): 'dra'i 'od gsal ba/ /de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin/ /phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong / /chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes/ /dbang po drug ni grong
378a3(mdo sde): stong 'dra mthong ba/ /de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams/ /bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing / chos la mi rtog
378a4(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa/ de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /gang zag skye ba rtag tu skye med shes/ /'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med/ /chos rnams 'od med song ba med
378a5(mdo sde): shes pa| |de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro / gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing / /byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med/ /bdag dang sems can med kyang
378a6(mdo sde): snying rje 'jug / de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo/ /rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong / /'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min/ /'gro ba'i sems ni
378a7(mdo sde): sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba/ /de ni sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin/ /pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la/ /chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing / /sems can sgrol yang sems
378b1(mdo sde): can 'du shes med/ /mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de/ /srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang / /stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing / /lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems
378b2(mdo sde): can sgrol/ /de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa/ /mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas/ /chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes/ /tshul dang rigs pa mya ngan 'das la mdzud/
378b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya/ /sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur/ /sems ni sems la nam yang mtshams mi sbyor/ /'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes
378b4(mdo sde): pa| |byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya/ /nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces/ /nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed
378b5(mdo sde): pa| |sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa/ /gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun/ /sgyu ma mig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang / /gsog dang rdzun dang rtag pa med par shes/ /de ni
378b6(mdo sde): byang chub snying por myur du 'gro / chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig
378b7(mdo sde): phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
379a1(mdo sde): to| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur
379a2(mdo sde): to| |lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang dkrol nas 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / nan tan
379a3(mdo sde): byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no/ /gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas
379a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa
379a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan
379a6(mdo sde): p as byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su
379a7(mdo sde): gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon bar gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni/ chags pa
379b1(mdo sde): mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di ni/ rgyun mi chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
379b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po 'di 'ang
379b3(mdo sde): rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la'ang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to/ /bcom
379b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis
379b5(mdo sde): zhus pa| |bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur ba spobs pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang
379b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/ rigs
379b7(mdo sde): kyi bu| de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni/ kho bo'i mdzod do/ /myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
380a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig /de nas byang
380a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha'
380a3(mdo sde): las char dbab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te| de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma
380a4(mdo sde): bkod pa zhes bya ba na 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rgya ni/ rgyang grags kyi tshad/ 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin+di ka
380a5(mdo sde): ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri ma
380a6(mdo sde): snams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char phob cig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems
380a7(mdo sde): d pa' myur bar spobs pas bsam ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par
380b1(mdo sde): phab ste/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri mthong zhing tshor bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las
380b2(mdo sde): langs te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces 'jer to/ /skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs so/ /sems
380b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen po bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'
380b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob cig /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas tshig de skad ces
380b5(mdo sde): smras ma thag tu de'i mod la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par phab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
380b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob cig /tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu nas ri rab kyi tshad
380b7(mdo sde): tsam gyi rin po che grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ ming tha dad pa/ kha dog tha dad yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang /
381a1(mdo sde): bai DUR+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen byu ru dang / zla ba'i 'od
381a2(mdo sde): dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling me 'od dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / an+da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang /
381a3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzod pa dang / brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal
381a4(mdo sde): ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang ba dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / zla gam
381a5(mdo sde): dang / dzam+bu'i chu 'od dang / dzam+bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me'i 'od dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha ba zhi byed dang / gdung ba med
381a6(mdo sde): dang / nad sel dang / mig spyod dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po
381a7(mdo sde): dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i
381b1(mdo sde): rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems
381b2(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba/ zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu
381b3(mdo sde): gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dwags rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi skras yog pa/ mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / khrag dang /
381b4(mdo sde): rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob cig /de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
381b5(mdo sde): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang / btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi
381b6(mdo sde): rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'jam pa ka ca lin+di ka ltar reg na bde
381b7(mdo sde): ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dwags thams cad kun tshim par byas so/ /de nas
382a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can
382a2(mdo sde): na ba| g.yog med pa/ nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du sman chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba phob cig /de nas de ma
382a3(mdo sde): thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes
382a4(mdo sde): bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig /de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las
382a5(mdo sde): 'od rab tu btang ste sems can dmyal ba ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab
382a6(mdo sde): tu ldan par gyur te ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
382a7(mdo sde): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / bran po dang
382b1(mdo sde): bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / slas dang / rta dang / bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /
382b2(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang tog dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dang / rta babs dang /
382b3(mdo sde): skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang / khyogs dang / glang bzhi pa dang / glang bcu drug pa nas rta cang shes stong gis grangs pa dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang
382b4(mdo sde): las mngon par rab tu bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
382b5(mdo sde): dag / 'di dag longs la byin cig /yongs su btang bar bgyis te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba
382b6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni/ phab na/ de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
382b7(mdo sde): phyin pa'i char phob cig / des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed
383a1(mdo sde): brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo / /de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
383a2(mdo sde): rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra'ang ci tsam phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i
383a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
383a4(mdo sde): thams cad go bar byas so/ /de nas tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba
383a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' zhig na'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam
383a6(mdo sde): mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis shes so/ /shes nas kyang byang chub sems
383a7(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
383b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i
383b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu bab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grags pa dang / de bzhin
383b3(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur
383b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin rlabs grub pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang gcig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di
383b5(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad
383b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rin po
383b7(mdo sde): che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga
384a1(mdo sde): b rgya byung nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces
384a2(mdo sde): smras so| |skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig /de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
384a3(mdo sde): mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes bu lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs nas byang chub sems
384a4(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo dag /bdag bdag gi khyo ji
384a5(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du khrid cig / de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim
384a6(mdo sde): du dong ngo / /de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar
384a7(mdo sde): smin par byas so/ /de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa dag smras so/ /chos kyi rang bzhin
384b1(mdo sde): stong pa sgyu ma 'dra/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal/ /de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te/ /bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis/ /chos 'di thams cad yang dag
384b2(mdo sde): sprul pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong / /zag med ye shes bdag gis rab rtogs te/ /slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par
384b3(mdo sde): bgyi| |sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi/ /sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab/ /'dren mchog thub pas de
384b4(mdo sde): dag lung bstan pa/ /khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni/ /spyad pa spyod nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag /shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur/ /yang de'i tshe na mi lnga brgya gsang
384b5(mdo sde): p ar chad de gsod du khrid pa las de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs
384b6(mdo sde): pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyi/ de la khyed cag phyag tshol cig dang / gsod pa 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgra zhig thos so/ /de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra
384b7(mdo sde): skad gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshig de skad ces smras so/ /tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig de nyid
385a1(mdo sde): la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te/ der lhags nas gshed ma'i mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag bsad de ci rub/
385a2(mdo sde): nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la nged cag gi srog bcad de mi 'di dag khye zhig /de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir gsod pa'i phyir mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste sprul pa'i skyes bu de
385a3(mdo sde): dag bsad do/ /de nas mi gsad pa las btang ba de dag gsod pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong
385a4(mdo sde): ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la'ang thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
385a5(mdo sde): to| |skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la
385a6(mdo sde): sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed cag bla na med pa yang
385a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la de skad ces smras
385b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung gcig byin te/ grogs
385b2(mdo sde): po dag / ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig /de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams
385b3(mdo sde): c ad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang pa las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos tshul yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
385b4(mdo sde): rten du 'byung ngo / /zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gang mi
385b5(mdo sde): skam mi zad mi dengs pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ji nam mkha' skam pa'am/
385b6(mdo sde): zad pa yod dam/ dengs par 'gyur ram/ smras pa rigs kyi bu/ de lta ma yin no/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub de ni/ nam mkha' ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de
385b7(mdo sde): la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas de bas na/ nam mkha' la mdzod mi skam mi zad mi dengs so/ /yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba
386a1(mdo sde): ni| kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/ smras pa/
386a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pas mkhyen to/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
386a3(mdo sde): mdzod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na/ lha dang bcas
386a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dang par 'gyur pa dang mchis kyi/ bshad du
386a5(mdo sde): gsol| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas
386a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la de lta bur
386a7(mdo sde): bgrang ba dang / mtshan ma bzhag pa de snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni/ zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
386b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
386b2(mdo sde): gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
386b3(mdo sde): stsal pa| yang shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa
386b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
386b5(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA
386b6(mdo sde): ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
386b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo / /
387a1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/
387a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa dgu khri drug stong yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
387a3(mdo sde): bud med kyi ming yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo/ /de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas bar gyi bskal
387a4(mdo sde): pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gror byas te nyin gcig la 'god pa'ang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che phung po zad par 'gyur ba de lta bus
387a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas so/ /de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par
387a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
387a7(mdo sde): du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad
387b1(mdo sde): kyis dbang bkur ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam
387b2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen
387b3(mdo sde): po rnyed par nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
387b4(mdo sde): la rim gro dang / bsti stang byas te byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ gang+gA'i klung gi
387b5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
387b6(mdo sde): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha
387b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye
388a1(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson
388a2(mdo sde): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
388a3(mdo sde): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/
388a4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su
388a5(mdo sde): sbyangs| gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas byams pa chen po yongs su
388a6(mdo sde): sbyangs pa nas snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du lus
388a7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs
388b1(mdo sde): su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gang+gA'i klung
388b2(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so/ /shA
388b3(mdo sde): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du
388b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la'ang zad pa med do/ /des na/ 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub
388b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes
388b6(mdo sde): bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to/ /nam mkha' mdzod
388b7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so/ /de
389a1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag btsal te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub
389a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis par snang las tshigs su bad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi/ /thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin/ /
389a3(mdo sde): de la 'jug pa rab bstan gyi/ /khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis/ /nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med/ /dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /gang gi chos nyid mtho dma' med/ /de la 'dud pa
389a4(mdo sde): ga la yod/ /nam mkha' la ni skye ba med/ /'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /de la rnam par rtog pa med/ /nam mkha' la ni bri ba med/ /gang ba
389a5(mdo sde): dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams gang med bri med de/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo/ /nam mkha' la ni mun pa med/ /de ni de yis nyon mi mongs/ /sems kyi rang bzhin
389a6(mdo sde): 'od gsal bas/ /de bas nam yang nyon mongs med/ /nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang / /gang la'ang
389a7(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang / /nam mkha' la ni nyon mongs med/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs/ /
389b1(mdo sde): bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis/ /nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med/ /rnyed dang bsti stang thams cad kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed/ /bstod pa dang ni smad pa la/ /nam mkha'
389b2(mdo sde): yongs su mi rtog ste/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo/ /sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni/ /nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba min/ /'jig rten 'di
389b3(mdo sde): dag g.yo 'khrug kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med/ /sreg pa'i bskal ba 'byung ba na/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa/ /de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis/ /byang chub sems
389b4(mdo sde): dpa' bstan mi gdung / /skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas pa bzhin/ /chos rnams 'gro med 'ong ba'ang med/ /chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas/ /gzugs
389b5(mdo sde): su snang ba ji snyed pa/ /nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung / /chos su snang ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag chos kyi dbyings las byung / /mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa/ /nam mkha' bltar
389b6(mdo sde): yod ma yin te/ /de ltar sems rnams rab shes na/ /nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs mnyam mo/ /ming tsam ba ni nam mkha' ste/ /de la kha dog dbyibs kyang med/ /sems dang yid dang
389b7(mdo sde): rnam shes kyang / /ming gis yongs su bstan pa'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing / /thams cad du yang gzung du med/ /de bzhin ye shes mthu chen yang / /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam
390a1(mdo sde): zhing mtshungs/ /sems can nam mkha' 'gro mod kyi/ /de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med/ /sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang / /de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma
390a2(mdo sde): min| |ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yi lus/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/ /de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs/ /khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha'
390a3(mdo sde): dang / /mtshungs zhing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs/ /'di ltar sreg pa'i bskal ba la'ang / /nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs/ /ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis/ /nam yang yongs
390a4(mdo sde): su gang mi nus/ /de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang / /sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang ngo / /tshig chen seng+ge'i sgra dag gis/ /'jig rten mgon zhes gsungs pa ni/ /'jig rten 'das
390a5(mdo sde): ba'i shes rab gang / /de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas/ /tha ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang / /mtha' ma
390a6(mdo sde): dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas so/ /gang gis yang dag nyid shes na/ /de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing / /dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so/ /
390a7(mdo sde): dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing / /yang dag mtha' la gang gnas ba/ /dngos po dang ni dngos med pa/ /lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags//
390b1(mdo sde): sgra la stong pa nyid med de/ /de ni sgra med brjod pa med/ /de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni/ /stong pa nyid ni brjod du med/ /gang de stong zhes bya ba yang / /de
390b2(mdo sde): yi don ni brjod du med/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang / /mig yor dang ni brag ca rnams/ /de la sogs pa bshad pa yis/ /'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to/ /sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/
390b3(mdo sde): dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te/ /rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la/ /gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang / /mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mtshan
390b4(mdo sde): gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag / chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so/ /mtshan gzhi nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa yin/ /gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa//
390b5(mdo sde): de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /chags pa med cing bcings pa med/ /shin tu cung zad med pa ste/ /spros med spros dang bral ba de/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /sems can
390b6(mdo sde): las ni ma grol ba/ /sems can la yang mi gnas shing / /sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya/ /sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das/ /thos
390b7(mdo sde): nas dngang bar mi byed de/ /gang de byang chub pa rab zhugs pa/ /dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di/ /sgyu ma byed pa'i sems can dag /mang du sprul nas der bsad kyang / /de la bsad pa gang
391a1(mdo sde): yang med/ /sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no/ /sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang / /mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun/ /rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gcig
391a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs/ /nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i mdzod/ /mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste/ /sems can thams cad mgu byed cing / /mdzod de zad par mi
391a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni/ /mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste/ /chos rnams la yang 'pho med par/ /chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya/ /rgyu la brten te
391a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba yi/ /chos rnams thams cad rab shes na/ /de yi mdzad ni mi zad de/ /chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab/ /chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par/ /'jig rten mgon pos rab
391a5(mdo sde): gsungs te/ /sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so/ /de ste de dag rdzas yin na/ /de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi/ /de dag med pas
391a6(mdo sde): mi zad ces/ /de bas de ni mi zad gsungs/ /chos ni rab tu skad cig pa/ /zad pa chos ni mi zad de/ /mi zad de la zad pa med/ /de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'
391a7(mdo sde): gang zhig gis/ /chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na/ /des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /byang chub phyir la yang dag zhugs/ /tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na byang chub
391b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' brgya stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /
391b2(mdo sde): de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgra 'di ga las
391b3(mdo sde): byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan ldon no//
391b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par
391b5(mdo sde): gyur to| |nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag ca'i sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag
391b6(mdo sde): ca'i sgra 'byung ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ brag ca la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs sam/ kha dog gam| dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ med
391b7(mdo sde): do| |smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar brag ca yongs su ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du/ nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/ sgra skad go bar byed par
392a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sgra 'di go bar byed pa su/ gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ye shes kyi so sor rnam par
392a2(mdo sde): rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsam pa de bar snang 'di las 'byung yang sems de der 'gro ba'ang med/ de 'dir 'ong ba'ang med mod kyi/ sgra'i
392a3(mdo sde): sgra brnyan kyang 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'phel/ rgyu med pa
392a4(mdo sde): las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no/ /'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gnyi ga la'ang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do/ /gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa
392a5(mdo sde): de dag ni/ bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa
392a6(mdo sde): bsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni/ rnam par byang ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang
392a7(mdo sde): bzhes bya ba 'di gnyis ka'ang brda'i tshig go / don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang dmigs su med do/ /don dam pa'i mtha' ni/ mtha'
392b1(mdo sde): ma yin te/ gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o/ /gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o/ /gang bdag gi mtha'
392b2(mdo sde): de ni/ chos thams cad kyi mtha'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ de'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/ nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni/ chos thams cad
392b3(mdo sde): la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/ smras pa/
392b4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de
392b5(mdo sde): bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos na me sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du ltad mo dang ldan te/ de'i phyir kho
392b6(mdo sde): bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor
392b7(mdo sde): gyur te| de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/ /gang la kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o/
393a1(mdo sde): gang du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs med de/ de'i phyir na/ kho bo ltad mo can zhes
393a2(mdo sde): bya'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phongs
393a3(mdo sde): su brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /de nas 'khor
393a4(mdo sde): de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis
393a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa las brtsams te gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
393a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs
393a7(mdo sde): pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i 'od zer
393b1(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems yongs su
393b2(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rnyog pa med par
393b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
393b4(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par
393b5(mdo sde): zlog par 'gyur ro/ /dga' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ /skar ma'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sbyin gnas
393b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems mi 'jum par 'gyur ro/ /mtshungs par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems
393b7(mdo sde): can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /seng+ga'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
394a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro/ /
394a2(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems kyi rgyan du 'gyur ro/ /'od bkod
394a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur
394a4(mdo sde): ro| |rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
394a5(mdo sde): bag chags thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
394a6(mdo sde): ni| sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /yon tan gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar
394a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sred med kyi bu lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rdo rje'i
394b1(mdo sde): lus mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dam bcas pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge
394b2(mdo sde): 'dzin ni/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
394b3(mdo sde): ni| chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur
394b4(mdo sde): ro| |sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chags pa dang / zhe sdang med par 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ bdud bzhi las yang dag par
394b5(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'dzum pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems rtse
394b6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dmigs
394b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /glog 'od ces bya ba'i
395a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dge
395a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting
395a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas sems can thams cad kyi
395a4(mdo sde): sems mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ phyir mi ldog par
395a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems can tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ smon lam
395a6(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting
395a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni/ mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci'ang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
395b1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni/ gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /lhun po'i
395b2(mdo sde): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi skar mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams
395b3(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ las dang bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/

396a4(mdo sde): dang / yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
396a5(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed

396a7(mdo sde): phung po thams cad rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu 'god par 'gyur
396b1(mdo sde): ro| |lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos thams
396b2(mdo sde): cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya
396b3(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rgyud chags pa dang / rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yi ge thams cad dang / tshig
396b4(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems
396b5(mdo sde): kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
396b6(mdo sde): brgyad cu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de re re la'ang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/ /de dag thams cad bsdoms na/ ting nge 'dzin bzhi khrir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas
396b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyur ro/ /de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin
397a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo'ang de snyed/ chos kyi phung po'ang de snyed de/ de'i phyir sems can gyi spyod pa
397a2(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
397a3(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa sems can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mdo'o/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa mtha' dag la
397a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa de ni/ tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgyad stong gi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di yongs su bstan
397a5(mdo sde): cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
397a6(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
397a7(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni/ legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum
397b1(mdo sde): pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su brjod pa 'di shin tu yongs su bstan pa ni/ legs so legs
397b2(mdo sde): so| |'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces
397b3(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis thog mar nam mkha' 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char
397b4(mdo sde): rab tu phab/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das
397b5(mdo sde): p a'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
397b6(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
397b7(mdo sde): l dan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan gyi 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten du
398a1(mdo sde): byung ste| yang rigs kyi bu/ ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang 'byor ba/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/
398a2(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa/ gos ka tsa lan+di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dzam+bu'i chu bo gser gyi pad+ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal ba sna tshogs kyis
398a3(mdo sde): rnam par spras pa/ mig mang ris su bres pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs
398a4(mdo sde): spyod dang / kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go /mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsam pas zas dang skom rab tu 'byor to/ /
398a5(mdo sde): de'ang rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
398a6(mdo sde): chen po byung ngo / /yang rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang
398a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de'i khang pa dzam+bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs su'ang dpag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs
398b1(mdo sde): dang / byang phyogs su'ang dpag tshad bzhi bzhi bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ skyed mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ rgyal
398b2(mdo sde): po bsod nams kyi sa brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go /khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang tshan po che
398b3(mdo sde): chen po'i stobs dang / drag shul 'chang ba sha stag go /yang rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la btsun mo rin po che gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni/ dpal gyi
398b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni/ dpal gyi 'od do/ /rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs te btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe lha
398b5(mdo sde): mo de gnyis kyi pang pa nas khye'u gnyis byung ste/ rdzus te skyes pa sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ smon lam rdzogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
398b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa ste/ gcig gi ming ni/ seng+ge zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni/ seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dang / dbyangs gcig tu pha bsod nams
398b7(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon byas dge dang mi dge chud mi za/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas chud mi za/ /bsam pa byang chub sems kyang chud
399a1(mdo sde): mi za| |sgrub pa gtsor byed thos pa chud mi za/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za/ /bzod dang des pa rnams kyang chud mi za/ /byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i
399a2(mdo sde): las byas phyir/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang chud mi za/ /rtse gcig bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems/ /nges par rtog dang shes rab sems mi nyams/ /ye
399a3(mdo sde): shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te/ /mi 'khrugs chos las byang chub brnyed mi dka'/ /de ni nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te/ /de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing //
399a4(mdo sde): de ni pad+ma'i snying por brdzus te skye/ /mi gos pa ni pad+ma chu las ltar/ /shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal ba sman pa'i rgyal/ /dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yi/ /bde
399a5(mdo sde): gshegs dri med 'od kyi gan nas su/ /chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs/ /u dum+Wa ra'i me tog ji lta bar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung ba rnyed par
399a6(mdo sde): dka'i| |de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du/ /bde gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi/ /rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa 'di thos nas/ /bu dang btsun mo 'khor
399a7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu/ /srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te/ /rgyal ba de yi gan du nye bar dong / /me tog dri zhim byug par bcas pa yis/ /de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i
399b1(mdo sde): mchod byas nas/ /zhabs la phyag btsal rab tu bskor byas te/ /thal mo sbyar ba btud nas spyan sngar 'dug /seng+ge dang ni seng+ge'i rtsal 'gro yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
399b2(mdo sde): la bzung nas su/ /gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi/ /'phags pa des ni tshigs bcad 'di dag smras/ khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te/ 'jig
399b3(mdo sde): rten long ba rnams kyi sgron mar gyur/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la mkhas/ /ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas mos/ /
399b4(mdo sde): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcings/ /nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir yang / /nye bar mi mchi chos lta ga la nyan/ /mgon po thugs rje rab tu bskyed mdzod la/ /
399b5(mdo sde): ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos nas su/ theg pa mchog las ldog par mi 'gyur ba/ /byang chub lam mchog de ni lags par ston/ /bcom ldan mgon po ta la brgyad cu
399b6(mdo sde): srid| |nam mkhar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs/ /nga yi chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la/ /thos nas de la tshul bzhin nan tan gyis/ /'dod pa mi rtag de
399b7(mdo sde): bzhin rgyal srid srog / srog ni rtswa yi zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra/ /brtse ba de bzhin 'dod bde rmi lam 'dra/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' ba skyed/ /sems can gang yang 'dod
400a1(mdo sde): pas ngoms med de/ /phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pa skom zhing rgyu/ /byis pa ngoms mi shes shing yul la gnas/ /shes rab gang ngoms de dag
400a2(mdo sde): shin tu ngoms/ /sgyu ma slu zhing snying po med pa ltar/ /de bzhin phung po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra/ /khams rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin du bstan/ /dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong
400a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra/ /bu dang chung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang / /'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs su gyur pa med/ /sbyin dul kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni/ /de dag pha rol 'gro ba'i
400a4(mdo sde): grogs yin no/ /nga yi gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs/ /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ji 'dra rab ltos la/ /gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na/ /byang chub dam pa 'di phyir
400a5(mdo sde): sems skyed cig / rgyal po glang po des ni chos thos nas/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dang / /sras dang btsun mo stobs bcas grong mi rnams/ /byang chub dam pa 'di phyir
400a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed de/ /bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro
400a7(mdo sde): ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi
400b1(mdo sde): bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad kyis rim gro byas so/ /khye'u seng+ge dang / seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de gnyis
400b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri'ang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas seng+ge
400b3(mdo sde): dang / seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / nyin par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par mngon par
400b4(mdo sde): shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /de dag mngon par shes pa rnyed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis
400b5(mdo sde): kyis sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su smin par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar lo brgyad
400b6(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong 'das nas rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po ga la ba der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo /
400b7(mdo sde): /mthong nas kyang ngas ni/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
401a1(mdo sde): byas na| 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas ngas ma byas pa ci zhig byas snyam du brnyas pa'i sems skyes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs

401a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas de'i dus na nam mkha' la lag pas byugs nas des nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
401a7(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya

401b2(mdo sde): bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo/ /des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par
401b3(mdo sde): bab bo| |longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo/ /ji lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams cad kyi char mngon
401b4(mdo sde): par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang / skom dang / bro'i char mngon par rab tu bab bo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos rgyal

402a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na gang sa bla'i lha rnams kyis ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu bab pa las na/ byang chub
402a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ni/ nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra phyung ngo / /ji ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra phyung ba de bzhin du bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /

402a5(mdo sde): char rab tu bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur pa snyam zhes sgra phyung bas ming de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

404b4(mdo sde): bar rig nas sbyin pa byin no/ /rnam par shes pa dben par rig /rnam par shes pa gzung ba med par rig /rnam par shes pa kun gzhi med par rig /rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar
404b5(mdo sde): rig / rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa brag ca
404b6(mdo sde): lta bur rig / rnam par shes pa mig yor lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig /rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas sbyin pa byin
404b7(mdo sde): te| de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang
405a1(mdo sde): chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag
405a2(mdo sde): gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
405a3(mdo sde): yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ /gzhan yang rigs
405a4(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas tshul khrims srung ba nas gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bar du rig nas
405a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims srung ngo / /de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de
405a6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang /
405a7(mdo sde): bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
405b1(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ /de bzhin du
405b2(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas tshul khrims srung ba nas rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig
405b3(mdo sde): nas tshul khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo
405b4(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi
405b5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
405b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
405b7(mdo sde): dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas bzod pa sgom pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog go /shes rab
406a1(mdo sde): rnam par dpyod do/ /des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur rig
406a2(mdo sde): nas shes rab rnam par dpyod do/ /de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo
