439b6(mdo sde): la lta ci smos/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog byed pa tshogs bral ldan dang / dga' tshogs ldan dang / spos can dang / khang bzang can dang lha bzhi po de dag
439b7(mdo sde): gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can gyi mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por sngon stobs dang / drag shul dang / bkod pa dang /
440a1(mdo sde): g.yog ji lta bu dang lhags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa
440a2(mdo sde): dang / des pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / brtson 'grus brtan cing 'bar ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs
440a3(mdo sde): bsags pa'i phyag rin po che sa la brdabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par rab tu g.yos te/ khyod stobs dang g.yog dang bcas par shin tu

440a6(mdo sde): bzhi stong mngon par sprul te 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa tha dad pa mang po thogs te bcom ldan 'das ga
440a7(mdo sde): la ba de logs su gtor nas g.yog dang bcas pas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di bdag
440b1(mdo sde): cag la stsal na/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod
440b2(mdo sde): kyis nam mkha'i mdzod 'di mthong ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mthong ngo / /'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang bkod pa ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
440b3(mdo sde): bkod pa ji snyed pa dang / bdag gi gnas kyi bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag pas ches lhag pa 'dir mthong ste/ de la ni/ lha 'am/ mi'i rin po che'i longs spyod de gang yang med
440b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod la nam mkha'i mdzod 'di dag thams cad sbyin gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /de nas bdud
440b5(mdo sde): sdig can gyis srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de'i tshe bzhin mi sdug pa la sogs pa
440b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu lnga brgya ma dad cing chos ma yin pa 'dod pas de dag tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gi phas byang chub tu sems bskyed du zin kyang bdag cag ni/ 'di lta bu'i chos
440b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs nub par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
441a1(mdo sde): b u| khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig gang gis bdud gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byang chub la bkod pa bdud tshar gcod pa'i rig pa'i
441a2(mdo sde): gsang sngags kyi tshig la khyod spobs par gyis shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de'i tshe rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /
441a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ a bat+te/ bi bat+te/ saM bat+te/ sa hi tA nu san+d+hi/ du ru t+ta ra No/ nir+g+ha ta ni/ mai t+r+ya yuk+te/ kA ru Na niSh+yan+te/ sat+ya ba ti/ b+hU ra k+She/ d+harma ni bri t+te/ d+harma rak+She/ ak+khu
441a4(mdo sde): le| ni khi li ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tat+ka re/ ta thA ba di te/ shI la a nu brti/ ak+Sha ya nirde she /kle sha pa ri She/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha te d+harma dz+wa li ni/ saM g+ha
441a5(mdo sde): a nu ga me/ a nud+d+ha re/ an+ti kra ma Ni ye/ ni gra ha Ni mA ra pa k+Sha s+ya yuk+ki kr-i te/ a dan+te/ a sha ste/ swa bi Sha ya a nu ga me/ A R+ya gu Na ka re/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ba te/ mok+Sha a nu
441a6(mdo sde): ku le| ni gra ha ni ba ra pra ti nAM/ dAR+Sha ni ma ra baR+Sha ta/ a ba shan+tA tsa twA ro ma hA rA dzA na/ sha kro de bA nAM in+d+ra brah+ma sa ha pa ti/ bud+d+ha bra saM nA nAM/ de ba nA ga /yak+Sha kr-i taM
441a7(mdo sde): pa ri trA NAM/ s+thA pi tA na swas+t+ya yA nAM/ d+harma b+ha na ka nAM/ a rak+Sha ye/ sad+d+harma s+ya tsa pa ri gra ha ye/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rig pa'i gsang
441b1(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /bdud kyi bu lnga brgya ma dad cing chos
441b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa 'dod pa de dag gis bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi bu'am/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
441b3(mdo sde): thos nas byang chub tu sems mi skyed cing / bdud kyi las rnams mi 'dor ba de la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo 'gems so/ /zhes
441b4(mdo sde): thos nas bdud kyi bu de dag gis bar snang la bltas pa dang / de dag gis lag na rdo rje lnga brgya bdag bdag gi spyi bo na rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje thogs shing 'dug pa mthong
441b5(mdo sde): nas de dag 'jigs shing skrag ste byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i dus na 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'dzum pa de'i don tshe dang ldan pa kun
441b6(mdo sde): dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bdud kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag 'jigs shing skrag ste bla na
441b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
442a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ nam bdud sdig can de byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de dag thams cad kyang ming tha dad pa'i byang chub
442a2(mdo sde): sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji srid na bdud sdig can bla na
442a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de byang chub thob nas ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang
442a4(mdo sde): ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bdud sdig can 'di da dung yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdud
442a5(mdo sde): kyi bya ba byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang rdo rje snying po nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas
442a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga gsang ba dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan dang / tshul khrims kyi gnas dang / spyad pa dang / cho ga dang / sbyor ba
442a7(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur te/ ci tsam gyis byang chub kyi sems de brtan par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i
442b1(mdo sde): gsung rab la bdud sdig can 'di'ang tha mar bdud kyi las byed de/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin nas sems med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos kyi snang ba
442b2(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rjes su song zhing byang chub kyi sems bskyed do/ /de'i 'og tu grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par
442b3(mdo sde): byed de/ bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur
442b4(mdo sde): ro| |rab tu byung nas kyang dam pa'i chos dus gsum du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa'ang byang chub la yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//
442b5(mdo sde): de de'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rnam par
442b6(mdo sde): s byong ba'i bskal pa la yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shin tu gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
442b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o/ /yang kun dga'
443a1(mdo sde): bo/ yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lha dang mis gang bar
443a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ kun dga' bo/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ci 'dra bar sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang / kun
443a3(mdo sde): spyod pa yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gnas pa'i chos snang ba thob ces bya ba'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu
443a4(mdo sde): thub par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun du
443a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gang bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha da ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa 'di dag
443a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang yongs su dag par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gnas pa'i tshes snang
443a7(mdo sde): ba thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /bdud
443b1(mdo sde): sdig can lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di rab tu bstan pa na gang 'khor der 'dus pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'di
443b2(mdo sde): l tar bdud kyi las de snyed bgyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mya ngan las 'das bar 'gyur ba
443b3(mdo sde): ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo su zhig gang zag la
443b4(mdo sde): gang zag gis tshod gzung / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma lags so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di
443b5(mdo sde): ched du brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /grogs po dag ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /'on kyang grogs
443b6(mdo sde): po dag sems ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ ngas sems can 'di dag chags pas gom pa 'deg cing chags pa dang bral bas 'jog pa dang / kun nas nyon
443b7(mdo sde): mongs pas chos gos 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyon pa dang / len pa dang bcas pas zan kham gyis gcod pa dang / len pa med par mthong ste/ kye
444a1(mdo sde): grogs po dag / sems can gyi spyod pa ni/ sna tshogs so/ /mgo smos pas go ba dang / spros te bshad pas go ba dang / tshig lhur len pa'i
444a2(mdo sde): sems can dag yod de/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa so so ci rigs par chos la gzud par bstan pa'i gtam rnams gsung ngo / /kye grogs po dag /nyon mongs
444a3(mdo sde): pa ni/ yul la yang mi gnas shing phyogs la 'ang mi gnas te/ nyon mongs pa ni/ bsags pa 'ang med/ phung po'i dngos po yang med do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa byung
444a4(mdo sde): bas nyon mongs pa byung ngo / /tshul bzhin byung bas rnam par dag pa byung ngo / /de la de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba de tshul bzhin brtags na rnam par dag
444a5(mdo sde): pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngas 'di las dgongs te log par lta ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes na/ de'i yang dag par lta ba yin no/ /zhes
444a6(mdo sde): tshig 'di smras so/ /nam yang log par lta ba ni/ yang dag pa'i lta bar ma gyur/ mi 'gyur/ 'gyur ba med do/ /'on kyang ji ltar log par lta ba la log par lta
444a7(mdo sde): bar rig nas de la mi gnas/ rab tu mi gnas/ spyod pa med/ rab tu spyod pa med pa de ni/ yang dag par lta ba'i lam la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni yang dag
444b1(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/ /kye grogs po dag /nyon mongs pa ni/ sgrib par byed pa'o/ /rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni/ nyam chung ba'o/ /lhag mthong ni/
444b2(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni glo bur ro/ /rang bzhin ni rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni kun du rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin ni/ kun du rtog pa
444b3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /kye grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po 'di ni/ chu la rten to/ /chu ni/ rlung la rten to/ /rlung ni/ nam mkha' la rten to/ /nam mkha' ni/
444b4(mdo sde): rten pa med do/ /de bzhin du sa yi khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang khams bzhi po 'di dag pas ni/ nam mkha'i khams thams
444b5(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na stobs che zhing sra ste/ sogs pa med pa'o/ /sogs pa med pa ni/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa ste/ rang gi ngang gi tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /de la gang
444b6(mdo sde): khams gsum po de dag ni/ skye ba dang / 'jig par ldan pa/ mi gnas pa/ ring du mi gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ 'gyur/ bar snang gi nam mkha'i khams la ni/
444b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni/ las dang / nyon mongs pa la gnas pa'o/ /las dang / nyon mongs pa ni/ tshul bzhin
445a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas so/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la ni/ rang bzhin yongs su dag pa la gnas te/ de'i phyir sems
445a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs zhes bya'o/ /de la gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / gang las dang nyon mongs
445a3(mdo sde): pa dang / gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang dag par zin na ni skye/ rgyu dang rkyen ma tshogs na ni/ 'gag ste/ gang
445a4(mdo sde): de'i rang bzhin de la ni/ rgyu yang med/ rkyen yang med/ tshogs pa yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med do/ /de la nam mkha'i khams ji lta bar rang
445a5(mdo sde): bzhin yang de bzhin no/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ji lta bar rlung yang de bzhin no/ /las dang nyon mongs pa ji lta bar chu yang de bzhin no/ /phung po
445a6(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ji lta bar sa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rtsa ba yongs su chad pa zhes bya ste/ snying po med pa'i
445a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba/ mi gnas pa'i rtsa ba/ dag pa'i rtsa ba/ rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba'o/ /kye grogs po dag de ni/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
445b1(mdo sde): ste sgo gang la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo la mi gnas shing / rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad kyang mi snyems pa'o/ /de
445b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad snyems pa yang dag par bcom pas tshul dang 'dra bar 'gro ba'i lam khong du chud de bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag
445b3(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad
445b4(mdo sde): kyi yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi yul la zhugs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag chos kyi dbyings
445b5(mdo sde): kyi rjes su song ste/ mnyam pa bye brag med pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa'
445b6(mdo sde): mang po zhig las dang nyon mongs pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba dang / 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
445b7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/ bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma/ de nas dge bsnyen dpal sbas shes bya bas bcom
446a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par grol ba'i
446a2(mdo sde): sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi slad du bshad do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bsad
446a3(mdo sde): p a'i slad du shul zhugs kyis bltams par bgyis te bshos kyang dug dang bsres pa sbyar ba des bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos mang du thos kyang 'gyod
446a4(mdo sde): pa rab tu bsal bar ma nus kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par gyur te/ chos thams cad
446a5(mdo sde): la snang ba 'ang skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ 'gyod pa ma mchis/ the tshom ma mchis te/ snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
446a6(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ bdud sdig can ltar bdag kyang khyad par du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
446a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /legs so legs so/ /ngas bshad pa'i don khyod kyis khong du chud de/ ngas khyim bdag khyod la lung bstan gyi/ sems dang /
446b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dis bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod nas de dag gi
446b2(mdo sde): thad nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las
446b3(mdo sde): ' das pa snyed cig mnyes par byas te bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya na shin du dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam
446b4(mdo sde): par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge
446b5(mdo sde): b snyen dpal sbas kyis bcom ldan 'das las bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu
446b6(mdo sde): dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te rgyan ji snyed thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
446b7(mdo sde): gi khyim na gter chen po bzhi mchis te/ rin po che mang po dang / gser gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /de dag las gter chen po gcig ni/ khyim gyi bu smad dang /
447a1(mdo sde): dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa rnams la stsal to/ /gter chen po gcig ni/ dbul po slong ba thams cad la stsal to/ /gter
447a2(mdo sde): chen po gcig ni/ dge slong phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo/ /gter chen po gcig ni/ sangs rgyas la
447a3(mdo sde): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'bul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ yang bar gyur te nga yi ba ma mchis/ yongs su 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis na/
447a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi tshul thob par bgyir gsol/ dge
447a5(mdo sde): bsnyen dpal sbas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi tshul thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
447a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na bskal pa grangs ma
447a7(mdo sde): mchis pa bye bar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcu langs nas de dag
447b1(mdo sde): thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni/ /
447b2(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das slad bdag cag rnams/ /lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar spro/ /rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su/ /sten pa kun kyang
447b3(mdo sde): rab spangs te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bstan pa yi/ /chos 'di rjes su mi btang ngo / /dam pa'i chos ni gzung slad du/ /gshe dang mi snyan mchi ba dang / /ngan du smra ba'i tshig
447b4(mdo sde): rnams kyang / /bzod pa de dag dang du blang / /tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su/ /co 'dri ba dang sdigs pa dang / /mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa/ /de dag thams cad
447b5(mdo sde): bzod par bgyid/ /dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa/ /bdud kyi pho nya bdud kyi phyogs/ /dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i/ /dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
447b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig chos can/ /khyim pa dang ni bsten cing gnas/ /bkur bsti dag dang rnyed la brkam/ /chos 'di tshol ba mi bgyid do/ /'jig rten rgyang
447b7(mdo sde): pan rnams dang 'dre/ /bdag la rab tu stod bgyid cing / /rab tu des pa rnams la smod/ /mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung / /dgon pa'i gnas ni spangs nas su/ /
448a1(mdo sde): rtag tu 'du 'dzin rnams la dga'/ /'jig rten gsang tshig rnams la brtson/ /'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/ /mi mkhas
448a2(mdo sde): pa dag dge 'dun las/ /zhal ta byed la rtag tu brtson/ /bsam gtan bsam gtan byed spangs te/ /dkon mchog gsum dang 'dre mi byed/ /thos dang khrims
448a3(mdo sde): kyis ma lags kyis/ /tshogs gyi nang na rnyed pa tshol/ /sbyin pa dag la phyir phyir brtson/ /rtog pa bcas shing mya ngan bcas/ /nga yir 'du shes gzung nas su/ /
448a4(mdo sde): mdza' dang slong ster khyim la dga'/ /de dag der ni rab 'jug cing / /'jig rten pa yi gtam rnams bgyid/ /zhing gi don dang khyim gyi don/ /de dag nyo
448a5(mdo sde): tshong bgyid la gnas/ /thong gshol shal ba rnams ldan yang / /bdag cag dge sbyong yin zhes 'dzer/ /dmigs pa yis ni rab tu bgyid/ /lta ba tha dad kun
448a6(mdo sde): du gnas/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas/ /de dag g.yang sa bzhin du 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol mi spyod cing / /las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dor/ /brdzun
448a7(mdo sde): du smra dang rab tu ldan/ /chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin/ /dge sbyong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing / /de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa/ /rnam par 'jig tshe sems can
448b1(mdo sde): phyir/ /bdag cag dam chos gzung bar bgyi/ /mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du/ /'thun par spyod par mi byed de/ /rang rang gi ni smra rnams la/ /de dag rtag tu mos
448b2(mdo sde): par bgyid/ /mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing / /rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de/ /de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid/ /
448b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na/ /don bcas tshig 'brur ldan pa yi/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni/ /rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na sems
448b4(mdo sde): can yang / /rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i las kyis bsdigs pa na/ /'jigs shing skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur/ /'jig dus rab tu mi
448b5(mdo sde): zad pa/ /sdig pa'i dus ni 'di 'dra tshe/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa/ /chos 'di bdag cag gzung bar bgyi/ /tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su/ /gang
448b6(mdo sde): dag chos la mi gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams la byams par bgyi/ /de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi/ /sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa/ /tshul khrims 'chal
448b7(mdo sde): pa mthong nas su/ /de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes/ /mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi/ /dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa/ /de dag 'phral du mthong na yang / /de
449a1(mdo sde): dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bar/ /ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi/ /rab tu bsdams nas ngag gi las/ /nyams kyis ci nus
449a2(mdo sde): bsrung bar bgyi/ /sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa/ /de la glo bur gtam mi bgyi/ /nor sbyin de bzhin sti stang gis/ /mi rnams yongs su smin bgyis
449a3(mdo sde): nas/ /yang dag sdig med spyod yul gyis/ /slad kyis de dag bskul bar bgyi/ /khyim dang sten pa kun spangs te/ /don nyung ba dang bgyid nyung ba/ /
449a4(mdo sde): bas mtha' dgon pa'i spyod yul ba/ /ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur bar bgyi/ /'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / /sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims gnas
449a5(mdo sde): pa dang / /mnyam bzhag shes rab ldan pa dang / /g.yel ba ma mchis 'gyur bar bgyi/ /dul ba dang ni zhi ba dang / /grol bas grong du zhugs nas kyang / /
449a6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag chos tshol ba/ /de la bdag cag chos bstan to/ /chos 'dod par ni rtogs nas su/ /shin du ring du 'ang mchi bar bgyi/ /chos la
449a7(mdo sde): dga' zhing mos rnyed nas/ /sems can rnams kyi don yang bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po/ /de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang / /chos
449b1(mdo sde): dang nges par rab gnas nas/ /bdag la rab tu brtag par bgyi/ /sti stang bgyis dang ma bgyis la/ /ri rab lta bur gyur nas su/ /'jig rten gyis ni mi
449b2(mdo sde): gos pa/ /'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar bgyid/ /dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyi/ /mi snyan pa dag rtogs nas kyang / /las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi/ /
449b3(mdo sde): de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur/ /chos rnams la ni gnas pa la/ /nged la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni/ /ji lta bur yang yod med ces/ /gshed ma dag kyang 'gyod
449b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/ /dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes/ /yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang / /mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur/ /sna
449b5(mdo sde): dang rna chad de dag ni/ /me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltar/ /yang dag bskul ba thos pa dag /de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur/ /dge slong gang dag
449b6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos/ /rab tu 'dzin par 'byung 'gyur te/ /de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang / /gang yang chos 'di mi nyan to/ /rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar
449b7(mdo sde): bgyid/ /skye bo chen po 'byed 'gyur yang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni byin brlabs kyis/ /sems can de rtag chos nyan 'gyur/ /dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams/ /
450a1(mdo sde): sems can dag la sman slad du/ /lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /'jig pa chen po'i
450a2(mdo sde): dus de na/ /tshig tsam du ni ma lags kyi/ /sgrub pa snying por bgyid par yang / /mgon pos bdag cag bsam pa mkhyen/ /dam chos 'di ni yongs bzung
450a3(mdo sde): na/ /bsod nams tshogs ni ji tsam mchis/ /chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzod pa/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
450a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogs kyi stong gsum bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang
450a5(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig la/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu kun du stong sum
450a6(mdo sde): cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig ste/ de nas rdul phra rab de dag thams cad ji snyed par shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
450a7(mdo sde): snyed 'das shing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag la/ tshul de lta bur shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad zad zad du bzhag kyang shar phyogs kyi
450b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug pa gang yang med do/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed
450b2(mdo sde): do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnams tshul de lta bus phyogs bcur bzhag pa las tshad dam
450b3(mdo sde): mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga'
450b4(mdo sde): bas mkhyen pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag las gang du rdul phra rab de
450b5(mdo sde): d ag bzhag par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te brtsig pas bskor nas 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i
450b6(mdo sde): bar gyi grong khyer de dag yungs 'bru mi rtsub pa 'ba' shig gi yongs su gang bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ yungs 'bru de dag mang ngam/ gsol
450b7(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar dpe 'di btsal ba ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dpe 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can
451a1(mdo sde): de dag kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs
451a2(mdo sde): pa ni| yungs 'bru de dag brgya phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ dkrigs pa dang / gtams pa dang / khyad
451a3(mdo sde): phyin dang / mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
451a4(mdo sde): zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub 'dod pa la la zhig
451a5(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pas/ ji ltar skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang yon tan
451a6(mdo sde): gyi chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/ 'di de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /yungs
451a7(mdo sde): 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gang la la zhig gis sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod pa bas/ gang
451b1(mdo sde): zab mo'i chos la bzod pa de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byin pa bas/ gang gzhan zhig sems
451b2(mdo sde): can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la rab tu dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun bor na/ de bas de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /yungs 'bru
451b3(mdo sde): de dag ji snyed pa de snyed du brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' snyed pas/ gzhan dag gis 'dus byas
451b4(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rig cing chos thams cad la bdag med par rig la/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rig nas sems can rnams la snying
451b5(mdo sde): rje chen po bskyed de dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de ni/ de bas ches bsod
451b6(mdo sde): nams mang du skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na ci nas
451b7(mdo sde): chos kyis rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod cing rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ bcom ldan
452a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ dgug pa'i tshig de dag
452a2(mdo sde): gis rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / rgya cher rnam par dbye zhing rab tu bstan pa'i phyir brtson par
452a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di dag ni/ dgug pa'i tshig go/ /'di lta ste/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hi d+hi re/ d+h+wa dza ba ti/ d+h+wa dza a laM ka ra/ a ba dwa ni/ sha me sha ma ba ti/ shAn+ti mu
452a4(mdo sde): khe/ ni gra ha pa ra pa k+Sha/ a no d+ha ra/ ut+t+wa ri bi ga ma/ sa ma pA tha/ pA tha shud+d+hi/ pA tha a nu ga ma/ pA tha san+d+hi/ pradz+nyA mu khe/ Ar+ya ku le/ b+hU ta rak+Sha
452a5(mdo sde): a me sa tsa/ me ne sa tsa/ ta ma sa tsa/ ta ta ma sa tsa/ bud+d+ha pA da/ d+harma a nu san+d+hi/ Ar+ya ga na mu kha ma/ Ar+ya nir+g+ha ta ni/ rush+ta pra sA da ni/ I shwa ra pa da lo ka tsit+ti
452a6(mdo sde): kr-i ta/ a nu rA ga yan+tu/ i man+d+harma san+d+hi/ bi b+ha tsan+tu ni ruk+ta/ nirde sha pra ti rak+Shan+tu/ d+har+m+ma d+ha ra Ni/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i
452a7(mdo sde): tshig go/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
452b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa
452b2(mdo sde): dang / sba ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der lha dang / klu dang /
452b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin du tshar bcad par bgyi'o/ /
452b4(mdo sde): gang dag chos 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sems rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang yongs su legs par gzhag par bgyi'o/ /
452b5(mdo sde): tshig gi mtshams su tshig gi mtshams sbyor bar bgyi'o/ /spobs pa yang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / dga' ba yang 'phel bar
452b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po de bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ khyed ni/ nga'i bu chos
452b7(mdo sde): las skyes pa chos kyis byung ba ste/ khyed rnams nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /khyed rnams chos kyi rgyu
453a1(mdo sde): 'thun pa 'dis 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ 'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas 'phags pa'i mya
453a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces
453a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi rnam
453a4(mdo sde): grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de la tshig ni/ 'di rnams so/ /'di lta ste/ shu b+he/ shu b+ha ma ti/ shu b+ha byU te
453a5(mdo sde): du da re/ da ri da du ra ni/ da me sha me/ u pa sha me/ khu be/ u ga sha me/ kha be/ u ga kha ra/ a so mu khe/ d+hA ra Ni/ a rad+di/ shu shru She/ sa hi te/ a
453a6(mdo sde): b+he de b+he da san+d+hi sau me sa ma ba te sa ma rasmi/ a she/ hu hu/ he he/ khu ru khu re/ a n+ti kra me/ de ba rla k+Sha sa hi ta ma hA b+ha ba b+ha sa pra me/ A gats+tsha du sha kro de ba nAM
453a7(mdo sde): man+t+ra/ da sha sha ta na ya na/ bar ma ku ta d+ha ra/ i shwa ra u ma rut+pa b+ha na ni ba si/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste/ dgug
453b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi
453b2(mdo sde): shugs kyis dga' ba skyes nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas te/ g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
453b3(mdo sde): la ba der dong nas lhags te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
453b4(mdo sde): bdag ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/ g.yog lha'i tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par
453b5(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba de dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag la ji ltar mi gnod pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / mos
453b6(mdo sde): pa rnyed cing chos kyi rgyan gyis brgyan te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu
453b7(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag chos mnyan pa'i slad du chos smra ba de dag gi gan
454a1(mdo sde): du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /khro zhing gshe yang dang du blang bar bgyi'o/ /bdud bar chad bgyid pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa
454a2(mdo sde): dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /ji lta bur khyod lha'i dbang po thob pas chos kyi dbang por zhugs nas nga dang / sangs
454a3(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs so legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
454a4(mdo sde): gi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba
454a5(mdo sde): yin no/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ de la rigs kyi bu/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
454a6(mdo sde): dgug pa'i tshig bshad kyis/ /dgug pa'i tshig gang dag gis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig /de
454a7(mdo sde): la dgug pa'i tshig ni/ 'di rnams so/ /'di lta ste/ mai tre/ shu b+ha mai tre/ d+harma mai tre/ mai t+r+ya/ nu sa hi te sa mai tre/ san+d+hi mai tre/ a nu ga ma mai tre/ a nu ga k+Sha
454b1(mdo sde): mai tre/ a nut+tA ra mai tre/ sa tra mai tre/ d+harma mai tre/ a nu gra ha mai tre/ a pra ti sA ri mai tre/ u la lo ka na mai tre/ bi lo ka na mai tre/ bi lo ka na mai tre/ be b+h+yaH a nu
454b2(mdo sde): ga ma na mai tre/ bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+ThA na mai tre/ a nu rA ga k+Sha mai tre/ a nu rA ga kha sha mai tre/ d+harma pra ti sA ra Na mai tre/ mo kha sha mai tre/ o no o no nu roM d+he/ bi ro d+ha mai tre/
454b3(mdo sde): o to mo mai tre/ brah+ma ba tha mai tre/ d+h+ya na a lang+ka ra mai tre/ ta s+ya a nu san+d+hi kA ru Na mai tre/ ta s+ya a nu san+d+hi mu ti ta mai tre/ ta s+ya sa nu san+d+hi u pe k+Sha mai tre/ brah+ma ba tha a
454b4(mdo sde): nu ga ma na mai tre/ tsit+ta U ts+tshi la l+ya mai tre/ a nu sA ra Na mai tre/ ni sti ra Na mai tre/ sarba ta a nu ga na ma na mai tre/ A gats+tsha tu brah+ma/ ud pri dz+yo/ dA na su khe na/
454b5(mdo sde): byut+tiSh+Tha swa ma d+he/ ni tra ma ma hA bi ma nA da/ bya ba lo kA ya/ dzam+bu dwI pa na ku ru ShA d+har+m+ma ra k+ShA na/ mA ti kra ma bud+d+ha d+hi Sh+Tha nA+oM/ nam mkha' mdzod/ 'di dag ni/ mi
454b6(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig go / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig
454b7(mdo sde): pa'i gsang sngags byams pa'i tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/ thos nas kyang tshangs pa brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad dang lhan
455a1(mdo sde): cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
455a2(mdo sde): tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
455a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pas bdag byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o/ /
455a4(mdo sde): gang chos smra ba de dag 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris
455a5(mdo sde): te 'chang ba de dag dgon par mchis sam/ lam gol bar mchis sam/ grong dang / grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du mchis sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i
455a6(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor du mchis kyang rung / chos kyi gtam bgyid kyang rung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher 'chad na/ bsam par bgyi'o/ /bsrung ba dang / bskyab
455a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de dag la spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o/ /stobs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /dran pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /blo gros yongs su
455b1(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/ /spobs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi'o/ /dad pa rnams bsgral bar
455b2(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol
455b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so legs so/ /tshangs pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs
455b4(mdo sde): su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi rang ngo / /ji ltar ngas da ltar bskor ba bzhin du tshangs pa/ khyod kyis kyang ring por mi thogs par chos kyi 'khor lo rab
455b5(mdo sde): tu bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan dag kyang khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur
455b6(mdo sde): ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang /
455b7(mdo sde): bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes pa bskyed pa dang /
456a1(mdo sde): bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub
456a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thob par bya ba dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / mu stegs thams cad gzhom pa dang / don dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung
456a3(mdo sde): ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

463b1(mdo sde): ' das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas

463b3(mdo sde): btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ bla ma'i mchog /khams
463b4(mdo sde): gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lhag pa'i gzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/ kun du khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs thug
463b5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa nges par thob par mdzad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa la dug gsum 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/
463b6(mdo sde): gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang na gang nyes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na gtso bo ma mchis shing de gang gi yang ma lags pa dang / rgyal po
463b7(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis non te phan tshun mi mthun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul bgyed pa dang / de dag gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa na gzhan
464a1(mdo sde): dag gi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang / de las gzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshal ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsod
464a2(mdo sde): nams kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul 'thob pa dang / de dag kyang phyi rol gyi gos ngur
464a3(mdo sde): smrig tsam dang / khong pa'i nang gi 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / shin du ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun la gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs par bgyid pa dang / skyon
464a4(mdo sde): sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / yon tan nges par sbed par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas non cing ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par bgyid
464a5(mdo sde): pa dang / de dag shi 'phos na yang ngan song gsum du skye zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshal ba dang / tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal
464a6(mdo sde): gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ yid du mi mchi ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du sems can 'di dag yongs
464a7(mdo sde): su smin par bgyi ba dang / ngan 'gro'i lam las rnam par bzlog nas bsod nams kyis gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
464b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spobs pa'i blo gros/ de ltar khyod seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs
464b2(mdo sde): pa la zhu zhing / de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la chos zhu bar spro ba skyed pa legs so legs so/ /spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can rnams gang thob nas
464b3(mdo sde): legs par rab tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i chos de
464b4(mdo sde): dag khyod zhus shig/ zhus nas kyang the tshom med par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
464b5(mdo sde): las gang dag gis ni/ lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ mi rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye
464b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ yi dwags rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ rigs mthon po rnams su skye
464b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni/ bran dang / bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ las gang dag gis ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du sems can skyes pa rnams skal pa
465a1(mdo sde): bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri bda' ba dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /
465a2(mdo sde): lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur/ las gang dag gis ni/ sems can rnams mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag
465a3(mdo sde): tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dri mi bda' ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang /
465a4(mdo sde): lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma lags pa dang / nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ las gang dag gis ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i
465a5(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byang ba dge sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du rgyun du
465a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos
465a7(mdo sde): thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du don yang grub par 'gyur/ bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na/ 'byung po grangs ma mchis pa thams cad
465b1(mdo sde): la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dbang dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la lkog
465b2(mdo sde): tu ma gyur pa'i spyan dang ldan pas rnam par phye ste rgyas par lan stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo
465b3(mdo sde): gros| khyod kyis ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam par phye ste bshad kyi/ nyon cig /tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du 'tshal
465b4(mdo sde): lo| |zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang
465b5(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyong bar
465b6(mdo sde): byed cing bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par mi byed cing bkren pa'i sems dang ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar byed pa yin/ gzhan
465b7(mdo sde): gyi chung ma la spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa ma yin te/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin/ gso sbyong la brtson zhing bden par smra ba yin/ rang
466a1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dug cing rang gi skyon tshad med pa spong bar byed la myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin te/ las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams
466a2(mdo sde): lha'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /srog chags gsod las ldog pa byas pas lha dang
466a3(mdo sde): mi dang lha min rnams/ 'jig rten du ni mi thub lus can tshe ring med 'gyur ba yin/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shis ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus//
466a4(mdo sde): lha nang rab mchog de yi longs spyod sna tshogs dpal can rtag tu 'byung / /por ma thag tu lha nang rtag tu lha yi dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur/ /bsam med bsal ba 'phro
466a5(mdo sde): ba rnam log rin chen longs spyod rnams dang ldan/ /rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu yid dga' dpal ldan gzhal med khang gnas shing / /rtse zhing dga' ba'i dpag bsam
466a6(mdo sde): shing gi yul na me tog gtor lus ldan/ /mkhas shing 'dod pa mi phan yongs spangs dri mchog dag pa'i lus dang ldan/ /tshe rabs kun tu dpe med gser mchog
466a7(mdo sde): lus dang ldan zhing rab tu mdzes/ /rtag tu lha yi nang du skal pa bzang thob lus las 'od 'byung 'gyur/ /lha mo sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal
466b1(mdo sde): la spyod par byed/ /sngon chad cho ga bzhin du ngag skyon bzhi spangs kha ni dri zhim ldan/ /gsal zhing thogs med mi 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams 'dir ni nges par 'byung //
466b2(mdo sde): yang dag lan 'debs rnams bsgrags snyan cing skye bos shin tu tshig gzung 'os/ /pi waM rol mo sgra 'byor sprin sgra skad snyan pho brang 'khor skad ldan/ /ma rmongs sems kyis
466b3(mdo sde): myos 'gyur ma legs rjod byed spangs pas lhar 'gyur zhing / /grangs med dge ba'i lha yis mchod pa lha yi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan zhing lus brtan yid
466b4(mdo sde): bzang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa rjod par byed/ /gal te tshe zad lha yi yul nas lhung ba'i lha rnams
466b5(mdo sde): de tshe smad/ /sdig med lo brgya nyi shu 'gro na lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de ni dam pa dpal ldan lus 'od cing / /lha rnams
466b6(mdo sde): lam sel byed cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de brtan par 'gro / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems
466b7(mdo sde): can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po byas pa gzo bas sbyin pa dang / bkren pa dang / dbul po dang / sdug
467a1(mdo sde): bsngal ba la kun bged pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ma nyams par bsten pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med
467a2(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos la spro bar byed cing nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas la mthun par 'dzin
467a3(mdo sde): pa ste| spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur zhing longs spyod kyang chen por 'gyur pa dang / tshe ring ba dang /
467a4(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
467a5(mdo sde): to| |sbyin pa byin pas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur/ /rtag tu longs spyod 'byor dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur/ /lus ngan po dang mtshungs par sbyin dang sbyod par
467a6(mdo sde): byed/ /rigs dang dam pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /tshul khrims ma nyams de ni dkon mchog mchod par byed/ /nyes byas yongs su spangs pas shin
467a7(mdo sde): tu nges pa ste/ /tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'pho med pa yin/ /bde ba thob pas skyon med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /nges pa'i mi ni pha rol sems 'khrugs ma
467b1(mdo sde): byas shing / /gzhan dag rnams kyis gnod byas phyir ni gnod mi byed/ /de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gshe bar mi byed pas/ /dge ba mchog gi tshul thob nas ni mdzes
467b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus bzang la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing / /stobs dang gzi brjid chen po dge ba rnams dang ldan/ /dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob
467b3(mdo sde): par gyur pas na/ /longs spyod 'byor pa'i spyod yul ldan pas lha der 'gyur/ /mi 'phrog sems ldan mkhas shing shin tu mthun pa ste/ /byas pa gzo zhing las la 'dod
467b4(mdo sde): par rab tu byad/ /dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogs la mchod mdzangs pa/ /nam yang kun la the tshom byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi gang khyad par 'phags pa dge ba
467b5(mdo sde): lnga po rnams/ /byed pa de ni sa yi bdag por rab tu 'gyur/ /stobs la sogs dang gzugs dang longs spyod mi zad ldan/ /grags ldan shin tu gtso bo rnams kyis rim
467b6(mdo sde): gro byas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal
467b7(mdo sde): ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba mang por gnas par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
468a1(mdo sde): dkon mchog la dad par mi byed la kun tu bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas skur pa 'debs par byed cing 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang / de
468a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang / bar gyi dus na'ang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang zag bzhi po mang por mi gus pa
468a3(mdo sde): mthun par mi 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten gyi smra ba lhur len pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa dang / gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis gcig la gcig skur pa 'debs
468a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gis rgyal po dang / rje dpon dang / blon po dang / pha dang / bu rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pas mi gus pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong
468a5(mdo sde): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la brten nas khyim nas khyim
468a6(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung ste bdag nyid dge slong yin par khas 'che shing dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa la mi gnas la/ mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams mgu
468a7(mdo sde): b ar mi byed cing bka' blo mi bde la mthun par mi 'dzin cing yang dag par rjes su bstan kyang rjes su bstan pa la sgrub par mi byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed
468b1(mdo sde): la| bdag la bstod pa byed/ gzhan la smod par byed cing nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa'i shas che la bla ma rnams la brnyas par byed/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti
468b2(mdo sde): la lhag par zhen cing skur pa 'debs par byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar
468b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing skye nas kyang ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig pa ma byung ba de srid du gnas par 'gyur zhing / 'jig pa byung nas kyang
468b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe der yang 'jig pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams
468b5(mdo sde): gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag na sems can dmyal ba gang
468b6(mdo sde): dag yod pa de dag tu 'khyams shing sdug bsngal nyams su myong la 'byung ba'i mtha' med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
468b7(mdo sde): to| |rmongs pas thog ma med nas 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal bying gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho khas len mi byed de/ /de ni kun rig ma yin rnal
469a1(mdo sde): 'byor rgyal po ma yin zhes/ /bdag nyid chud gzan skye bo gzhan rnams la yang slu bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'byor
469a2(mdo sde): pa sdug pa'i mchog byas na/ /de ni dge ba chung 'gyur 'jig par byed pa'i char 'gyur zhes/ /mi dge 'di ni mngon sum dge ba mdun na yod bzhin du/ /'on kyang
469a3(mdo sde): sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed/ /bar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir bzhi po bkres pas nyam thag pa/ /phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas dkrugs shing bla ma
469a4(mdo sde): smod par byed/ /'khor du 'dus pa 'dul ba'i dga' ba 'di ni rnam bshig pas/ /mi bzad ro med log par ltung ba'i sar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po pha dang sring mo
469a5(mdo sde): spun dang gzhon nu bu mo rnams/ /byams pa'i yid ni log gyur longs spyod rnams la brkam chags te/ /byis pa bu ltar thams cad gcig la gcig ni bzhad gad
469a6(mdo sde): byed| |log ltung dam pa rnam par 'bying bar myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus 'dir gang dag shin tu sdig can sems can rnams/ /mthun par mi 'dzin
469a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong kha dog 'dzin pa gzugs mi sdug / ngan pa'i bdag nyid ldan pa sdig pa khrag khrig byed 'gyur ba/ /de dag shi 'phos nas ni sdig pa rtsod pa'i mchog gis
469b1(mdo sde): gnon| |mi yis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sdig pa lnga po dag / bsgrubs shing byas pa dag ni bshags par nus pa ma yin te/ /gang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig gis
469b2(mdo sde): kyang bskyab par mi spyod pa'i/ /me ri drag po mnar med pa yi mer ni sreg par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/
469b3(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / chom
469b4(mdo sde): rkun dang / gzhan gyi bu lon blangs nas gnod sems su byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma dad pas dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan par dga' zhing dam pa'i chos
469b5(mdo sde): ma yin pa nyan pa la dga' bas log pas 'tsho ba thams cad la dga' ba ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ dud 'gro
469b6(mdo sde): rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la dga' ba'i mi
469b7(mdo sde): rnams ni/ /bu lon byin pa rnam par blangs nas mi gzhan gsod par byed/ /srog gcod pa la dga' ba'i ri dwags 'chi bdag rgyal po rnams/ /rgyal sogs pas
470a1(mdo sde): bzung nas sems can rnams la gsod par byed/ /dad pa la sogs dman pa'i blo gros dkar po'i 'du shes can/ /nag po dpag tu med
470a2(mdo sde): pa bdag cag spyod par mi shes pa/ rmongs pa rnams ni dam chos dkon mchog gtam la dga' mi byed/ /'jig rten zhugs pa'i chos la 'dir ni rjes su 'gro
470a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar gangs ri las 'dir kha ba bab dang rab bab pa/ chu ni chu yi shugs kyis 'phral du sa 'og 'gro ba bzhin/ /lha mi'i grong du sdig pa'i phung po
470a4(mdo sde): mang du byas pas na/ /rmongs pa rnams ni de bzhin dud 'gro rnams su myur du 'gro /rta dre'u rnga bong glang chen pa lang ma he seng+ge dang / /wa dang sbrul dang phag dang khyi
470a5(mdo sde): la sogs par gyur nas su/ /rtswa za ba dang sha dang bdud rtsi lo ma'i zas za zhing / /de dag rtag tu gzhan gyi khur 'khyer byed cing dub bar 'gyur/ /bkres pas zil gyis
470a6(mdo sde): non pas gcig la gcig za lhur byed pa/ /bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su'ang nam yang thar par mi 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig na rus sbal mig ni
470a7(mdo sde): gcig yod pas/ /gnya' shing bu gar mgrin pa gtad par nus pa ma yin pa/ /de bzhin lha dang mi dang dbang phyug che nyid bde blag tu/ /log par ltung ba brgya
470b1(mdo sde): yis thob par nus pa ma yin te/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer dam pa'i tshogs can dpag tu med pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'od kyis de dag 'byin par
470b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ yi dwags kyi
470b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po bkren zhing chags pa dang / mun pa mun nag chen po'i bshes gnyen dang / gsog pa lhur byed pa'i phyir bdag
470b4(mdo sde): nyid kyang longs spyod par mi byed pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phrag dog dang / ser sna lhur byed pas spun dang / sring mo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las
470b5(mdo sde): byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / 'brel pa dang / sbyin gnas dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa thams cad la
470b6(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin par mi byed cing pa ma dag la'ang rab tu sbyin par mi byed pa dang / nges par bskyang bar 'os pa dag mi skyong la bsnyen bkur mi byed cing bla ma la mi gus la gces
470b7(mdo sde): par mi byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ yi dwags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
471a1(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bkren pa'i nyes pas bcom pa nor gtong mi phod pa/ /de dag gzhan dag las ni blang bar 'dod
471a2(mdo sde): par byed/ /mdzod rnams kyi ni sgo 'phar dam du bsdams pa rnams/ /'dir ni bskyang 'os rtsa lag mchog rnams gso mi byed/ /gzhan nor chud gzon pa yis rtag
471a3(mdo sde): tu skrag pa rnams/ /bla ma la yang de dag rab rtsub byams can min/ /de dag bdag gi chung ma la sogs g.yog tshogs la/ /dbyig sbyin mi byed shin tu snying brtse shes
471a4(mdo sde): med cing / /dkar po dag las log pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ yun ring mchog tu lus 'bar sdug bsngal yi dwags 'gyur/ /de dag lo brgya rnams su rmi lam
471a5(mdo sde): rmis par yang / /gos dang zas dang btung ba'ang nam yang rmi mi 'gyur/ /khab 'dra'i kha dang ri chen lta bu'i lto can rnams/ /nyam thag shar dang nub kyi rgya mtshor rgyug par
471a6(mdo sde): byed/ /kha nas me 'bar lus ngan phyogs dang lho phyogs gzhan/ /skam par mthong nas rin chen me nang lhung bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i pho nya dpung mgo las grub rab
471a7(mdo sde): stug cing / /sra ldan rnams kyis mnan nas zangs zhun bzod dka' rab/ /mi 'dra ro bro med pa de dag rnams la ldud/ /rmongs rnams yan lag brgyad ldan chu bzhin
471b1(mdo sde): 'thung bar byed/ /nang grol lus kyi khog pa bsregs pa bsal ba'i rlung gis su/ /skyes pa'i bdag nyid rnams la stobs chen yang ldud byed/ /de nas shi 'phos mi yi
471b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dir skyes rnams/ /rigs dang longs spyod lus g.yog rnams kyis dman par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal
471b3(mdo sde): pa| spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ /'di lta ste/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa dag
471b4(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod sems med par gyur pa dang / dkon mchog gsum dang pha ma la gus pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i bzod pa dang / des pa dang /
471b5(mdo sde): shin tu gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam pa sna tshogs klog pa dang kha ton bya ba la brtson pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa
471b6(mdo sde): rnams ni/ rigs mthon po rnams su 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bsam byas gang dag bsod nams
471b7(mdo sde): tshogs pa skal bzang sbyin pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /kun tu sems can mang la kun bged de dag rtag tu nad med 'gyur/ /tshe dang kha dog stobs ldan lus can 'jig rten
472a1(mdo sde): mchog tu 'gyur/ /mtshungs dang rgya chen khyad par can gyis mdzes mdzod rin chen ri dbang bzhin/ /'dul ba nyams dga'i dkon mchog
472a2(mdo sde): mtshungs med pha ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bas/ /shin tu rgya chen gtso mchog khyim du skye bos mchod/ /shin tu nus kyang yid 'khrug rnam spangs kun tu gzugs kyis
472a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mig tu sdug pa skal bzang rigs ni mthon por 'gyur/ /gang zag brtan zhing kun bzod shin tu yid bzang dkar dang
472a4(mdo sde): mthun rnams dang / /mi rnams gang dag shes rab dag mchog sangs rgyas gsung la kha ton brtson/ /de dag 'byor pa thob nas rigs mchog skyes pa kun tu kun
472a5(mdo sde): mchog mdzes/ /de dag dge bas rgyas pas lus chen rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du spa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs
472a6(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bran dang / bran mo nying thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma rnams la mi gus pa dang /
472a7(mdo sde): gya nom pa'i sems ma yin pa dang / zlog pa med cing ci dgar sdig pa spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / bu lon 'phrog nas bdag sbed pa ste/ spobs
472b1(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bran dang / bran mo nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
472b2(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bsod nams rgya chen 'byor ba gangs 'od lta bu'i khyim du skye thob nas/ /blun po gang dag rgyags khengs dregs pas dkrugs shing gus par
472b3(mdo sde): mi byed la/ /pha ma rnams la rmad byung sbyin gnas 'dra bar 'du shes mi byed pa/ /de dag nyes pas gzhan du 'jig rten dbang gyur dman zhing g.yon can 'gyur/ /dkon
472b4(mdo sde): mchog mtshungs med rnams la ma gus lhur byed ma rungs brlang tshig 'gyur/ /gang dag byams dang de bzhin snying rje ma lus dge ba chud gzan pa/ /de dag grangs med skye
472b5(mdo sde): bar 'dzin med gzhan 'joms ngo tsha mi shes shing / /mi yi yul du bran nyid spangs nas skad cig gis ni dma' bar 'gyur/ /gzugs dang dbang phyug rigs mchog blo
472b6(mdo sde): bral dman la mos pa'i glen par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog rnam mang mchod pas nga rgyal med cing zhen la mdangs ngan 'gyur/ /dpal kun med cing ting 'dzin bral ba
472b7(mdo sde): las rnams kyis ni bsdigs par 'gyur/ /de dag 'jig rten kun dga' dga' ston che sogs med cing tshegs kyis 'tsho/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs
473a1(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing khyim khel
473a2(mdo sde): dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos bsngags pa rnams su 'gyur te/ lnga
473a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa
473a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum po thams cad kyi tshig gi rang bzhin la mi bzod pa med cing mi smod la/ mi spong zhing de thams cad du gzung ba dang / bshad pa
473a5(mdo sde): dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton la sogs pa byed pa dang / ngag gi skyon bzhi po tshad med pa rnam par spong zhing 'phags pa'i lam la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /
473a6(mdo sde): sems can log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la snying brtse zhing yongs su bskyang ba dang / skyon de las bzlog cing dge ba la dgod pa dang / gzhan gyi skyon mthong ba'i
473a7(mdo sde): brjod pa yal bar 'jog pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing
473b1(mdo sde): zhing khyim khol dang ldan pa dang / kha dri zhim pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / mthun pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / sems tha ma la du gnas
473b2(mdo sde): pa dang / khro ba med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / grags pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
473b3(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas sogs la shin tu shas cher gus 'bad pha ma rnams mchod pas/ /rtag tu ngag skyon kun bral 'jig rten dag tu rmad du byung
473b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /tshig gi yon tan gzung 'os rnga sgrar bcas shing tshe rabs kun tu phan/ /ut+pal dri dang mdzes pa'i rlung ldan kha yis phyogs su snyan pa grags/ /gang dag bdag
473b5(mdo sde): byams gzhan mtshungs mi phan skyon brjod sdig pa ngan pa las/ /phral nas dge ba kun la sems can rnams ni sbyor du 'jug byed pa/ /de dag 'jig rten thob nas skal
473b6(mdo sde): ba bzang po kun tu thams cad dga'/ /shin tu yid 'ong rin chen yul can bde gnas sdig las log par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung dang bstan brtson de sems
473b7(mdo sde): byed cing des par 'gyur/ /'dir ni sems can kun la pha ma 'dra bar byams pa'i sems ldan 'gyur/ /'das pa'i dus su lus can kun ni nged kyi rtsa lag tshogs gyur
474a1(mdo sde): ces| |de lta zla ba lta bu'i sems sbyangs de dag la ni phan par byed/ /'gran dregs khyad gsod la sogs rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun sun
474a2(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i/ /sdig pa yongs su spangs nas dag pa'i yid can skyon rnams kun sbas nas/ /sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bas snyan tshogs phan tshun rjod par
474a3(mdo sde): byed| |myur du lha yi dbang phyug mtshungs med thob nas sangs rgyas dge bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs
474a4(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / kha
474a5(mdo sde): dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bas
474a6(mdo sde): rtag tu gzhan slu ba'i sems lhur len pa dang / chos kyi 'bel pa'i gtam chen po la 'dus pa na chos kyi gtam de la rnam par smod pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
474a7(mdo sde): pa rnams mthong na de dag la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa dang / dma' ba'i sems su byed pa ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ sems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa
474b1(mdo sde): rnams ni/ mi'i dam pa thob nas rtag tu skur pa 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang / sems mi
474b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / gnod pa mang pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sems
474b3(mdo sde): yid rnams kyis gzhan sems drag tu 'khrug dang sdig pa rnams byas pas/ /log pa'i ngag dang gzhan la gnod par dga' ba tha ma rnams sems dang / lus kyis sdug
474b4(mdo sde): bsngal gzhal med rdzogs pa bar med nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /lcags kyi lcags kyu chen po rnon po rnams kyis nyam thag lce 'byin 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i dbang phyug
474b5(mdo sde): gnas su'ang mi rnams shin tu zangs bskol ldud par 'gyur/ /dmyal bar mi bden tshig can skyes pa de dag dga' bar yong mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe 'dir ni tshig bzang bral
474b6(mdo sde): ba ro ltar kha dri mi zhim zhing / /'jig rten mig tu yid 'ong blta na sdug pa ma yin rnams su 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mi snyan skur 'debs rtsod pa'i skyon mang
474b7(mdo sde): zhing / /de dag rtag tu skyon gnas mi ni sa ya mang pos gleng bar 'gyur/ /sems can rdzun smra rnams kyis tha mal sems dang lus bde ma yin phyir/ /sngar bshad nyes
475a1(mdo sde): 'gro de yi 'bras bu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur/ /mi nyid spangs nas dbang med mi rnams bde ba kun la slu byed pa'i/ /sems can
475a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur de nas shi 'phos gyur nas ni/ /'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtsub par dud 'gro rnams su skye/ /de ltar lus can 'khyams pa
475a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa'i blo gros/ dge sbyong dang / rigs
475a4(mdo sde): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs
475a5(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid
475a6(mdo sde): dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di
475a7(mdo sde): lta ste/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas gzhan dag kyang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa la rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / rnam pa
475b1(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu rdzogs shing rgyas la rgya chen po legs par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon shes
475b2(mdo sde): shing gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bka' blo bde ba dang mthun par 'dzin par sgrub pa dang / kun tu thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad
475b3(mdo sde): bdag dang 'dra zhing bu gcig pa'i byis pa dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / ji ltar brtsams pa'i mdo sgrub pa dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton dang / lung mnod pa dang /

475b5(mdo sde): sbyong dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nye bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa'i sems can chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams ni/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams
475b6(mdo sde): cad du bar chad med par sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams dang mi bral bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang
475b7(mdo sde): de dag las chos kyang thos nas yid dga' zhing ci bsam pa bzhin du byang chub rnams thob par 'gyur la/ ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang thob par

476a3(mdo sde): rnams ni slob dpon tshig la mchod par byed/ /gang dag phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten ma lus la/ /bdag dang bu gcig byis pa rnams dang 'drar mthong ba/ /de
476a4(mdo sde): dag sreg pa kun tu mya ngan med nges 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag thugs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong / /gang dag shes rab rin chen chen po 'byor mdzad
476a5(mdo sde): rnams| |nyin dang mtshan du dge ba kun tu spyod par byed/ /'dir ni rmad du byung ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rnams/ /'jig rten mun pa che la snang la mchog byed 'gyur/ /
476a6(mdo sde): kun tu chos rnams thams cad rab tu rnam phye nas/ /sangs rgyas lam las mchog ni gzhan med par/ /nges par byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ /
476a7(mdo sde): mthar thug 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni shes par 'gyur/ /de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas
476b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam po dang / so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya tsam
476b2(mdo sde): po de dag ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
476b3(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis
476b4(mdo sde): ni| ci bsam pa bzhin gyi theg pa rnams la sems bskyed do/ /ci 'dod pa bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa'ang thob cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
476b5(mdo sde): gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
476b6(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
476b7(mdo sde): 'das khams gsum pa'i bla mas chos lnga po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa legs so legs so/ /chos lnga po de dag thos nas 'khor 'di yid bzhin du thams
477a1(mdo sde): cad rdzogs par don grub par gyur lags so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'di nyid thob nas nag po'i phyogs spangs te dkar
477a2(mdo sde): po'i phyogs la zhugs shing brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par spyan
477a3(mdo sde): 'dren na/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du khyod kyis de ltar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros la thugs brtse ba'i slad
477a4(mdo sde): du gnang ba mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang
477a5(mdo sde): y id bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan
477a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de rang gi khyim du song nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag byas te thal mo sbug sbug por sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum /
477a7(mdo sde): 'di ltar gang 'jig rten na shin tu dkon mchog gshegs pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ khams gsum pa thams cad las 'das pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
477b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/ des kyang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang lags kyi/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /
477b2(mdo sde): de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dag yid dga' ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu/ legs so/ /khyod kyis lags par byas so/ /zhes mngon par bstod de/ de bzhin
477b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyur te/ de nas spobs pa'i blo gros kyis rang gi chung ma pad+ma g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la bsgo ba/ bzang mo/ /khyod kyis
477b4(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i don du bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa mang
477b5(mdo sde): ba dang / bsod par sbyor cig /sbyar nas kyang khyim thams cad chag chag gdab pa dang / phyag dar bya ba dang / bla bre bre ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi gdags pa dang / me tog chal
477b6(mdo sde): par dgram pa dang / bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug par byed du bcug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa'i gdan ci 'os su bting
477b7(mdo sde): ste mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul ba spyan sngar bzhag pas bcom ldan 'das dam pa de la sdod cig ces bsgo ste/ spobs pa'i blo gros mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang /
