478a2(mdo sde): m o 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal skyed mos tshal chen po nas byung nas sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas de bzhin
478a3(mdo sde): g shegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i rol pas cho 'phrul dang bcas pas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por gshegs
478a4(mdo sde): so| |gshegs nas kyang rim gyis spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim ga la ba de logs su bzhud do/ /de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan
478a5(mdo sde): ' das bsus nas mchod yon dang zhabs la dbul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas
478a6(mdo sde): par khyim gyi nang du gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ ci 'os pa'i gdan mchog la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'os pa la 'khod do/ /de nas
478a7(mdo sde): spobs pa'i blo gros kyi pha ma dang / slas dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams ni/ yid dga' zhing 'dud la bla ma la gus pa dang /
478b1(mdo sde): gces par byed pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig pa la 'brim par rtsom mo/ /spobs pa'i blo gros ni/ me tog dang / spos chur bcas
478b2(mdo sde): pas bkang ba'i ril ba thogs nas ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal ba'i grogs po gnyis shig spobs pa'i blo gros kyi khyim du phyin par
478b3(mdo sde): gyur nas de gnyis las gcig ni/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang btung ba 'byor tshogs zhes ma smras la/ bcom ldan
478b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang rjes su thugs rang ba ma gsungs pas/ de gang gis kyang ci'ang ma byin nas de khros te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang gis
478b5(mdo sde): ci'ang ma byin pa ni/ dge sbyong bdag nyid ngan pa rnams te/ sems nye bar zhi ba ma yin zhing snying rje med la byams pa'i sems ldan pa ma yin pa dag go /gang de dag la
478b6(mdo sde): byin yang 'bras bu med pa de lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin bdag blun po ste/ gal te bdag rgyal por gyur na/ thams cad kyi mgo lcags kyi 'khor los gcad do/ /
478b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag 'byor tshogs zhes byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su
479a1(mdo sde): thugs rangs par mdzad pa dang / gcig shos 'ongs par gyur to/ /des ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa thob nas de yid rangs
479a2(mdo sde): te phyir byung nas 'di snyam du kye ma sdug bsngal ba bdag la gang dag gis bza' ba dang btung ba mang ba dang / bsod pa byin pa ni/ dge sbyong bdag nyid chen po rnams te/
479a3(mdo sde): snying brtse bar byed la sems nye bar zhi ba yin zhing byams pa'i bdag nyid can dag go /'dis ni/ bdag zhag bdun du tshim par 'gyur bar byas so/ /gang 'di
479a4(mdo sde): dag la byin na 'bras bu che ba sbyin gnas chen po 'di lta bu dag la sbyin par byed pa ni/ sbyin bdag chen po mkhas pa ste/ legs so/ /gal te bdag rgyal por
479a5(mdo sde): gyur na| sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhag bdun du bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis rim gro byed par gyur cig snyam du sems par gyur to/ /
479a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas gsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ deng phyin
479a7(mdo sde): chad bza' ba dang / btung ba ma blangs pa nyid du rjes su yi rang brjod cig /de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
479b1(mdo sde): 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par gzangs bstod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa sngon du mdzad pa'i chos kyi
479b2(mdo sde): gtam sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed pa mdzad do/ gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas de na
479b3(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas sdug bsngal ba de gnyis 'khor 'khor 'khyams 'khyams te yul gzhan zhig tu song nas pha zad tshu zad tsam gyi phyogs su nyal bar gyur to/ /
479b4(mdo sde): der bsod nams kyi las can de la steng gi nam mkha' la grib ma'i don du sprin gyi bla bre glog dang rlung 'byung ba dang bcas pa rab tu gnas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe yul
479b5(mdo sde): de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /de na gang rgyal srid la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'ang gzhan med do/ /de na tshong
479b6(mdo sde): dpon dang / grong mi dang / yul mi dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams ni/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan dang
479b7(mdo sde): skar ma dang / gza' spyod pa la mkhas pa la rgyal por 'gyur ba su yod ces brtson par gyur cing 'dri'o/ /des smras pa/ skyes bu dbul po mtshan dang ldan pa zhig
480a1(mdo sde): yod de| de ni/ rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rgyal po la 'os pa rin thang che ba'i khri stan bzang
480a2(mdo sde): po gser gyi rkang rten dang bcas pa dang / yu ba nor bu las byas pa'i gdugs dkar po dang / yu ba gser las byas shing nor bu dang ldan pa'i rnga ma'i
480a3(mdo sde): bsil yab dang / spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa du ma dang / me tog dang / rgyan phreng dang / gos dang / dbu rgyan dang / thod dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i
480a4(mdo sde): rgyan dang / spos kyi phur ma dang / slo ma dag thogs te sol snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang bcas pa dag dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor nas byung ste
480a5(mdo sde): kun nas de kun tu btsal to/ /ltas mkhan des sprin gyi tshogs kyis bkab pa'i phyogs de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /khyed
480a6(mdo sde): cag gis sprin sngon po'i dkyil 'khor gyis khebs pa dga' zhing gsal ba'i phyogs de mthong ngam/ de dag gis smras pa/ grogs po/ /mthong ngo / des smras
480a7(mdo sde): pa| de na rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'dug ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi las kyis grib ma'i don du sprin de dag 'dus so/ /de nas de dag der dong nas
480b1(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgras spran te btud nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dbang bskur ba bzhes la rgyal por gyur cig /de sa smras pa/ kho bo lta bu rgyal po'i
480b2(mdo sde): 'os ga la yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ bsod nams kyi las can khyod de skad mi zer bar gdon mi za bar rgyal po bya dgos so/ /smras pa/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ de
480b3(mdo sde): nas de dag gis mal gyi rkang rten la rkang pa bzhag pa de stan bzang po la 'dug tu bcug nas bkra shis thams cad kyis rgyas par byed cing dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyan dar
480b4(mdo sde): t hod can la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas shing rta'i mgo logs su gdugs chen po bsgrengs te btsugs shing yu ba gser las byas pa nor bu can gyi rnga ma'i
480b5(mdo sde): bsil yab dag gis g.yob cing / lha rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas mngon par bstod de rgyal po pho brang 'khor du khrid do/ /de nas rgyal po'i
480b6(mdo sde): shing rta de sgyur ba'i 'khor los bkren pa gcig shos gnyid log pa'i mgo chad do/ /de nas bsod nams kyi las can de'ang rgyal srid la gnas par gyur to/ /de'i
480b7(mdo sde): rgyal srid de'ang yams kyi nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar
481a1(mdo sde): gyur to| |rgyal po'i ming gis yon tan thams cad 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/ dga' mgur spyod pa de 'di snyam du 'di gang gi mthu yin/
481a2(mdo sde): bdag gi rgyal srid skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa 'di gang gis byung bar gyur snyam pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi las mngon par 'du byas pa de thams
481a3(mdo sde): cad rjes su dran no/ /yang dag par dran nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sems can mang po gzhan rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad
481a4(mdo sde): du tshur gshegs su gsol zhes pho nya zhig btang ngo / /pho nya btang nas kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar dang / rang gi khyim gyi bar du bar der bcom ldan 'das
481a5(mdo sde): kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i lam chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas te me tog chal bar bkram nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta babs
481a6(mdo sde): btsugs shing po phor dag gis bdugs nas mngon par brgyan te bcom ldan 'das kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po de grong
481a7(mdo sde): khyer gyi mi dang / yul mi dang bcas shing blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas bsu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
481b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye mas bsgos pa'i slo ma dpag tu med pas mchod de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i
481b2(mdo sde): zhabs la lus thams cad kyis phyag btsal nas 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la bla ma la gus pa dang / gces par byed pa chen po mchog gis bcom ldan
481b3(mdo sde): ' das dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rang gi khyim gyi nang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyed mos tshal chen pos yongs su bskor bar gshegs su gsol nas
481b4(mdo sde): zhag bdun du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so/ /de nas rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol nas gsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs
481b5(mdo sde): par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir g.yog 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/
481b6(mdo sde): dma' ba dang / dbul ba lags na/ bdag gi rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa 'di ga las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po
481b7(mdo sde): chen po/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na sbyin bdag chen po spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim du sangs
482a1(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to/ /de nas der sdug bsngal ba gnyis shig lhags zhes bya ba nas
482a2(mdo sde): rgyas par snga ma bzhin te/ gcig gi mgo khyed kyis shing rta'i 'khor los chod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de'ang shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal bar
482a3(mdo sde): skyes te| der skyes pa de'i mgo skad cig skad cig la skyes so cog na lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar bas bcad do/ /de'ang de nas bskal pa bye bas thar par
482a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis ni/ rgyal po'i dpal thob ste/ bdag de lta bur gyur nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du gdugs tshod
482a5(mdo sde): gsol bar gyur cig ces khyod kyis smon lam btab ste/ khyod kyi bsam pa de'ang rdzogs so/ /de phyin chad ni/ tshe rabs dpag tu med pa thams cad du
482a6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
482a7(mdo sde): to| |'jig rten nag po 'byung ba'i phyir/ /yid ni dug gi rtsa ba yin/ /nyes par smra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir/ kha ni sdig pa'i sgo nyid do/ /sems kyis
482b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs sems par byed/ /de nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur/ /ngag yid dag gis sdig byas pa/ /lus kyis sdug bsngal sbyin par byed/ /phan dang mi phan ma bsam
482b2(mdo sde): par| |blo gros med pas sdig byed pa/ /des na sdug bsngal snod 'gyur te/ /nyon mongs pa dag de ltar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi mgo bo dag /yid kyis gcod
482b3(mdo sde): par 'dod pa de/ /blo gros ngan pa mi shes pa'i/ /mgo ni 'khor los yang dag gcod/ /dpal ldan yid 'di kho nas ni/ /chos dkar bdud rtsi sten pa yi/ /sems
482b4(mdo sde): can bsod nams byas dge rnams/ /lha yi 'jig rten rnams su khrid/ /'dir ni snying gis kun bsdam nas/ /tshig tu brjod pas legs smras pa/ /de phyir de ni
482b5(mdo sde): lus kyis su/ /bsod nams mdzod ni len par 'gyur/ /mi yis blo ni sngon btang ste/ /las dge mi dge rnams phye nas/ /gal te bsod nams che byed na/ /
482b6(mdo sde): rtag tu rab tu lha der 'gyur/ /sems kyis mi dge ba yi las/ /rtag tu yongs su spangs nas ni/ /rab tu dga' bas bsod nams nyid/ /mi yis bya ste sdig
482b7(mdo sde): pa min| |tshe rabs bye ba grangs med par/ /'khor los bsgyur sogs go 'phang gi /lha mi'i nang du rgyal po'i dpal/ /thams cad thob nas khyod bzhin no/ /
483a1(mdo sde): mi yi dbang phyug dus kun tu/ /srid rnams snying po med shes nas/ /khyod kyis sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /mngon par brtson pa
483a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po des yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mchog tu yid byung ste 'khor dang bcas pas rgyun
483a3(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /gzhan stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pas lha dang mi'i phun sum
483a4(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der gang
483a5(mdo sde): s ems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa de thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te gtsug lag khang gi skyabs shin tu dge slong gi dge
483a6(mdo sde): 'dun gyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi
483a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di zungs shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi
483b1(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
483b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byams pa las ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i theg pa rnams la lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
483b3(mdo sde): bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
483b4(mdo sde): stsal pa| kun dga' bo/ /de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ las rnam par 'byed pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros
483b5(mdo sde): kyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang
483b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshong dpon spobs pa'i blo gros g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi
483b7(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa spobs pa'i blo
484a1(mdo sde): gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen
484a2(mdo sde): gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /
